I am unable to use my current phone number because it is blocked and it seems that there is no way to unfreeze the account. Absolutely poor app very badly designed and very confusing. I am deleting it

Honestly this one of the most innovating app that has rendered itself to be the most annoying at the same time. While it is great to have security features but when the security is too rigid, it becomes absolute nightmare to undo whatever mistakes you have made. If you do encounter a problem and wanted the developers to help you... Please talk to a brick wall, at least you can hear your own echo.

My experience as someone who first started using such an application was to say the least, not great. I get that you have good reasons to want this "QR code" verification, but it's really a pain to have to find someone with WeChat installed to do so. Where I live, the numbers are low, and perhaps will stay low because of this rather annoying feature. The second time I tried to register my account, I was met with a blank screen for ages and I had to reinstall the app, all this on an S9+. Please.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! This is the WORST messaging app ever. It doesn't work as a true app. It keeps taking you to web pages. It detected multiple log in attempts on my device, so locked me out. I only ever logged in the once when I created the account. I think there's also a lot of surveillance. It's full of bugs. All other such apps just work perfectly. Why is this so bad?
developer_response:
Dear Customer,
We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Kindly share your concern along with the error screenshot and your current WeChat ID or mobile number at https://w.url.cn/s/A7TJskX for further assistance.

review_description: Suddenly kicked me out of my account due to an unauthorized add on. I didn't add any add on. Why is there always an issue with this app?

Terrible software but I am forced to use so I can stay in touch with family and friends. It takes up more space as you use it. UI has a left-right split that cannot be disabled, with contacts on the left and conversation on the right, which makes it unusable in portrait mode.
Ah shiibahk. It's a very irritating app. So many security steps needing to be fulfilled while making an acc and can't even log in via phone no and asking for this that
WeChat is one of popular chatting app in play store and apple appstore. The one thing is WeChat always make lot of chache trash data. So it's really ruin the phone storage.
Waste a lot of storage. 1.7GB? Terrible app. Would not have installed if not to keep in touch with family in China.
Message Friends is a really fun app that lets you message friends using text, photo, voice, video, and location sharing. You can also create group chats with up to 500 members.

This used to be such a good app! But then, this 'WeChat Verification' came. I'm unable to play on my phone without the verification interrupting. Before, I could just press the 'x' at the top left corner to get rid of it, but very recently, the 'x' isn't coming up and now whenever it comes up, I have to EXIT the app which just makes it so annoying and when I try to text someone in WeChat, the verification pops up every 3 seconds when I'm on the app and I can't even text anyone anymore! >:(

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I'm not sure what it is, but it seems like each new update just makes this app worse and worse and more unstable. The biggest problem is I'm messaging, and I'd go to minimize it to go to a different app for example and it says no internet connection when I clearly do have internet connection so I have to force stop it every single time and notifications not showing up half the time or messages not sending, I just don't understand, just fix these issues!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app has a lot of good points, basically functions like it should. But oh my gosh I am so so sick of not being able to crop photos properly. When I select an image I want to attached and tap Edit, the cropping window is way off compared to the resulting image. I am not trying to spend longer readjusting a quick crop than having a whole conversation! Really, really hope this gets fixed in the next update, it's been left this way for ages and I'm getting so super fed up.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It's definitely convenient and helps when you've lived all over the world. Right now I have an annoying bug though. My galaxy watch causes it to only list the most recent message received(even when my watch is off). The temp fix is turn off notifications for messenger on the watch (even if the watch app isn't installed). If that could be fixed that would be great. And I used to be able to see photos in my message previews from the notification drop down. If I could have that back it'd be great.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: For some reason messenger all of a sudden does not want to send pictures/videos. I have to send the same picture/video numerous times. I literally spent an entire day trying to get one single damn picture to go through!!!! I thought maybe the app was just having a bad day. But nope! This seems to be an ongoing issue that's getting worse. Because now messages that I send do not want to go through. And I've done all the norma diy fixes. Shut off phone, uninstall app. Ext. Nothing has worked.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app is garbage. For three days, I've had to uninstall and reinstall just to be be bale to send pictures and GIFs. When I'm reading a message, if someone else messages, it opens up the new message automatically, which ruins if I'm trying to do a voice message recording. Wometimes I don't want to read a message right away. It also will no longer show messages on my lock screen. The only options it gives is to hide messages or not show notifications at all. I have to unlock my phone to see.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Really bad and sinking. That's all I have to say. I used to get notifications for messages, reminders, calls used to be great but decreased in quality and disconnect more often. Now I don't get any notifications for anything and have to check the app every five minutes. And even then, I have to reload 3 times before it works and i get messages thru to me. Notifications are on and always have been. It just seems with every update it gets worse and worse and worse. This app is officially dead.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Can't tell which messages are unread. They updated the app, and now I can't tell which messages are new/unread. Before, the unread messages were in bold lettering to let you know that you have not read the message yet... I get 10 messages almost daily, so it is very easy for an unread message to get lost and go to the bottom. I wish they would update it back to the bold lettering.. it would make it so much easier to find unread messages.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I have always loved messenger. But I'm thinking about getting rid of it. Over the last several wks it has not been sending messages. I will type out a message, short/real long, I click the send button...it pops up in the thread, then it immediately disappears. I've unfortunately gotten used to it so I pay attention and make sure the message stays sent before I back out. I noticed earlier that the app needed an update. So I updated it thinking that was the issue. But no it just happened again.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: 1. If the receiver/sender has bad internet, image sent time will be a mess and not show up consistently across devices in the conversation, causing headaches. 2. There are times I typed a message, had abandon to check other apps. When I come back, the draft is gone. So normally I retype it and send. But then 5 hours later when I'm in a new conversation, the draft will come back and won't go away.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I don't like that Facebook Messenger removed my option to customize my resolution settings and that it throttles down my resolution as it sees fit. And for the last month it has been crashing on me a lot, especially, while viewing videos that people send in chats. But sometimes the crash is even when just scrolling down the list of conversations.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Theres no more notifications. No matter how i reset the notifications setting. There is just no notification. I have to open the app to see if i got new messages all the time. And the new unread messages are not bold anymore. It is frustrating that the notification does not work. Please fix that. I am 100% is not my phone or connection because all my otbers app works as they are supposed to be.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Every time I close the app or a chat head I get a touch delay, meaning I can't perform any touch input for a solid 3 seconds. This sounds minor, except it happens 50+ times a day. Apr 15 2023 Edit to add: this issue still persists to this day. It appears with the error message "Messenger is not optimized for the latest version of Android. Screen touches may be delayed or not recognized."

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I got a new phone a few months ago and redownloaded messenger but I found out that the phone I have used Bubbles instead of Chat Heads which are one the of the biggest downgrades I have seen in texting. You can't switch between the two, you are forced to use Bubbles and not only do you have to go into the app to text someone else, (making the bubbles pointless anyway) you barely get notified when getting a message. At the very least give us the option to switch between the two.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app used to be amazing until a few days ago after it automatically updated. I no longer receive notifications. I've missed numerous messages because of this. I've restarted my phone a few times, checked to make sure all notifications are turned on in settings and of course they are. None of this has helped fix the problem. Very frustrating and ridiculous. I would like this issue to be resolved quickly.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It's alright. Fairly easy to keep in touch with people. Except on literally every device I own and have messenger on I get no notifications, no text bubble, nothing. Tried removing and redownloading the app, fiddling around with settings. Nothing works. It's the only way I have contact with some friends and family and it's barely doing the job at this point.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: For the last month it's been awful. There's a 5-10 second lag in everything about it. The keyboard completely disappears in the middle of writing something. The letters swap from small to large in the middle of typing. Copy and paste keeps popping up for no reason. This all started after an update. A short message takes awhile to type because of all the glitches. Please fix this.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Sound quality on video or audio calls is so bad. It cuts out the other person if I have any type of background noise. No other app does that and I have found no settings to fix this. It's awful! The visual quality of the video is pretty poor too, along with the way your video screen is laid out. The zoom function doesn't work properly overall this app is not working well. I don't even have a facebook anymore, I might just delete this app too and move to another app I have

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Easy to use, being able to video chat is awesome.. But, Stop asking to sync my contacts! Every single time I open my contacts it wants to sync, NO! Also, I just did the recent update and now every time I get a new message a little thing pops accross most of my screen, something like "new message click here to see" Just because someone sent me a msg doesn't mean I need to stop everything else on my phone!!! The little numbers on the bubble was perfect, pretty pretty please go back to that!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Something has been up with the app recently, it's not wanting to work or load properly, when someone sends me voice clips, it will show a message saying "sent a voicemail" but it wont let me play it! It's annoying and I have to end up asking the person to send it again. Also messages have not been wanting to send through properly, it all started after it's recent update, please fix this.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Absolutely the worst message app of all. Videos shared from Facebook only workaybe 50% otherwise you just see a spinning circle on a black screen. There is no other way of seeing the video bc you don't even get to see the url. Then sometimes when a video does come up it is not the correct one that was shared by someone else. I'm going to start telling all to just send me a link in another app or something bc this is just annoying.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: When drafting a message and switching apps to look up something, when I return to FB messenger, the draft message is gone. Pretty annoying. Draft messages are only saved when chat heads are enabled. Also, when selecting a different font than default, it's very difficult to see which threads are unread - the difference in look is very subtle.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Needs option to disable quick reaction. In any communication app, there needs to be controls in place to stop inadvertent signal/messages/etc. Quick reactions and the tendency for the app to just go ahead and do a "quick reaction" is the opposite of what a good communication app should do. I do not want a quick reaction every time I click anywhere on the screen even if I'm not even trying to click in the messenger app window at all. This is miscommunication. Total fail.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: When a call comes through messenger, there is no notification or screen that pop ups to show a call is coming through. The only way to know is if you hear the ring tone. Share screen videos randomly restarts videos from the very beginning while viewers are in the middle of watching. Sound Quality is still too low even with high quality headsets. Connection has improved, and history calls can once again be deleted.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Started yesterday, but it will NOT notify me when anyone messages me. I've tried every little thing I could possibly do and it doesn't notify me. No sound or anything. It's getting very annoying since it's one of my main ways to communicate. I deleted and re downloaded the app, restarted my phone, went through settings everywhere, the do not disturb...everything. Hope it gets resolved soon.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Don't even receive notifications for messages half the time, you can imagine how frustrating and upsetting that can be not just to me but to the people sending me messages. Now I try to reply to a message in the notification bar, hit send, and it doesn't send. I've wasted meaningful time and energy on messages that I can't recover. Uninstalled. Moving to email and text.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app is becoming worse and worse with every version. I used to regularly restart the app because the UI bugged, or the app wouldn't load new messages. I don't know how, but it's gotten worse and restarting it doesn't fix it. No notifications at all, searching for an element doesn't work and if it works makes the app not load anything, watching a video fills the app with graphic artifacts, and so on.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Well if it isn't clear by the flood of recent reviews I don't know what is. The recent update sucks balls. They need to fix it asap! No notifications and now it's force exiting the app when I'm in the middle of messaging. For a long time, video chat hasn't been notifying properly (sound of ringing but no way to answer and no visual indicator). And based on what I've seen, the apple version works fine, so this is android app specific. Figure it out facebook!!!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I still can't get notifications to work. It worked fine until a day or so ago, but now I get no chime, no chat head, no banner or lock screen notifications. The notification setting for the app and in my phone settings is on. I uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared the cache, restarted my device several times. Followed 6 online fix guides. Between this and the call interruption or just failure to connect, or just dropping audio randomly, it's not worth it.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: My messages are disappearing almost immediately. I just sent a message and it disappeared, I backed out and in my list of messages it's showed the conversation but when I clicked on it there was nothing there. I also can't look at any past messages right now. This app keeps malfunctioning more then it works. I've been using other apps because this one's gotten so unreliable.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I can't play videos from my friends, the app crashes at least twice a day and I have to fully reset my phone to even use it, there are no longer previews when I share links, everything is completely inconsistent and buggy. again, you manage to only make the app worse with every passing day. *update* still sucks and crashes at least once a day. previews show up finally.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Not a bad app, but the fact that it won't properly work unless data and battery restrictions are turned off, is a little bit annoying. I've also had problems when using the app while connected to WiFi. It's a shame when you have to use an app because everyone you know is using it but the app developer wants to take as much information from your device as they can.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I use this app to stay connected with my grandmother. We video call each other, for that it works well, everything else has been terrible. People message me and I'm not able to reply. I have plenty of storage and memory and I'm not blocked or blocking, however my responses to messages never go through. I've checked all the setting and storage. Nothing has helped.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This company has clearly become another one of many that seems to find the need to constantly change things for "freshness" irresistible despite starting to have difficulties keeping up with the constant bugs and glitches that come with them. Can't even have a messaging app that let's me see messages as soon as they're sent anymore because the common sense of "you don't break something if you don't fiddle with it" is apparently not common anymore.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Having numerous issues with the app since I switched to a Samsung Galaxy S22, the 2 most important (to me): -Incoming calls will cause my phone to vibrate, but I won't know where it's coming from until I get a notification I missed a call. -If I attempt to send a voice message when opening a chat bubble, no audio records. The full app has to be open in the background for it to record audio (possible permissions issue accessing mic? I don't send video messages, so not sure if this is same)

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Recently, the app hasn't been sending me notifications. I'll get a message and an hour later open the app, THEN get the notification, which is pointless. It also doesn't let me make video calls or view pictures in the app. I've tried reinstalling it, checked settings, looked for updates, etc with no fix. Very inconvenient.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The last update has caused some problems. Whenever you get a new message and click on it it just takes you to your entire list of messages and doesn't actually tell you which one is the new message. And it's not always at the top. I also can't mark threads "unread" anymore to go back and review later. Also having trouble searching previous messages. Samsung Galaxy S22.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I don't know if this is a phone issue or an app issue, but from connecting with my family, who uses an iPhone, and I use android, it makes it very difficult to use. The photo sharing doesn't work. The FaceTime feature barely connects to a stable wifi network. Please look into the issues with the app.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: If you want problems, then this is the app for you! Not only do you get a notification from the Facebook app, about a post you've been tagged in, you get another notification from messenger about the same thing! (Can't turn it off either) Now here's the kicker, it'll say you have unread messages, and after re-installing the app, these "unread" messages are ones that you'd have sent to someone as a reply. Help, support, and bug reporting produced no results at all, wack.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Buggyyy. The info button doesn't even work so I can't search convos specifically for media anymore. When I get a message alert and tap the notification, the app won't open. Speech to text takes forever to initiate, if it even works. Video bugs the entire screen when played. Taking a forward facing photo from the app is impossible over half the time, I have to switch from forward to selfie mode and back to actually get the camera to work. Can't send photos. Message notifications not synced üëéüèª

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Switching accounts causes it to flicker and flip forcing me to Uninstall / reinstall. This seems to happen when clicking a notification of a message on the page, when I am logged in my personal Messenger. The above problem was fixed in a later version. I'm glad, but now sometimes it will not display certain Messenger messages on Android. The text shows up in search, but they display as blank messages when clicked.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Constantly de-syncs groupchats to show nicknames that aren't there anymore, incorrect profile pics, and double notifications from the main Facebook app. There's also an ongoing problem where if you attempt to save an image someone has sent, Messenger will save it as a .webp image file, and then treat it as a corrupted .gif file and be unable to send it to other chats. This problem has been constant for over 8 months.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Bad app design and coding. It doesn't save my preferences like it has in the past. I need to have dark mode on because bright lights bother me and it keeps resetting almost every time I open the app. Facebook is obsolete at this point in time, and it's only a matter of time before they bring down their other apps (Instagram and Messenger) however, it looks as though it's already began. Facebook sucks.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: App doesn't notify me of messages until hours after they're sent, it is laggy when typing and slow to send messages even on a great wifi or cellular connection. Gmail or email as a whole is much faster, more efficient, and better. Sure, having messenger on your phone is sort of like texting and is supposed to be "instant" messaging, but when notifications come in 6 hours after a message is sent, you might as well use email! Despite functioning, the design is clean and sleek, the only good thing.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: For some stupid reason, photos won't send. My connection is great but they just won't send. It tells me "message could not be sent." I'm also not receiving calls from my friends even though both theirs and my audio is on. Messanger freezes. Speaker doesn't work even though you press it. Messanger has a lot of problems that ruin the experience and seriously need to be fixed. Messanger sucks and I'm not using it again until these issues get fixed. Probably won't cause they don't care.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Doesn't work anymore. Everytime someone sends me a video I click on it and some other videos open up and won't let me watch the one that was sent to me. It doesn't notify me half the time anymore that I got a message. My cousin tried to video call me like many times before and that doesn't even work anymore either. What ever they did to this app made it completely useless and complete garbage.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: My chay bubbles would multiple when I would move them around. Also I am not able to close the chat bubble. While in a video call I have no control. So I would have to turn off the screen. Then wake it up while still in call to regain control. While trying to do video calls. I wouldn't be able to see the person I am calling. But they can see me. So we found that restarting the phone works. But that is a hassle when you rely on video calls all day.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app is trash. Apparently the managers have abandoned the app. I can no longer send myself videos from what I see on my newsfeed. It says that the message cannot be sent and there is no reason for it. 10 different videos (not inappropriate) I have tried, will not appear when I sent through messenger. Notification sounds will not sound off that I received messages. This is nonsense.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I used to love this app but after the last update, I am no longer getting notified that I have any messages. I have to open the app and then I get a bunch of messages from people who have sent me stuff earlier all at once. I have uninstalled it, re-installed it, shut my phone off, went through my notifications, and checked to see if everything was on that needed to be on and it is...so frustrating! Both my parents and I have an android phone, so android get your a$$ together and fix this!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Buggy, and redundant. Chat bubbles will make your screen freeze, and sound quality is poor. Pictures and videos need to be sent multiple times far too often, due to them not showing up the first, second, or even third time. I'm uninstalling after years of using it. It's just not worth having.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It'd be great if the chat head would stop disappearing every time I open any other app. Not sure if it's the latest update or my phone but it randomly disappears when I'm using other apps. Update 3/25/23 Since the latest update on my phone, my messenger doesn't want to work at all. I literally cannot send a message or edit a message unless I close it out completely after typing the message and then bringing it back up. I don't know why it stops working with every update.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Crashes frequently, even while typing! And the draft that I was working on since a while, dissapeares... There is NO way to recover it! TERRIBLE app! Not to mention that, they make it very complicated to see a list of ONLY THE UNREAD messages on phone. You need to use browser, desktop version, click here, click there, just to figure out then that, the list is far from whole, so you have to go back in the app and scroll manually all the way through to see the unread ones... Ridiculous.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I no longer get message notifications. I have done everything possible from in the app and on my phone. I made sure power saver is off most of the time. I have deleted and reinstalled. Nothing has fixed it. And it now glitches if I watch a video that someone has sent me and I have to close the app completely.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Simple to use. Not complicated. Pretty much turn on and off. Auto. Save your password doesn't have to be linked to the direct email The only reason why I put not sure for the if you have to sign in or out of it because if you're already logged into your logged into it, no you don't have to keep signing in and out. But if you if you don't have it saved like that then yeah you have to sign anything out. So just saying no

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I used to love the Messenger app but for some reason, the ringtone has never been updated. My calls would randomly drop and I would hear noise when in a call that will only disappear if you hang up and re-call the person you were talking with. Also, whenever I answer a call in one device, the other device will keep on ringing!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Messenger is still absolute trash. If I can give it 0 stars, I would. No one is receiving any messages. Now the picture button is gone during video chat. The camera is always showing the wrong picture. Video chat is trash when it comes to navigating between Bluetooth and speaker phone. Now I can't make my video chat window smaller when I'm trying to multitask on my phone

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I like Facebook Messenger and the ability to keep in touch with friends but would like the messages to be end-to-end encrypted as with What's App. However, I dont want to give those planning illegal and subversivr sctivities against the country to have a place to connect I wish it was easier to prevent total strangers, often from other countries, from being able to call me on messenger without my permission. Its an invasion of my privacy. I want to be able to screen my incoming calls.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app WAS working real good. Now, as of lately, when I go to click on a contacts name that I've recently conversated with in Messenger, it does nothing. I can click and click, nothing happens. I have updated the app and cleared the cache numerous times. Nothing helps. My "stories" get deleted right after I post them! They are supposed to stay up for 24 hours after posting! They don't get saved to my archive, even though I have "save to archive" selected! Do something about this!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I've used this app for years and it used to be good. Not now. It used to give me a notification every time I got a message or reaction. Now, it's random whether it gives me a notification or not. I've checked my settings and it's set for notifications. A lot of times I don't know that I've received a message until I open Facebook and see it on there or get an email hours later saying I've received a message. I haven't had any problems sending or receiving messages, but notifications need fixed.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Facebook Watch videos send me straight to Facebook Watch feed. Can't view Facebook Watch videos sent to me anymore. :( Instagram reels, YouTube, etc.. Those are working. Also having the issue with late notifications, which seems to be a common problem at the moment. App is up to date, phone is up to date, phone has been restarted, WiFi is fine and have also used other WiFi connections. Nothing is working. Been using this app for over a decade. Please fix.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Messenger used to be my go-to to get ahold or friends and family, because I could see if they are online. Now ALL my contacts/friends seem to ALWAYS be online, even though they're not. When I restart the app, it will show when they were last online again, and then a few minutes later they all show up online again. It's really frustrating how many MORE issues seem to pop up every time an update is installed.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This used to be a very good app...key words: USED TO BE!! NOT ANYMORE!! I've been having issues with this app for months, so has my husband and many other people I know. The calls constantly drop WHILE in wifi but the most annoying thing that's been happening is I never get any notifications that I have messages.. even from ppl who are set as a priority. My app has been updated, I've uninstalled-reinstalled, and all my settings are how they should be, AND IT STILL DOESN'T WORK!! FIX IT PLEASE!!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Text dissappears after choosing to send a picture, so I had to retype the text I already entered. SMS app doesn't do this, so glad I don't use this for text messaging. Unfortunately, the commands are laid out similar to SMS with the photo and image icons besides the text box, giving the impression that those will be sent with the text, not in replacement of the text.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Everything was working great until the couple of days ago. I am missing messages. If I am on Facebook and I try to send a message it will skip right past it. It shows an update screen to know the automatically goes to Google play where it says open. It's already open I'm using it. Anyone out there and never neverland that configured us out.. I have seen multiple reviews that say the same thing. Why is no one looking into this?

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: They just keep making the app worse. With the latest update I don't a notification when i have a ne message. Even when i open the app to check new notifications don't show in bold anymore, i have to go to each person to see if the message is new. Some things are friends inviting to go to things and we miss it because stupid fb messenger isn't sending us a notification like it's supposed too. I'm not the only one, most my friends say they are having the same problem!!!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Video calls are incrediblely low quality, the connection is always unstable no matter how good my connection is on any device and the whole app feels clunky and on top of everything notifications have not worked for messages I've received for over a year. Even reinstalling it does nothing. I don't want the stupid story function as it doesn't bring anyone together. It's gross and unsocial. You can reply to a video but legit the only person who can even see it is the story owner. It's garbage

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app will not load a call most of the time, and I have fast internet. It also will completely crash when I'm in a call and I try and open another chat. The app will also fade in and out of connection when on a call. Sometimes I don't receive notifications from someone until maybe a whole day after, and that is with constant use of the app. I am locked into using this app because of work and family. I can't get away from it. Plz fix it.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Whatever they changed, has screwed it up completely!! I'm getting sooo many notifications on messenger that I've never had, now! I've turned EVERYTHING OFF and I'm still getting them! SOO ANNOYING... and yes, I know how to turn off EVERY notification across all my accounts. It's the app. Video calls are now buffering so bad I have to go to another app just to hear a complete sentence from someone. It's NOTHING like it was. Change it back and I'll start using it again üòî

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: They have changed a lot of features and turned a great messaging app into a useless junk app. It is so broken now that my new messages notifications are intermittent, sometimes my phone will ding other times I have to go to the app before I see that I received a new message. That makes it hard to keep a conversation going especially with marketplace because they decided to hide market place messages in their own little folder.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Stopped receiving notifications. Thought it was something on my end so I removed and reinstalled the app and nope still nothing and now it won't connect to my watch and *on my phone* it tells me that my phone doesn't support the version of messenger that I have every once in a while and it's literally the same thing as it was before. So not sure but y'all need to fix this issue.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Can't open messages now on existing conversations and was in the middle of a marketplace transaction for a rare item. Just like everyone else having issues lately, it's going downhill. Can't even video chat with my kids for more than a few seconds before the audio switches to a pulsing feedback sound and can't hear anything else.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: When there's updates, it doesn't send the messages. Even if you update it it still doesn't send. You need to re-install the app before being able to use it again. And to be honest is a waste of time for me. Ever since the meta has come out, it's been full of bugs. If you play a video, you can backread or scroll through the messages. Ypu can't view stories properly. The search bar doesn't work properly. Then your messenger would randomly be disabled for an hour and i dont even know the reason why

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Used to work okay... Updated phones and now I cannot customize individual chat sounds, just the main app notifications. Can edit and change but it won't play the selected sound for each person like it did before. This was a very helpful feature and I am thoroughly confused as to why it's not functioning even though the settings are available. I have messaged dev. Three times and send bug reports with no answers. Very disappointing üòû

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Press and hold to send audio message sucks so bad. I loved being able to just press it and get ready for work or wash dishes or whatever while sending audio to my friends. Now you have to just stand there and hold the button down in order for it to record audio. It was much better when it was hands free. Now it's just useless and inconvenient. On top of that, it also has a 1 minute limit now which is also extremely annoying.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Overall, it's a good messaging app. Running smooth too, except for when I play videos. The app lags when I do so and all I could see is a black screen. Also, please allow users to disable message delivery receipts because users are obliged to respond quickly when messages are seen as Delivered. Enable pinning of conversations too. Thanks!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Please work on a fix. The messenger app is infuriating! The app has been broken for years. Almost EVERY time I switch from my personal messages to my page messages and the app just doesn't load anything. I've restarted my phone, cleared cache and data, logged out, but the only fix every time is to reinstall the app. Also occasionally when I send replies to clients after a few seconds the message disappears for me and they don't receive anything. I know many people who have experienced the same.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: What happened to the updated messenger? it sucks honestly. I am unable to view the previous images, documents, and media in all my group chats, even in the private messages. Only the most current ones are visible. ALSO the picture that was sent to me isn't even viewable because it's so blurry. I was able to see it if I am going to save it on my albums. Check it immediately. Thank you.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Awful. The dang app breaks in half of what you do. You can't watch videos if someone looks at chat, messages don't even fully deliver half the time. (Not a connection issue.) Not to mention how much of a downgrade the chat bubble system is compared to the previous one. Revert it! Edit: (4/11/2023) Seriously? Can't even open links anymore. You tap on one and *crickets* Nothing happens.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: There are problems with the app very often-it is crashing or showiing notification for a message later than they are sent. Additionally, there is another ongoing issue where I do not get banners or notifications for messages. I have to open the app to see if someone has texted me. I tought this was a one day crash but it is lasting already 2 weeks and was not fixed even after updating/re installing the app.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Notifications!! No matter what I do, I never get notifications for messages! The messages don't come through until I go on the app. I've uninstalled the app and re installed it. All tabs that should be on are on, and still nothing. It's very frustrating. This has been going on for several months now and only does it on this phone (Samsung s21) which is all up to date.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app has serious notification issues! A lot of the time notifications won't come through or it won't even play the notification sound. Another issue is that if I set a specific notification sound for a particular person it won't play that one if the notification sound decides to work it'll play the standard one set in the app instead. Other apps have no issues with notifications. Meta need to fix this ASAP.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: They keep adding stupid colors or themes every other update but the issue of being unable to search for old messages and scroll a bit higher is still there. Photos or attachments don't show up. Notification takes minutes to hours. Quality of photo or video is horrible. Take care of the bugs before adding anything else superficial. Edit: I tried sending a photo but it didn't register as sent so now I can't send any photos at all.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: 1. Still unable to play or send an HD video (that was captured from your phone). 2. When playing a video, and someone (on a group chat) sees it, the video will be closed. 3. After playing a video, I'm unable to scroll up or down to check other messages/ or play a different video it just freezes. Surprising these issues even exists as there is an update literally every week. Not to mention the app consumes more than 1GB of storage.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: - The customized sounds doesn't stick if you close the app, it'll go back to it's default sound which is really annoying. - for some reason chatheads became square and harder to operate. - the sticker issue i had before is still there, where i downloaded stickers, but they don't have a 'representative' in my stickers tab. There's just blank boxes and i need to tap each one to know what stickers are in each before i could use it.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Buggy af. The way this app doesn't open photos properly or allow me to crop them accurately, while also disrupting apps I have in split screen if I leave the keyboard open in the chat bubble when I close the bubble itself, down to a whole collection of emojis suddenly disappearing and becoming unavailable... For a world-class app, it's all over the place.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This is a good app yes, but before the update. This update is probably the worst because: first, your messages dont send the moment you tap "send", second, in the chat head the previous messages pops up even tho you already saw it and doesn't show the recent one, third, it doesn't put you to the pinned message whenever you tap one of the pinned messages, it just get stuck in a black screen and bugs. Fix this please.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Edit: now it's been blocked for a week (stops loading at the start screen) I have sent several reports but no fix. Rebooting phone and cleaning cache don't work. Review: The app has trouble connecting to the internet, I had to reboot my phone several times to bypass this issue. Messages received don't show up unless you restart the phone! So you can go a whole day without knowing that someone has messaged you!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The end call button is at the top of the app. Which i find difficult to end a call using 1 hand. Messaging is okay and quick. Saying that connecting a call takes a long time is an understatement. I can no longer make use of the app to make calls. Im using viber for calls nowadays. Update: end call Button has been moved to the bottom of the screen. Connectivity is still in and out with 85% reliability.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Bring back the "ignore message" it's better than restrict, for a lot of reasons. Also whenever sending photos or videos, the quality is low :( hope you can do something about it. The app is really cool, it's free and have a lot of nice features but it's laggy. It loads too long even if you have good internet connection. Another issue with this app is it takes SO LONG before you log in. It's a really smart way to connect with your friends. That's it thankyou!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I used this app for the past 5 years but it has never been so "unusable" until now.. Picture-in-picture is barely working and even if it is, it is just blocking the touch (literally no touch). To end a call, I have to tell the person I am talking with to end it as when I press the end button nothing happenes. About the messages themselves, they send when they want, no matter if you have a connection or not. The videos don't have a preview anymore, you must click on them to view them. Etc...

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: A decaying app! Lately when trying to send voice messages and it shows that it has been sent, it looks as though the message was 0 seconds but if i click on it, it plays the whole thing but makes me confused about if the receiver can hear the message or not. Also it seems as though I don't always get message notifications for some reason. And now that I try to search in conversations, it doesn't work!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: this one has great potential. But with every upcoming update it gets worse. My app crashes all the time. My screen intends to freeze, I can't open the chats neither send messages without bugs. I have to reset the app, sometimes my phone. It goes on for months already. I tried re-installing but nothing worked. When I manage to send my messages without the app crashing in the process, they don't get delivered even though my connection is great. It drains my battery like crazy.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This has been a very helpful and convenient app amidst the bugs and all. I'm glad that the developers always continue working on it to improve it many ways. However, I still recommend a scheduled sending option so we could send messages on a specific time for specific occasions and a pin feature to highlight important messages. Edit: A lot of bugs lately.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The bubble is frustrating for two reasons. 1. The right edge of the pop up window is not at the edge of the screen, there's a gap. It's reflexive to tap near the screen edge to send a message, but with this gap, one ends up tapping next to the window and closing the pop-up without sending. 2. One can't use the pop up to get to other messages that aren't super recent. One has to close the pop-up and go to the actual app. I'm revoking picture in picture permission due to these.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I've used this app for the longest time since this is the main communication app in my country. I would give it a higher rating only if you can fix the issue where: Sometimes when someone send you a message or photo or file, you can't see what that is at all. It just a blank space that you can't see. And additionally, whenever I play voice message, my screen starts to black out.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The update is getting worser! Or I'd rather say that theres no changes when it comes to update. The bugs are the worse. It suddenly closes the app and when i try to open it, it kept closing so i have to clear the data or download it again. Also, when i play videos and someone seens, it bugs like the video stops and when i tried to play it, I cant tap anything because it looks like im viewing the video but I'm not. When i listen to voiceclips, my phone turns off every time i tried to listen.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Messenger has always been my main app for communicating with my friends and fam. And now I have been experiencing a problem with it. I updated the app into the latest version and my experience with the new version is not that nice unlike the previous ones. I cannot send pictures even though my internet connection is stable and it became laggy. My replies became super slow to send and it's annoying me. I just hope for a better experience. That's it.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Cannot get the app to open. Have tried every fix including restarting the device, uninstalling and reinstalling, WiFi and cellular data, making sure everything is updated, restarting again. Tried to report to Facebook through the website, but it tells me to report it through the app by shaking the device. Tried that too, but I just get a black screen. Was hoping it would get fixed, but has been a few weeks now and still can't get past a loading screen.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I'm also experiencing the same issue as other reviewers. App would ring when someone tries to call me but I don't know who it is as there's no display and no option to answer it. I don't even know who is calling. I would only know who it is after it ends ringing when it shows a missed call or until after the caller would ask why I'm not picking up. All notifications are on. Tried everything, force stop, clear data & cache, reinstall & restarted but it doesn't fix the issue.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This is written 2 years ago: Crashes more often than not. This last update made it near impossible to open 2 chat bubbles at the same time. This is a brand new phone, so the chance of it being on my end is slim to none. Update: The app still doesn't work as intended, but now, it has gotten worse somehow. Now, it doesn't show notifications for just this app. All other apps work, just this pathetic excuse for an app. Hilarious how a huge company like Meta can't make a product worth a damn.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Two things are really annoying. (1) Calls often abort before the other guy had a chance to pick up. Even if a connection is established, the audio is often missing. Since I don't know sign language the bandwidth is wasted. Without counting I'd say, 9 out of 10 attempts fail one way or the other. (2) There is no way I could find to backup the chats. Neither the non-private nor the encrypted chats can be exported to be saved elsewhere. IMO that disqualifies this app from serious work. Need fix soo

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It always crashes, you can't send pictures, you can't send a voice message, and I have installed and uninstalled this app multiple times, yet it continues to crash. I clear my phone in case it has a virus, none. I tried doing everything but it always crashes, and I mean everyday.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I'm close to give up and switch to Whatsapp. The last few months have been terrible. My phone is up to date, the app is just not keeping up. The chat bubbles are laggy and piling up, and they've recently started to duplicate (we're talking 5 bubbles piling up on top of each other). My voice messages show "0:00", despite my correspondants being able to play them fine. I can't record from bubbles. I have zero notifications. Thank god messenger's free. Please fix your app.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It took hours for my colleague to receive the messages I sent even though both of us are currently connected to the internet. Also, after exiting the app and going back in, there is a consistent bug where the user can't open different threads and/or contacts. You have to close the main app via home screen, open it again, before being able to access different message threads and/or contacts.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: If I could give it 0 stars I would. It's supposed to be a messaging app and it doesn't bring the notifications for messages and calls 9/10 times (even though all the permissions are granted to run in the background, pop up over other apps etc). I have to keep manually opening the app to see if someone has sent me something. And I'm not even going to go in details about how the specific phone model I have has ugly square messaging bubbles. Just awful, there are so many way better messaging apps.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This is the most frustating messaging app that I've ever downloaded and it is because of the updates. Imagine updating the app every month yet the app still has issues like when I send photos it takes hours to send, it's just 1 photo and kb in size yet the app takes hours to send it just to come as an extra pixelated photo. It is the same also when you send videos, though I know videos are large in size, to take too long to send is unforgiving just to come as a 144p quality and only see pixels!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It works. Mostly. The app can slow to a crawl and crash if there are images in the chat, notifications are inconsistent (sometimes won't send char notifications for hours upon hours, will send notifications for messages you've already seen), profile pictures are inconsistent and sometimes show ones from several months back.. yes there are many many glaring annoyances and critical issues with this app. It may be ad-free and free but there are better, more stable ones out there.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: App has gotten worse, for the past month I don't get any notifications of incoming video or chat calls, I don't even get notifications for messages either. They all just randomly stopped. This needs to be fixed. All my settings are fine too with thr phone and within the app. Hopefully you fix this bug soon! As I am not the only one with these issues.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Recently my messages rake upwards of 5 minutes to send. And I need the app open for them to send. Glitch where I have multiple chatheads for the same chat. Notification issue. I won't be given any and need to check the app regularly to see if I had a message. I tried unintsalling and reinstalling. No improvement. Not sure how to continue.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Its so buggy. I have to reinstall it at minimum once a month. I've reinstalled it 3 times this week. It also consistently messes up other apps and phone functions. The good news is most problems seem to be fixed for a bit after a reinstall, and occasionally just clearing the cache is enough. So if you're having problems (and if you arent, you will) just reinstall üòÅ

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Some of the features aren't working. Pictures are not delievered, it just says "sent a photo". Other than that the themes that depend on what time of the day you're in, aren't working as well. Playing videos would make the app unusable, and you have to re-open the app just to make it work again. It's frustrating how many users there are, and yet these basic features aren't working.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Just when I thought clearing data and clearing cache would work to my advantage, by giving me more room in my storage to download more apps, I decided to clear data/cache on this app also. Now, when I message someone, no messenger sound, neither does the preview message show on the Lock Screen. I've even tried Force Stop, restarting the app, allowing notifications, allowing all permissions. No desired effect.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: It's good for talking to your contacts, but the message notifications are very inconsistent, like sometimes I'll get notifications but other times I won't. I haven't done anything to set this off, it just happens and it's completely random. I haven't blocked or muted any notifications, this just happens, and it's happened for a while, try and fix it.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I use the App often to communicate with friends and family, more than text messaging. But now, for some reason, there is no clear indication between open and unopened messages. I get a notification to say I've received a message, but when I look at my conversation list, nothing is in bold like previously to clearly see any unread messages. This is going to cause issues, please fix this.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I don't know if it's my phone or the app. I read the messages before I can even get notifications which is weird. There are so many times that I open the message and yet it's blank that even the old messages are not there. Sometimes,I get a notification and when I try to open it, I can't scroll for new messages. Instead,I see old conversations not the new one. Even if I restart my phone ir uninstall and install it back, it doesn't help.please fix these issues and more

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Yesterday when I pressed on a message notification it didn't open in full screen size. It had not options available and nothing to close it with! The messages I sent took ages to be received and when photos were posted from others I couldn't see them, just a message saying someone had sent photos. That happened again overnight. Please revert to pre "update" and don't try fixing what isn't broken, just maintain the way it used to function because its been great. Video-call is much used. Thank you

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The video calls are very frustrating to use, always lagging or pixilated, glitchy, even when i am in great rage of wifi. It's been getting worse every month. And just today I can't seem to upload photos or gifs. It will just be a blank space in chat unsent, and noone can see it later. Whatever wifi i use has been fine with everything else so why is this happening all of the sudden? Please fix this

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The fact that a huge company like Facebook/Meta or whatever they want to call themselves can't even do a texting app as reliable as Discord for example is pathetic. Don't get me wrong, the app is good but with the amount of bugs, pictures not being sent, messages not delivering and all other sorts of problems I have to say that I use it only because it's the only free easy way to contact my family. If they had other apps, I would not use this one.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Good overall but have been experiencing issues with videos for months. Instead, it completely reverts to my FB Newsfeed resulting in having to reopen messenger, searching for the chat head, and attempting to find where I left off vs. reverting back to the last read message as it used to. Please fix.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Overall, it's a good messaging app. Running smooth too, except for when I play videos. The app lags when I do so and all I could see is a black screen. Also, please allow users to disable message delivery receipts because users are obliged to respond quickly when messages are seen as Delivered. Enable pinning of conversations too. Thanks!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I keep having problems with notification. Chat Floating notification does not come . When I talk on a video call, the SMS does not appear on the phone screen or there is no notification. I don't understand if someone sends sms. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Updated once again! Latest update is even more Riddled with Bugs Every Message I send is stuck on sent status. Reactions to messages do not show. Online status being shown incorrectly or even disappears as in it's like the function is not even on. My attempts of calling"video calling people does not log in the chat. Videos don't play or even download. Themes fail to show correctly. Worse of all messages that don't even show!!! Don't update people this app is now literally hot hot garbage üóëÔ∏è

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Chat head animation too laggy, sent video and image quality too low quality and notification doesn't always work. The app just refuses to work on background now.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I really love using it and actually prefer it over regular messaging but lately the bubble function hasn't been working and it's frustrating. As soon as I get a new message, or open a new app, the bubble disappears. Also if I get a new message, the bubble doesn't pop up. I'll give 5 stars if that's fixed.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Kindly bring back the ignore message? It's like a hundred more better than restrict. Also, kindly put some some indication if the message is not yet read? I kinda missed some of the messages sent to me by my colleagues and friends cause the "bold" thingy doesn't appear at all. The app used to be excellent! As the time goes by, it's getting worst.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app has become completely unuasble. It just keeps loading and loading without anything happening. I had to start accessing my messages on my PC by logging into Facebook on the web. Also, when you send a message to someone on marketplace it is nearly impossible to find that conversation thread ever again. So you end up starting multiple conversations with the same person on marketplace because you can't find your previous chat history.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The bubble wont stop glitching with the profile pictures of my friends, sometimes the bubbles show up twice for the same person but with the old and new pp and sometimes it doesnt show i have messages with the bubbles. When i open directly the app, it suddenly show all my messages from my friends and group. The app got so many glitches, it's an pain in the ¬™ss. I'm not the only one having these problems, some of my coworkers got it too

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app keeps telling me I have unopened messages but when I actually check, there are none. Its basing this on the messages I sent & not incoming ones. I open the app, check to see, answer any waiting messages, the notification disappears. But then immediately shows I have 3 unread messages when I don't. Somebody at fb is not doing their job if the app is a mess.....

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: for some weeks app doesn't show notifications when someone writes. and somehow there is bug that allows to create unlimited chat heads on screen?? also for some time app showed that someone read message even if they didn't. futhermore sending or receiving messages is also broken, because there appear blank box which doesn't dissapear until you reset app, it's impeding to read messages

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This is glitchy, just watching videos makes it unable to press anything if someone is chatting, seening, or even typing and you need to restart the app to fix it. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Quite a bloaty app that wants to do more than necessary. The decision to remove "accept" or "reject" options from message requests was short-sighted. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Didn't even feel that this app updated??? It's worse! I can't send pictures nor videos on my android phone it shows that it's still sending but never sent. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Useful, but actual garbage in terms of being a working app. For the past 6-8 months notifications on the android app don't even appear, which defeats the purpose of having the app active at all times... appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I find the pin system on Facebook Messenger frustrating. It's disappointing that there's a limit on how many messages I can pin in a conversation. It's inconvenient when I'm trying to keep track of important messages. Despite this flaw, the app still offers great features like voice and video calls, instant messaging, and group chats. The interface is user-friendly and easy to navigate. Overall, it's a useful app, but I hope they will address this issue in future updates.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Devs are focused on making useless features instead of fixing bugs. The search is broken, I can't go back to past messages despite search showing them. Sometimes I can't even scroll up back to that message. And even the updates I liked, like the word effects for the gift option which was good for hiding spoilers, were removed. Downloading images downloads them as a webp, which isn't even compatible with uploading to chats. Fix your damn app instead for once.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The active ago hours is not exact, and I cannot use this app using free mobile data. The version before lets people use this app even on free mobile data. I can't also reply to all group chats, it says the message has limit. The profile pictures of some people are not visible. There is an error in the time when they‚Äôve seen the message. Please fix this.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: So this app will notify me that I have a message I go into the message and the message isn't there so I close it then open it again and it's there. Also it will work for a day or two after I restart my phone then starts up all over again with these issues. Since I've uninstalled and reinstalled I'm still having the same issues.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: For the past few months, I'd gradually get less and less notified about incoming message. It just came to a point that unless I open the app, I would get the messages. And it's not like I have them blocked. I tried clearing the cache and data, and even restarted the device multiple times. But nothing help. Or to be precise, it was temporary solution. For few hours at best. And my software is always up to date.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Facebook has us by the short-hairs. Minus 2 stars for privacy and call quality. 3 stars for gaming and accessibility. It has helped me in numerous emergency situations. However, there needs to be an option to hide "sending" or "delivered" status to other users. I get stalked by users who watch when sending changes to delivered. Confirming I've been online even if my security is set to show offline. I could block them, or not. OR the app increase its privacy settings. Do that, get 2 more stars

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: hello guys!! the app is very nice. but i hope we can fix the "LOCATION" feature of the app. it is very helpful when monitoring your love ones. i hope we can make it accurate in real time. Most of the time it stops moving on the receiver's phone even though the sender was still in motion! thank you i hope it will be fixed on a sooner time because we are always using it üôÇ

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I've been experiencing some problems with this application. First, the call is having audio issue which results on not having any sound from the person you are calling. Once it starts to have an audio issue, it last until the end of call so you need to restart again. Third, there are also times that you cannot play the games.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: just as everyone else is saying, the option to look through past messages is completely bust. for a while, to get anywhere, i would have to scroll all the way back to the top of the block of messages that i could access when searching for a message, and do that over and over again to make more messages load. now that doesn't even work. incredibly frustrating, it feels like the whole app is just slowly deteriorating. ive used this since 2017, yet this is enough to make me look for a new app

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Since the recent changes, all Bluetooth devices now have trouble connecting. It takes about 8 attempts before a device keeps connected for 2 mins, and then it disconnects again to my fully updated S22 Ultra. It also happens to various friends and family members. The way the settings are in this app is ridiculous, and the quality of video and messages is now extremely POOR. If this isn't fixed soon, we have all decided to leave Messenger for good. Other options available without ADVERTS.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Current version is just broken. No notifications, messages receiving after few hour delay, unable to make video or audio calls. On my other phone I am unable to even start the app. Screen just go blank white or black. Tried reset, forced stop, clear cache, clear data, reinstall. Nothing works. Either fix it, or roll back to last working update...like a year ago. Also, I have contacted the developer and after one week, still no response. Great job!

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Back then, I liked Messenger because I could send videos or photos that were not blurry, but ever since I updated it, Messenger is not the same anymore. When I try to send any images, it always says loading media, and when I watch videos in this app, it freezes, and when I try to touch it, nothing happens, and sometimes the chatheads is 3, which is so weird.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: At least for me, and as far as I've seen in a few comments, this app is almost completely broken. Just to name a few: Notifications don't work, you cannot search conversations, backgrounds glitch out frequently, the app itself sometimes just blacks out and you've got to force stop it (and even then it's not a guaranteed fix). It's becoming kind of unbearable to use it, and I've been using this app ever since it was launched.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Just recently, I only get notifications and bubbles on about 1/3 of the messages I receive. I almost never get notifications for the people I marked as priority. Once again, today, I discovered 4 msgs I missed...no notification, no sound, no bubble, no nothing. If I set "show as bubble" on a msg, it pops up that day, then only randomly after that, if at all.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Notifications keep breaking. It seems like every few months they release an update which changes their notifications configuration. Where previously you could pull open a notification to see the previous X messages sent from a person, now you can only see the latest one. This means if a person sends 3 messages, you can no longer preview those messages, just the latest one. This affects smart watch users where notifications power content on the watch. Broken since version 393. Fix it. Muppets.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: For a year, maybe even 2 at this point, Messenger very often does not notify me or my friends of the messages we send each other. Other times you could tag them and send several messages and they might still not be notified. Happens on both ends constantly

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: This app can damage your ears!!! There is a bug where notification sounds play even when your phone is on silent mode. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Poor Android Auto Interface Whenever a message has been received, read, and responded to, Android Auto says you have unread messages. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: PLEASE ADD "NO SOUND" option under the notification sound selection list. Notification noise impossible to turn off. No matter where i turn off the messenger notification noise, at some point when the phone in laying in the table, then it starts doing it, and does many notifications in a row as if from way back when it didn't do any noise. I hate those sounds. I was trying to look for messenger notification sound as "no sound" and i didn't find that kind of option.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: I don't know if my review will be acknowledged, but we need a music-to-story feature in messenger app and not only Facebook and Facebook lite. At times, I may not know the mood of a person and when someone send an emoji, I just give it an assumption. It's a good app overall.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Honestly the worst app going, the call function decides to cut out constantly by either disconnecting (despite the Internet being fine) or the mic stops working for minutes at a time, sending media is a coin toss as to whether it works or not and the functions such as conversation search don't work ever. These problems have persisted for the past 3 years and despite people reporting them they are never fixed. Messages also decide when they want to show up or not.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Edited: If there was a 0/5 stars I would have given it to this. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: Latest update has totally broken this app. Huge problems with it seemingly having no connection, so no notifications, no messages being sent or received, and no media shows up, just generic "Sent a photo" text. Happening on my old phone and a brand new one.

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
review_description: The app is terrible. Notifications continually stop working, and nothing but an uninstall and reinstall seem to fix it it. appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

appName: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free

I hate leaving bad reviews. Unfortunately I can't find anywhere else to turn to for help. I've reached out multiple times, but have recieved no response. It's very good app at used for anyting; house design, DIY tricks and alot of drawing references. Almost anything you can think of! I would recommend to anyone! I've had Pinterest for 2 years now, I loved it ever since but it's been getting so much worse recently. It's so buggy and it's making it hard to use it. Y'all are insane to mess up the UI so bad. The biggest issue is doing away with the ability to tap and hold pins and then save or share them. The old UI was way smoother and flowed better. Now the tried-and-true features are gone or altered beyond what is useful, and the new ones are stupid. And can we please choose to turn off censors?!

Really good app and so useful to find ideas. I mostly use Pinterest for my art block and really good to look up for a lot of references. Other than that, no problems and it's great! Been using for well over than 2 years and it's come with good help.

I have been using the app for a long time. The app has been really bad lately, as everyone keeps saying the home feed tuner no longer works like it should. Love this app. Wish they didn't have to take down or remove some of the pins i saved even private ones. I wish I had better things to say. I've used this app for years, for everything from moodboards to storyboarding books with author friends.
