I just can't even say I'm downgrading based on bugs anymore.

I'm sorry but this app is too troublesome. I don't get notifications for weeks and when I click on them they don't work. I really like pinterest, I have used it for inspiration. But now it has some bugs/glitches in it. Sometimes when I click on a picture Iike it will just be a white page. The comments are automatically disabled on most of my pins and they can't be enabled for some reason. Also, there seems to be an issue with the search function, I keep getting no results when I know there are pins of what I'm searching for. The app was fantastic for years, & then in the last week all of my recommendations got messed up, & the tune feed function completely broke & everything I view is turned off, I basically have no control over what I'm shown, the time function is the app is severely broken, & I am constantly shown irrelevant stuff even if I click on things that are relevant to me. Been using it since 2017, but every update since 2021 has been horrible. The latest update (Feb 2023) has only somehow gotten worse. Notifications don't even work or even load, the UI is cancerous to look at, app keeps closing out, pins don't save, and some video just don't allow sound or even load (and no, it's not because of wifi, this has been going on for two weeks) (Mar 2023) app keeps closing out and auto-updating despite the auto-update feature being turned off. Unusable.

Pinterest is great, and I use it for inspiration and creating mood boards. Recently though, I've run into the issue when using the app of not being shown what I search for. I'll search, for example, "smoke aesthetic" and it will show me one or two images actually related to my search (mostly products) and then the rest of the images will be unrelated. Eventually, when scrolling that search, it just stops showing results. If this could be fixed it would make the app much more convenient to use.

Overall, I really enjoy using this app. It's fun to create your own boards and style it the way you want. However, an essential feature is now missing or difficult to locate. When you created a new board, there used to be a button located at the top called "more ideas." This button allowed users to find pins similar to what was in their specific board. Without this feature, it is significantly more difficult and not as enjoyable to discover and save pins to a themed board.

The app is great and I've used it for years. My only complaint is that it updates and changes a lot. It not great when it changes right after you figure it out, and sometimes when it updates it messes with what it worked with or 'kinda' does. It not a huge deal though to accept, and I generally do enjoy the app. It useful to organize something you plan to make or create, generally collect ideas about things you like, and find interesting or enjoyable things that are similar to what you like.

I love using Pinterest so much. I use it almost everyday. I would say that it could be better in terms of organization and personalization, though. You can custom-sort on your own profile, but when saving a pin; it only sorts from A to Z. It is also incredibly frustrating that you can't have sections, within other sections. It would be so satisfying to have sections inside of sections, instead of having tons of boards. I would use Pinterest literally everyday for hours if it had more sections!

It used to run great but has been having problems with editing existing boards. Pinterest has been losing my pins. I upload an image and then proceed to move it to another board and it can't be found! Not surprising is that products can always be found. I hope they fix it soon.

I use this app every day for multiple things; one of those things is messaging friends. It is terrific for storing pIns for sites you want to revisit. I used to have to make a word document to store those links. This is so much better than that. The app is fun to look around. for the longest time, pinterest seemed to be perfect. i had no problems or issues whatsoever. however, recently things got a little funky to say the least. i dont have room to list all the new issues but some include making boards unusable, not allowing me to invite people to some of my boards, and not allowing me to update my age. some of these problems pinterest say is because of my age and when i go to reupdate my age (it hadn't updated for a few years) it wouldn't let me.

The only upside is that I haven't discovered another app that can accomplish what Pinterest does, so I'll continue using it until I do.

I realize some people use the app for small business reasons, but there are also larger commercial type ads that are sometimes too numerous compared to the number of actual pins. I am so annoyed with this app trying to take over all of my search results and show me things that have nothing to do with the chart I am looking for. Overall, I really like this app. It's simple to find the pins I want for ideas and whatnot. However, these past updates since 2021 have not been the best imo. Ok, as a Pinterest user from 2015, I still love this app to this day. As a mom, it's great to have pins that have recipes, DIY, videos, hair ideas,etc, and be able to save it on one of your bords. The pins are never-ending. review_description: I've used this app for years and I've always thought the functions, easy to access messaging, and ability to connect with new people was great. However, when it comes down to the most recent updates I don't like how some settings get rebooted since it has caused me issues with talking on calls. I love the app overall, but I wish the team spent more time fixing bugs and whatnot to make it even more enjoyable.

Discord really shouldn't re-compress images that are already under the data limit, not just because it's unnecessary, but because it actually makes the file BIGGER and a lot uglier than it was before I sent it. Please turn off this feature. Also, I can't view videos without making them full-screen. That used to be possible in the older versions of Discord, but it's gone now.

review_description: Discord is such a wonderful place. I've made friends that I can no longer think of living without. There are only slight annoyances i have with the app. the friend requests popping up in notifs instead of friends, but that's alr. However calling people while listening to music is a nightmare, especially on mobile, you can't play Spotify over your mic (reasonable) but if you're on mobile, it's very hard to adjust the volume of music, and being in a vc warps the sound. But overall I love this app.

I mean it's great to use to communicate with my friends and talk to them and watch stuff with by screen sharing, but the problem for me is the group chats. This is a accuring thing that always happens to me, but whenever I'm on one group channel, it randomly sometimes only shows that specific channel instead of the others and I always have to keep uninstalling and reinstalling to fix it and it gets to the point of annoyance and I hope they fix it! Otherwise, I don't have any other problems! ‚ô•Ô∏è
developer_response: Sorry about that! Have you tried restarting your device and then reinstalling the app? If that doesn't work, please try the beta version here: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.discord And if all else fails, contact our support team so we can look into this further: dis.gd/contact

review_description: I've used this app for years. Let me say, the communication is great and there are many cool, fun features that add to the experience; however, my largest gripe with this app is the excessive changing of user interface. The UI is updated so frequently that it makes the app unenjoyable once you've finally gotten used to a specific feature. In fact, the developers should focus more on bugs with the software rather than minor changes in design which provide no improvement for the app in any regard.

Lost another star. Discord is awesome. The Discord app on android is complete garbage. A buggy trash heap that requires me to close and reopen the app constantly just for basic functionality. Connection loop, the reaction/edit/copy menu for tapping and holding a message gets reduced to a non-functional sliver in the middle of the screen randomly, I sometimes have to close and reopen the app just to switch channels. I've gotten into a habit of just closing the app before I do anything.
developer_response: I truly apologize for all the trouble. Can you try a different WiFi network, or cellular data to see if the same issue persists? If that doesn‚Äôt do the trick, could you send us a support ticket: dis.gd/contact so we can investigate further?

review_description: Great for sending messages, and has a very good call function. Noise suppression for calls is impressive. I almost always eat really crunchy chips as I'm playing games with my friends, and they can never tell until I start talking. The things I would change/improve upon is the notifications. Sometimes notifications for messages do not appear, no matter phone or discord settings. As well as calls becoming more "robotic" occasionally, regardless of device, network connection, or duration of call.

Ive been finding a few bugs with the app, one with DMs, where a few of my texts have either disappeared or been merged with the recipient, and the second with the notification bar, where most of my messages will refuse to send, if sent from there, and the third, really bad connection issues. Each time I reopen the app, it will not load recent messages, or channels, because it will be stuck on "Connecting".

The newest update (3/8/2023) sucks. The bugs were not fixed, but only made worse. Audio coming through my phone now gets picked up by the mic when this was never a problem before. Alongside this, the green "watching stream" banner on top covers a quarter of the screen and cuts off gameplay, and the screen cannot be moved to reveal it in any capacity. This is incredibly frustrating, especially since it was working in an acceptable capacity beforehand, the blueprints were literally right there.
developer_response: We're sorry for the hassle with our update. We hear you and our teams are actively working on rolling out fixes daily. If you continue to experience issues, please make sure your app is on the latest version. Feedback greatly affects what we focus on so please let us know if you continue to have issues at dis.gd/contact.

review_description: Could there be an option for how image previews are arranged, between the old form and the new grid arrangement? I much preferred the old one and how it displayed the full image without having to tap into it and miss the convo outside of that view. Also, why does the "go to bottom" button scroll through the entire chat instead of jumping to the bottom now? Isn't that the opposite of what it's meant to do, quickly getting to the bottom?

In the beta version, jumping to messages causes the client to crash, and pressing Android's return button when viewing a file exits the app. I've switched back to the public builds for now because of this, where there aren't as many issues. It should be noted that I never have voice or video calls through the mobile application, so I'm only judging based on text performance.
developer_response: Thanks for the input! It'd be great if you could post/upvote that on our Feedback page. I'd like to think that anything is possible, so we'll see if this gets implemented in the future! https://dis.gd/feedback

review_description: Ever since the new update none of my friends have been able to hear me without it being a garbled mess. We've tried talking on other platforms and they all work just fine. I've toggled every relevant setting I can think of, I've uninstalled and reinstalled, and I've toggled all the permissions too. Not only that but the android walkthrough steps are so far out of date that they're unusable. Please find a fix soon. This is a platform I've enjoyed using for years. Thanks.
developer_response: Thanks for writing in! I'm sorry to hear about the voice chat troubles. Could you please submit a support ticket so we can look into the issue?: dis.gd/contact

review_description: The interface is extremely buggy. For example the app will force you to change chat & chanel pages when ever I rotate my screen or switch apps for a split second, the keyboard won't show up some times & it forces me to rotate my screen to get it to pull up, as well as the hold for options pop up. The voice chat is just as bad it randomly crashes, its interface disappears then it won't pop back up, the audio cuts out at random, & video freezes without buffering. It does it on any type of service.

review_description: Really good app! It works like a charm, the only issue I have with it (And yes, just like previous users, I use a chromebook. It's a good chromebook though-) is whenever I'm in a call and I go onto (for example) google, the audio is all screwy and glitchy, and it takes forever to go back to normal, I actually opted for using the web version, which still worked kinda good, it is kind of hard to navigate on there though. The app is super good other than the calling issue I explained earlier.

So there is an issue with your volume slider in private calls. Ever since the latest UI update the volume slider has become so tiny that I cannot use it without some random luck of my finger hitting the slider. Since my phone won't turn people I talk to all the way, sometimes I need to use the slider to turn them down more, but I can't do that if I can't touch it right away. Let alone if I do turn them down it's a pain to turn back up. Other than that the app has been great.

I would rate higher if it wasn't for the constant issues that I have while using the app. Notifications don't ping when someone @s or sends a dm. It happens so much that I have to restart my phone to reset it. There are photo upload issues where it will get stuck at 0% or just fail entirely for no reason. I use this app all the time for friends. It's frustrating when all these things occur.

New DMs wouldn't show on the app and be sent through my phone's notifications as if I weren't already on the app. I have been closing out the app and returning to fix this issue on my own. However, it will come back later. Lastly, the custom status emoji is not the regular Discord Emoji and goes out of frame. This just bothers me.

Can't even slide to see member lists due to it bringing up the message reply now. There was already a way to reply, why inhibit functionality for no reason? The horizontal sliding for both directions was key to the app's feel. It's only able to be done by a button in one spot now, which is worse for accessibility, especially one handed as phone apps are typically used, than being able to slide anywhere on the screen. What an unnecessary and frustrating change.
developer_response: Sorry to hear you do not like our update. If you'd like to see changes made to the app, you could post or upvote your suggestion on our Feedback site: dis.gd/feedback

review_description: To be honest it's a great app! Easy to chat, call, share videos, and play. I'd give it two more stars if it wasn't for many issues. Especially with more updates. Messaging is now very laggy on both computer and phone for some weird reason. It crashes calls randomly on my phone half the time when I leave the discord app for a single moment for no reason now!? Fyi this is a recent problem since march 1, 2023. It wasn't this bad before!

review_description: So many things have gone wrong since the last update. Everytime someone I'm in a call with turns on their camera, after a few minutes it freezes and doesn't come back until I close the app and reopen it. When I click on pictures, I can't exit out of them, so I have to, again, close the app and reopen it. And my back button no longer works to back out of dms or pictures, just closes the app completely. Please fix soon.

review_description: Original review "Call keeps dropping whenever I lock my phone - Google pixel 7" Update: It was fine for two weeks but after updating the app I am back to the same issue. Everytime I lock my phone I am connected to the call for a minute or two before I get disconnected. The worst part about it, it doesn't tell you that you're disconnected. review_description: Its great, been using it for years. But recently its gotten just a little buggy, deleting text messages, images. Unfriending people at random, muting or closing dm's, kicking from calls a few times in a row before letting me stay. But im still going to use it, because I think its only temporary bugs, I love the app, its the only way to talk to my friends.

You can't share videos at all anymore. Even when I try to go around the system by cropping the video to make it shorter, it doesn't work at all. When the video is sent it'll be sent as a file, but when the other recipient tries to download that file by going to the link, it doesn't even work at all. I don't understand why this hasn't been fixed yet. Everything else is great about this app with socializing with other groups, but I just wanna share videos/memes with friends.
developer_response: We're sorry for the trouble you're experiencing with our app. Could you please submit a support ticket so we can look into the issue?: dis.gd/contact

review_description: It's good for normal messaging and sending pictures but sending videos is very buggy. My friends are able to send videos and it's fine but when i do it, it sends a file and has to be downloaded but when you try to download it, it says i lost disconnected from the network. Idk why it does this. It works for some videos but most of the time doesn't. I've discovered that videos stored in my /internal storage/download are the ones not working
developer_response: Thanks for reaching out to us! I'm so sorry for the trouble. Could you please submit a support ticket so we can look into the issue?: dis.gd/contact

review_description: Rating: 2.5 1)Could have better power management. 2)Don't always get notifications and posted links don't always redirect properly. UI is hit or miss. Needs proper navigation which is logical.

review_description: It's gotten annoying. I don't seem to have issues on the desktop. However it keeps giving me issues on the app. When I have too many DM's on my list, I tend to close out the ones I won't be chatting with anytime soon. review_description: Discord mobile seems to have been a complete mess for well over a year now, with updates that break things constantly or just don't do anything. Recently the option to tap and hold a message to show options is broken, I can't even describe the mess it is. But as to videos freezing, connection issues, servers seemingly disappearing or just not being able to open a server, it's a plain mess. I like discord and use it both on pc and mobile but it's very frustrating having learn to bypass issues

review_description: I'm an avid user of discord, it's the primary tool I use to talk to friends and keep up with game updates. The newest update for mobile discord sucks. review_description: It functions fine, generally speaking. But some of the interface and design choices are pretty rough. Such as the new "swipe to reply" system, which is god-awful. It should be a toggle at best or not implemented at worst; nobody needed that. Forcing users to change their muscle memory is a terrible policy. If it ain't broken, don't fix it.

review_description: With every update it's always something. Well with the most recent update now my app won't stay open for more then 5 seconds. It closes out no matter what I'm doing. I could be in the middle of typing and it closes out. This is very frustrating at the end of the day. I also no longer get notifications at all, not for DMS, pings, nothing. This is all disappointing

review_description: I've been using this for years now and this is all I have to say. While it does have issues they're issues any social media app would have, and because the users can monitor each other to a level similar to the way moderators in other apps do everything is much more thorough, making it much harder to end up in toxic situations compared to apps like Twitter or TikTok. It's constant updates improve and build upon it's already beautiful interface and communication abilities, I heavily recommend it.

App performs very poorly, doesn't remember where I was when I closed it, shows the wrong people in DMs before it loads, sometimes shows messages in places they were never sent, and if I turn on voice activity, it refuses to detect my voice, among many other issues. Discord itself is probably a 3.75 on PC, but this app is a very poor showing and needs some serious tuning.
developer_response: Thanks for writing a review. We hear you and our teams are actively working on rolling out fixes daily. Additionally, your feedback greatly affects what we focus on so please let us know if you continue to have issues at dis.gd/contact.

review_description: Video calls constantly freezing. Been happening for a while now. My girlfriend lives far away and this was the main way we stayed connected via video. review_description: New update has some "fun" bugs, such as the videos and photos that show not being at all the posts I've clicked on??? And when I do get to the correct content, now I can't swipe up anymore to exit a photo because doing so takes me to a different post that isn't from the blogs I'm following (aka not relevant to what I want to see while browsing). With the invisible nav buttons on my phone, swiping up is easier than having to find the back button. And Tumblr Live needs a permanent off switch.

I am not joking, the latest video player update makes this app unusable for me. I will be going back to the website on my phone, despite it being a bit slower and less responsive, until the video player is fixed. Issues include (1) cropping edges of video, leading to captions being unreadable and (2) no pause feature. I would also like to disable the swiping up to see some random, unrelated video.

The app is so unstable, I can only use it for barely 2 minutes before it freezes and crashes. It seems as though the ads are a huge contributing factor here. This desperately needs to be fixed, the app is unusable as it is. Also how the hell am I supposed to access tags that I follow?? The ones I had are completely inaccessible. Cool. Cool website.

Hiya! I'm not entirely sure what's been going on with the app, but a day or two before the update, and even now, with the update, my app has to close on its own. It begins by running slow, then my phone begins overheating, and then the apps forces itself closed. I'm not entirely sure what's going on, but this isn't happening with any other of my apps. Hope this can be fixed soon! ‚ô°

It was good, but now there's a lot of annoyances. My biggest issues are the still ongoing bot issue and the random glitches, like the search function resetting to the top at random. You'll be scrolling through then boom! Back at the top. It does the same thing in blogs or going through the list of followed blogs. It's not unusable but it is a massive nuisance when I just want to browse.

It was fine until the last update, now every time I click on an image some other post pops up or a video will start playing. I don't know if it's a bug or a way to show ads but there should be a way to turn the feature off for accessibility reasons. If I want to click an image to zoom in it should not show me an unrelated video.
developer_response: Sorry for the trouble! This is now fixed, but if you're still running into the problem, please contact us via tumblr.com/support

review_description: The newest update makes it practically unusable. Any time the search feature is used, it can suddenly reset you to the top of the page. Pages refresh constantly. Ads move seemingly randomly, shifting the entire page up and down. The simple act of scrolling is impossible. Until this is fixed, I will not be able to use the app, not because I don't want to look through my favorite blogs, but because the experience is so frustrating, it makes me want to hurl my phone into a wall, which isn't ideal.

The app doesn't work very well for me, it freezes and lags a lot, when I agree to the update prompts, nothing seems to happen. But still - it's tumblr! Of all the "social" sites I use, this one has the largest ratio of things that make me happy as opposed to things that make me sigh in exasperation. I should add that that I have seen disturbing ads with jeffry dhomar body horror gore stuff before and I still prefer browsing on my computer for things like this.

The recent updates aside from polls have made this app practically unusable for me. With the new updates to the image viewer/video player you cannot zoom in on pictures or pause or rewind videos, which sucks. Additionally, the profile tab at the bottom of the screen has been swapped out for the store tab, meaning I can't easily access my profile while saving my place on the dashboard. On top of that, I hate having to snooze tumblr live every week when nobody uses it. Accessibility is tanking.

The new updates are terrible. The Live function is useless and can only be snoozed for a week (although it definitely comes back sooner than that). Now I click on a hard-to-read photo intending to zoom in and it won't. I swipe up to continue scrolling through the post and the rest of my dash, but instead I'm shown more random and endless posts. This is absolutely ridiculous.

2-2-23 unremovable NEW notification on Live feature. I'd like to have the option to go through pages instead of endless scroll that refreshes poorly and I lose my place, at least if I know I'm on page 40/50 I'll have some vague idea of where I left off. I'd also like to see the archive of each blog, something that's easy to find on desktop.

Tumblr is once again finding brave and stunning new ways to mess up its app. Today's feature? In an effort to make image viewing more tiktok-like, a feature nobody wanted, you can now scroll vertically when you click an image to get something entirely unrelated to what you first clicked on. But what really sells this, what REALLY makes this work, is that the feature is so broken that you never actually get the original image you wanted. The first image is ALSO unrelated to your click.
developer_response: Sorry for the trouble! This is now fixed, but if you're still running into the problem, please contact us via tumblr.com/support

review_description: Since the completely unwanted "tumblr tv" update, the app has been aggravating to no end, bordering on unusable. You can no longer swipe up to back out of an expanded image/video, instead you're shown another completely random pic from someone you don't follow. And forget about being able to scrub through videos, zoom in on photos, or even SEE smaller images, because the ALT text box completely covers them up now. Lastly, I don't wanna "snooze" tumblr live- I want it off my dash permanently.

They have started making changes to the picture formats that make it hostile to those with disabilities. You have to do multiple steps to be able to zoom in on images. You cannot swipe out of the image to go back to dash; it just shows images from different posts! Also it displays your primary blog instead of the sideblog it was posted from; for people who have separate private & public/business blogs, that's a huge privacy concern! This all is atrocious and unnecessary.

It's functional. But the recent photos/videos viewer update just made it more like other social media apps that I don't like nor want to use. Thankfully I turned off automatic updates before the buttons on the bottom of the screen were moved, but that also is a horrible update. I understand you need to make money to run a big website but pushing and promoting the store like this only has the opposite effect with tumblr's obstinante crowd.

Love the app it's great! It's easy to use when you learn where everything is! Though I wish there was a 'history' mode because sometimes I'll get out the app and it would reload and I will have to scroll through everything again :( or I would like a message that says 'go back to what you were reading' it would be convenient!

While I love Tumblr as a platform, their app is go glitchy üò≠ it crashes and freezes often. They layout is weird, and it's a bit hard to use, especially for asks. Also I don't like Tumblr live and wish I could turn it off permanently instead of just for a week. On top of that they send me WAY too many messages! I turned off messages in the app and it didn't seem to work, so then I turned them off in settings but now they keep asking for me to turn system notifications back on üò≠üò≠

This most recent update that changed the video and picture layout sucks. You can't zoom in on pictures anymore and videos don't play on the dashboard right and are cropped weirdly, while starting out muted. Also, I don't want to be able to scroll to other videos or pictures from the post I'm on. That's content from people I don't follow and have zero control over choosing to see. Between that and Tumblr live, I'm not sure I like this app's direction. I understand they need money, but not a fan.

When clicking on a link to a new post, it'll just keep closing the app in opening in Chrome. I'm uncertain if anybody will see this but it is quite in annoying. I have to keep opening and closing the app just to see the next post. It is unknown if this is just a me issue or not. But at the end of the day I have had no other problems with this app that is upseting or disruptive

I love the app, but I just have one issue with it. On the android version of it, every once and a while my activity feed will be blank. I just keep getting an error message that says "we could not complete your request at this time". This never happens when I use the IOS version of the app. And also, I don't know which update it was, but ever since then it has made images in text posts way too small. And please bring back the option to block someone who already has you blocked.

I like Tumblr but the app is aweful. It's always crashing. I can't ever scroll through tags because it crashes and takes me to the top of the page, where I've seen all the posts. Does that with my feed too. So I'm just always looking at the most recent posts and can't look at the ones I missed. Crashes way too often. It's infuriating.

TUMBLR IS NOT TIKTOK and no one WANTS it to be TikTok! No one wants live videos, especially live videos you can only turn off for a week! I don't know of a single person who doesn't mute those videos! And the way that videos and images are now displayed upon clicking on them is terrible. The bottom of the picture is obscured by post info, and if you swipe up, it takes you to completely unrelated images and videos. Why? I'm just trying to get a better look at the picture I clicked on!

Edit: It had gotten better over the last few months, but the last two days, the tags have not been working correctly. None of my posts or my friend's posts are showing up in the tags. I'm losing my patience with this app. I can't keep it open for long without it crashing, especially when scrolling through posts on my feed. It's been like this for nearly two months now. The ads are way more intrusive now as well which may have something to do with it.
developer_response: Thanks for surfacing! We‚Äôd like to help. Can you contact us from tumblr.com/support? We'll be able to take a closer look once we hear back from you.

review_description: Ever since the new update with Live added my app has been crashing a ton. My phone isn't that old (Moto G4) and can handle things like YouTube with ease. This leads me to believe that Live is the problem not my phone. I've never even opened Live, literally no one uses it, so it's very frustrating that it's affecting app performance.

The Tumblr app's always been on Shakey ground but lately it's been worse than usual. It freezes up, gets stuck in buffering the feed and notifications, with dozens of "Connection went bloop" messages, and sending me notifications for DMs I've read 3 minutes prior. It's a hot mess of an app and the only app I'm having issues with right now.

this app has been making some good progress in terms of functionality, but the swapping out of the account and search tabs in place for the live feed and market place is an unnecessary backflip away from making the app great. i don't use the live feed, no one i follow uses the live feed- we do not need to be the next tiktok or instagram. in fact, i would so much rather we stay tumblr.

Crashing is even more frequent. Horrible feature implementations like the live feature. Stop trying to be instagram, tumblr. There's a problem when it's more productive and less aggravating to use the mobile browser version over the actual app. Actual platform is fine and I use it all the time but the app itself is awful and becomes worse every update.

This app is actively trying to run content creators (gif, gfx, edit) off the site. The dimensions of everything we've made over the past years is ruined and the gifs that look beautiful on desktop look like absolute trash on the app. Not to mention the random live option they added that absolutely nobody asked for and you have to mute weekly. This site is a joke.

Unlike everyone else, I have not updated to the newest version of this app (1/24/2023). The app worked absolutely fine until about 3pm this afternoon. Nothing will load. Nothing will post. Can't see feed. It looks like the UI force changed without an update (it does not look the way it did this morning). Basically, I now have all of the issues everyone else has been complaining about for the last couple weeks. Also unable to block/report porn bots. Options to do so no longer appear or work.
developer_response: Hello, thanks for your review! We'd like to take a closer look and hopefully get this issue resolved for you. Could you submit a support request at tumblr.com/support? Thanks!

review_description: I've used this app for so long, it's great, but recently I've found a really bad glitch that messes up your phone and could cause headaches/migraines. When I click on the link to "your 2022 year in review!" On another user's post, tumblr will proceed to reload the dashboard (even if I clicked the link on the person's blog) multiple times with a white screen in the middle, extremely fast. You have to delete the app and re-download it to correct the behavior, starting again if you re-click.

Crashes about once every 2 minutes for what seems to be a variety of reasons. New update made images in text posts very very small, too small to see without making the images full-sized. You might think oh, not a problem, you can just click on the picture to make it full-sized! Nope. That crashes the app. Scrolling through posts crashes the app. Loading new posts crashes the app. Breathing near the app crashes the app.
developer_response: Thanks for your review! We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at https://tumblr.com/support? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

review_description: App was amazing, but since the new update, it won't stay on dark mode. I have sensory difficulties and am visually impared, so it's very important for me to be able to have this. I tried changing settings, I tried closing and reopening the app, I even tried uninstalling it and reinstalling, but nothing has worked.

Ive been having this problem for about a week now, not sure if anyone else has been experiencing it but when I'm scrolling down, it would freeze and it'll take about a minute until I'm able to move down again or it'll just crash one me entirely. I've made sure to keep the app updated, logged out then back in to see if that did anything (it didn't help). I even restarted my phone just in case. My wifi connection is fine and works well, so I don't really think that would be the issue.

The app isn't too bad, but it's not so user friendly compared to the website version. If you're on blogs, you can't look into their archives or find the latest posts unless you turn on their notifications. It's also straining on the eyes and doesn't follow your blog's theme colors. Not so many options to do. I can see the app being used for quick things, but not as a main use. If it's more user friendly, I'd be using it more often. Edit: You also can't switch to other blogs so easily.

There are way too many ads. Literally video advertisements that auto play every 2 or 3 posts. Bizarre and disturbing ads like they are trying to annoy you into paying for the app. Tons of unwanted features added like TV and Live while the app hasn't functioned properly in years. It constantly crashes and won't load anything (except the ads!!)

Kinda inconsistent. Especially notifications. I'll keep getting notifications for one like or reblog several times in a row even hours after dismissing the prompt. There's also information missing from the app compared to the main website such as being able to see exact numbers for a Post. While it's not a terrible experience of an app it's one that definitely could use work.

Finding accounts that you'll enjoy following is a small hurdle, but after that it's smooth sailing. If you know what you like, you'll love Tumblr. Very customizable. Quick-reblog and queue are both excellent features. Minor problem with spambots, but the report and block features are easy to use so annoyance is minimized. Overall: good app, good platform. Would recommend.

Tumblr will rot your brain if you use it too much, so I'm not sure if I can recommend it to sane people. I actually prefer the app to the website these days, they've improved it a lot over the years. Some questionable design decisions, but otherwise pretty decent. Thank you for adding keyword filtering natively, I owe you my life.

Too much bloat between things like dashboard tabs and tumblr live. I keep the mobile app to get notifications for direct messages and pings, but otherwise I find myself using it less and less. On desktop, there is less bloat, and I can use browser extensions/settings like Xkit rewritten to get rid of the rest. Even the mobile site has less excess than the app. As for the site itself, love it, one of the only places anymore you can go for a chronological feed without heavily targeted advertising

Overall fine, until the newest update. The latest update completely ruins the customizable dashboard theme, and every mode now shows as True Blue which is very high contrast and strains my eyes. I can no longer utilize dark mode or low contrast, and can't use the app without getting a headache. I'll be closing it down until an update manages to fix this bug.

Great app just some glitches. The messages don't load it said I had 2 messages but "something went screwy" would show up instead of any new messages. So I deleted the app and it still didn't work. Now the message tab is completely empty and the "something went screwy" still shows up. Please fix. Love the streaming option though very accessible for now blogs.

There are bugs here and there. Unnecessary changes to UI appearance that literally no one asked for occurs every 6 months instead of fixing said bugs or introducing a new function users actually want. But there's something to be said for still having a user friendly UI and not having your content dictated to you by an algorithm (that's a big one, actually).

i have used tumblr mobile thru thick and thin for ten years, thank you for fixing bugs. chronological, anonymous beauty of a blogging platform. i love that i choose what i see (besides ads for the most part) and how i see it (dashboard peferences my beloved). very much dislike the live feature and that i have to actively deactivate it every 7 days. make it permanent!!!! now I've got a recurring event calendar to turn it off >:(

Moved to android from and old iOS phone so the new features are a bit wild and will take some getting use to. Overall it's enjoyable and not that bad. I do have an issue playing videos though, the screen whites out and won't play videos I previously could see on top of new ones. It typically happens after a few minutes of browsing.

I love using Tumblr, gave it a rave review a while back. But the app went Wonky (your term) a week or so ago. Now it shows me a black screen that keeps saying things like 'Internet Strangeness', 'Something Goofed', 'Minor Hiccup' 'Try Again'. I can see my account Home Page, with the color scheme I created, but it's empty. I can't post, & logging out & back in didn't fix the problem. I installed all updates including one today, but still the same issue. Restarting the phone doesn't help. HELP!

Tumblr wants you to use their app on mobile but can't do basic functionality like actually opening the link they're bugging you about from the browser. Ironic ads that you can't get rid of are still annoying, as are the promoted feeds that are all over your feed no matter what you're doing. It doesn't even remember where you left off when you switch between screens.

Blackscreens are gone - now it immediately force-refreshes you to the top of your feed, instead. NO. Reverting to earlier, *properly fuctioning*, version of the app. Also randomly thumbnailing images, and will not show other related images or posts from a blog, if image/post is selected in the "chevk this out" bar. Decent app, if it would stop showing my own posts in the feed.

This app won't work properly unless you have a fairly modern phone. Even with a modern phone, it will still have bugs; some functionality will almost always be broken. You cannot edit anything on the website that you uploaded using the app. This is mostly for drafts, queues, and posting. Update 11/29/22: Clicking on the Downloads tab crashes the app. Phone: Galaxy S20 FE 5G.

The app is great right, I mean it's Tumblr and I have been using it since 2015 but like the new updated took away dark mode and my eyes can't handle it with the bright. I hope it's a bug you all plan on fixing because it's hellishly annoying especially when you still have the color palette available but it does nothing to changed the feed and the color palette only applies to blogs and searches made on the sight.

I love Tumblr and have used it for well over a decade. However, I recently updated the app and no matter what I do in the settings of the app and my phone, Dark mode no longer works. This is very frustrating because dark mode is my preferred way of viewing most of my apps as it's less jarring on my eyes, especially at night. But without dark mode, I'm feeling very uninclind to use this app. Please fix this soon.

Lately everytime you click on an image you're sent back up to the top of the dashboard which is extremely annoying. I also don't care at all about the new 'Tumblr Live' feature but it's made 10x more irritating by the fact that i have to manually turn it off EVERY SEVEN DAYS. On top of this the app keeps randomly crashing, it's happening more and more frequently and it makes me want to rip out hairs. I guess don't care if the app is ugly or has weird features if it's literally unusable.
developer_response: Thanks for your review! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at https://tumblr.com/support. Thank you.

review_description: ever since the latest update, the app has been unusable. between the endless bots and the fact that the app just goes blank, crashes, or kicks me to some random post way down where i was scrolling, i'm definitely frustrated. nobody asked for livestreaming, just fix the bugs. it's nowhere near this bad on ios, and it's old & tired that the android app always falls short.

It was all good but now everyedia opens in Tumblr TV and I can't even find an option to snooze it. The controls are weird now too (disabled double tap to like and yet still can't double tap to zoom in-out). And whenever I go back from a post on a different tab (For You and Your Tags) it just sends me back to the top of my main dash. All options in polls are invisible now too (in dark mode). I don't know if I'll get used to that or if I'd rather switched to the browser version after all that.

I have been using the app for a year and it has been great so far. Yes there is a little hiccup regarding saving a draft stating that there has been a problem but I believed this has been fixed, since I don't have anymore problem editing and saving any of my draft. Furthermore, I understand that some find the ads annoying, trust me so do I but I think every apps has them now (for example wattpad) and I don't want to pay anything to have them taken down because they don't really bother me.

Love the content people create, but the ads, especially the ones taking me out of the app to surveys automatically are making it borderline unusable. It's incredibly frustrating trying to use the mobile app only to be redirected every few posts. Edit: the ad issues are better, but the constant refreshing where it completely resets the dash and you lose where you were browsing is incredibly frustrating

I do love the app and I'm happy that the influx of spam bots is gone. But I'd like to make a suggestion. I read somewhere that at one point is was possible to code text to be diffrent colors then the ones available but for some reason it got taken out. I've seen my friends who are on desktop code the texts into diffrent colors and I can't help but feel envious. I'm sure there are many people on mobile who would love to code text onto diffrent colors again so perhaps you guys could bring it back?

I have been using tumblr for about 10 years, It's my safe place to go to whenever I feel anxious and stressed. Not to mention that it's the only sm app that I'm actively using, having an account and sharing things. But the past few months updates made it look non enjoyable. On my dashboard I keep seeing ads from sketchy sites, video ads are making my phone to slow down. I keep seeing ads and suggested posts every two scrolls. I think it's time for me to uninstall. Tumblr now is a trashy site.

Super angry right now. I hate the feature, where basically you can't zoom in on any pictures. Clicking on any image looks like Twitter/Instagram and it's a completely useless "feature" because it doesn't add anything, but takes away accessability, as again, you can't zoom in on anything, thus can't read anything too small. Please for the love of god change it back. It's the most basic of features. 2 stars because it's generally a pretty faulty app, but this new "addition" made it intolerable.

Great: Good interface and design, very creative and artistic, as well app's functionalities. I only have one problem: Optimization. App gets slower with gifs, and consequently scroll does it too. This is not very pleasant in experience. Fix this please. On the other hand, it would be amazing to have a save or bookmark button available for collecting posts.

Each update makes the app slower and less usable for no good reason. New image viewer really tries hard to be tiktok and fails miserably to even load a single image. There is a new live feature which has different privacy policy so it can steal your data. There is a grand total of 5 paid for streamers on the site. Just use the desktop version on browser. It's less buggy, more stable, but still very hard to use.

For some reason, whenever I scroll and I come across a poll, an answer is already in place. I haven't tapped anywhere near it yet an option is chosen. Also, when I do get to choose an option, I noticed it is permanent and can't ever be changed and removed. Changing and removing my own poll votes need to happen. Additionally, just a lot of porn bots. Seriously, fix that. And the ads are so redudant.

I don't know what you're doing to how images display or why, but it is severly hampering my user experience. I can't see the tiny images on dash, I can't zoom in on them when I click them, and I can't scroll through all images on a post. It's an ugly and detrimental change. Updating the app did not fix these issues, either.

I keep getting randomly shot back up to the top of searches and blogs. It can just happen at any time. I feel like I'm on thin ice every time I scroll through anything. After scrolling for like 5 or more minutes and getting shot back to the top, this is incredibly agonizing. Others in the reviews probably have explained this better than I have. TLDR PLEASE for the love of god fix this. Please

Used to use this app more often but with more updates, the worst it has gotten. Gifs slow n crash the app. There was a feature that would help not do this where you can turn off gifs n they wouldn't move. But with a update, that was taken away. Just has become unusable for me, I hope later at some point it'll be usable again cause if not then there's no use having it.

Before now using the Tumblr app was a fine experience but as soon as clicking images started leading to being able to scroll to other posts images this app has become unusable because no images I click will lead to the actual image and instead it's something unrelated. I want to be able to just go in and zoom in on what I need to see clearer not be bombarded by videos that I CANT EVEN PAUSE ANYMORE. FIX YOUR APP.
developer_response: Sorry for the trouble! This is now fixed, but if you're still running into the problem, please contact us via tumblr.com/support

review_description: Congrats on making double tapping to like a option to disable, only double tapping to zoom in does not come back on nor is there an option to do so. Every once in a while you'll tap a photo from a post and a completely unrelated photo and post will load instead. Tumblr live is still a thing. Get rid of it.
developer_response: Sorry for the trouble! This is now fixed, but if you're still running into the problem, please contact us via tumblr.com/support

review_description: Ads that autoplay sound should be illegal, I don't need to be jumpscared like that on a regular basis. If the regular video player doesn't autoplay with sound then neither should ads. Also (and this is nitpicky) I wish there was a way to opt out of the vanity icons. Some of them are fun or seasonal but, for the most part, I just want the regular Tumblr icon on my phone and don't like worrying that it's going to change every time I update the app. Maybe add it as a widget?

Please don't add instagram or tiktok style features. If i click on a picture I just want to see the picture itself and any pictures in the same post/reblog. I don't want to swipe up or down and end up somewhere entirely new. Swiping up or down used to close pictures, and that made sense, still does, leave it that way.

The app is fine, just a bit annoying when it comes to the stuff it recommends as it is really redundant by showing things I've already seen/liked. The for you/recommended for you could really use some further finessing as it can be quite repetitive and it takes a while before it refreshes. Also take care of the porn bots, I've given up on reporting and blocking them all.

So this is the good old tumblr app, same as always. Except, they're trying again to cram in some dynamic ads that are both annoying and not working as they mess with the threads' order. Open a picture down a thread, close it, you're back all the way up at the beginning. Let's just wait for the devs to realize their mistake and take the overly big ads off, again.....
developer_response: Dear User, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We want to give you a better user experience. Could you send us screenshots of Ads that are causing the issue? You can email us at https://tumblr.com/support.

review_description: Update: bug discussed here has been patched :) Recent update broke the home page. Whenever you back out of any post, be it on the following, for you, or followed tags page, it forces you back to the following tab. This gets very aggrivating when you need to reepatedly swap tabs every time you want to view a post. Would be 4 stars if fixed.
developer_response: Thanks for your review and report! We're investigating this now and should have things fixed up soon! You can follow and check on our progress at https://changes.tumblr.com/.

review_description: A bug that causes the app to refresh and switch tabs any time you watch a video, zoom in on a photo, or look at the notes on a post has been an issue for a month without any effort put into fixing it. Also, the merch store has stupid looking ads everywhere and steals ideas from popular posts without crediting or paying the people who wrote said posts.

It kinda is broken now, some link send you to chrome but doesn't show where the link leads to aftually and some links are okay and still make you stay in the app. Sometimes when you try to reblog it doesn't, closes post. At least that's what happened with me.

The ads are AWFUL, and whenever i try and click on the "this ad isn't relevant to me / is uncomfortable" button, it says "got it, you wont see it again" then completely ignores me and keeps showing me the SAME ads, not even removing the one i complained about. I get these GIANT intrusive ads about real life crimes and dating apps and scams, whole videos, and the hide ad feature does absolutely NOTHING. Either LET US REMOVE upsetting ads or remove the button, don't lie about it!

After update I cant post or reblog. It worked fine before. Why is this app needing to be updated every few days? Stop adding so many little unnecessary things to it that it keeps stopping. STILL FREEZING - STREAMLINE THE APP AND STOP ADDING A BUNCH OF JUNK TO IT THAT NO ONE ASKED FOR. UPDATE 4/17/2023 It's even worse than the last update. I open it and it freezes. I close it, clear cache and reopen - it freezes again. It's pretty much unusable.

I have found comfort in Tumblr. It is a place where all my interests collide and it just makes me feel at home. However, whenever I click on a link from a post it does not not open and always says "the site cannot be reached" on either from phone and laptop. Its so disappointing when there are interesting things and i cant access it. I downloaded tumblr for the reason to expand on my interests. Might seriously consider uninstalling it in the long run if i get frustrated anoigh and save storage

search feature is infuriating. cant look at literally any pic, blog, or notes without it jettisoning you back to, not even the top, just a random point you've already passed that younred to refresh to bring back to the TOP, then still scroll back down to you place

Frustrating new bug where attempting to look at the notes of a post on a person's blog will suddenly launch you back up to the top when you exit them. Coupled with the fact that scrolling through the dashboard/a blog will cause the app to lag heavily after a few minutes, this app is slowly becoming unusable.

Haven't noticed frequent issues but it has frozen a couple times which can be irritating. Nonetheless, the platform/community itself is really cool and truly let's you decide what content you're being shown (excluding ads) unlike some algorithms like TikTok. And is relatively easy to use once you understand it.

Great site, but the app somehow manages to get worse and more unusable with every update with no betterment in sight on the horizon. Every time I heart a post I'm sent back to the top of my dashboard, losing my place in the archive. Images on posts will also randomly be super small and unreadable. It's insane the latter issue has persisted through 3 updates now. Get your act together.

Horrible experience with logging in. I have made an account a while ago (with a pretty creative name) and posted on it some original stuff. Now, when trying to log back in, not only that I CAN'T log in with my username, but only with email, if I try to log in with the email I know I used before, they just take me to make another account. Its very frustrating, really.
developer_response: Thanks for your review! We'd love to assist you with this issue. Please reach out to us at https://www.tumblr.com/support and we'll help get this issue cleared up for you.

review_description: It's the only social media i use, but the latest updates keep adding the very features that put me off other social medias. Between Tumblr Live (no one uses it but you can't turn it off, you can only snooze it), Tumblr Tv (no one wants it), and this latest nonsense where now when i tap a picture i get a bunch of different pictures with the same tag instead of the one im trying to get a closer look at, i'm starting to consider deleting altogether. Im seriously discouraged by this new direction.

Newest update is annoying and makes the dash unusable. Every time you scroll the page will suddenly reset at random intervals causing users to lose their spot on a page. Incredibly annoying. I wish staff would stop wrecking their app with every update they put out. If its not broken, dont fix it

The images won't load on mobile, no matter how stable my internet connection is and when they do load, half are shrunk! The new junk features are useless and probably a part of all these problems, it's basically not usable to me.

your updates are getting worse. ive been a user for 12 years. stop resizing things just pick a way and stick with it. videos will randomly stop working. posts will disappear. when i zoom out of a picture im booted to the top of my feed. bot surges arent great either. broken app. please fix.

app closes on its own, feed refreshes without input, and now all of a sudden when i click on an image in a post, I'm shown an entirely different image no matter what I do. fix this. your app is way too broken.
developer_response: Sorry for the trouble! This is now fixed, but if you're still running into the problem, please contact us via tumblr.com/support

review_description: I love Tumblr but this latest update sucks. Anytime I'm scrolling someone's blog and set my phone down for a second or click to see the comments on a post or anything at all really it glitches back to the top of their blog. My dashboard glitches back to the top too at random points. I hope the problems can be fixed soon because I really like the app usually.

Though I love the app, recently it has started to take me to an in-app chrome browser (now my android internet app after disabling chrome) when I click on links (ex. masterlist links). I saw this was an issue before in 2022 and I'm hoping a fix comes quickly.

Ever since the latest update on Android, every time I interact or click into a post to view an image or reply/reblog etc., It takes me back to the top of the screen. Like the blog or dashboard refreshes, and I lose the progress. Please fix this, thank youu

Recent changes to the video player and image viewer, as well as swapping the user profile button for a shop button hugely hurts the usability and functionality of the app. the current direction of changes to tumblr as a whole make me question whether i want to use the site at all. as it stands i will not be updating the app unless the changes are reversed

I love this hellsite, but there are a lot of bugs in the app that make my experience kind of annoying. There's the weird lapse in updates where some people get new features and others don't, but my main issue is the tag filter at the moment. Every time I try to change the tags I've filtered through, the app crashes. Now when I change tags, it says that there are no posts under those tags, even though I know there are because they used to be ABUNDANT before this week. Please fix :')

When the app refreshes itself without my doing it, it shows me all of the posts I just saw, so I close the app and don't use it for 6-12 hours Edited because it's gotten worse. I can't get 5 posts without it bringing me to the top, refreshed, with the same 5 posts I just saw. I can't scroll. I was going to buy ad-free but it's not worth it if I can't see new posts.

This update won't let me view pictures on dash without text in the way that will not fade even if I tap, like before. I can't see the whole image now because of it. The bottom tabs feel like they take up more room. I'd prefer to turn off tunblr live but they at least let you snooze it Edit: can't even zoom in on pics now

Quite frankly this app has not been good and it's only been getting worse under new management, lots of adding features nobody wants, tiktokifying it which removes all the charm and reason most ppl still used it (to get away from rampant monetization, algorithmically introduced content, etc) while not fixing the underlying issues the app has had for years like slowness, prone to crashing, and obscene data usage for a site who's primary medium is text and photos.

It was cool until they removed all the porn but I still get my meme fix so I'm knocking half a star down. But other than the functionality, the community could use some work in a few departments so that's another half star... But most of the users are super nice. I've made some really great friends and it's a safe space for a ton of people.

Normally I like it but the updated icon is really ugly and they've removed the tags you follow from the search page so you can't just scroll through what you like you have to either search for something specific or scroll through the staff choices. It's harder and more annoying to use and it's still almost impossible to find things on your likes page.

Tumblr is an excellent application for anybody who loves fandom, art, and turmoil. It's best for revealing your innovative and unusual side, and there's always something brand-new to check out. The app is simple to make use of and has a great interface. It's additionally extremely easily accessible and straightforward, so you can find the best neighborhood for you.

Its a great app! But i am facing a problem with opening it from chrome since it acts like I dont have the app downloaded when I do but it could just be my phone being off Edit: the search bar closes it now thanks too the new update hopeful that the bug gets fixed soon since the search bar is what i use the most

Tumblr was fine for years, but the new direction of monetization and UI changes are frustrating. These changes signal that the owners are more concerned with being Instagram 2 than having a functional and enjoyable website. You can't zoom in on images anymore, despite this being an art-centric website. The shop button has replaced the Blog button, which is a common, sleazy marketing tactic. "Tumblr Blaze" is a whole other can of worms.

The app is no longer usable. There's a new glich that scrolls you back to the top of the page after you view an image or video on if you're on your following page it will take you to the for you page and you'll have to scroll back to wherever you were. The porn bots are everywhere. Gifs are tiny and now even regular images are tiny. So many issues and tumblr support won't listen to us. Ugg.

Tumblr USED to be a great micro logging platform. It had great creator interaction and customization for blogs/dashboards. The chronological posting is a must. Now though, they keep trying to make it like every other garbage social media site. Every other post is an ad. Bots galore. They keep pushing a live feature that no one asks for/uses. Now they've replaced the "account" tab with the "marketplace". Can't zoom in on pictures (teeny tiny on dash). This place sucks now.

Okay, I need a good reason why Tumblr can't make it so its users can disable the live feature for more than seven days? Please fix this. Literally nobody wants to manually do that once a week to get rid of this feature that nobody asked for. It's barely used anyway. I'm pretty sure it's slowing down the app too, so.....yeah. It sucks to see Tumblr experience this ridiculous TikTok-ification. Jfc. Not every social media app has to be a version of TikTok.

App is vastly improved in the last 2 years. Now much more stable, with an efficient interface. You will still need the complete desktop website for some niche tools and settings, but this is an excellent, streamlined mobile experience. Other developers take note: this is how to rescue a terrible application and make something genuinely useful.

Have had this app for ages. Just reviewing now. Very fun, the exact content I want to see without an algorithm to show me what it thinks it wants. Tons of customization options when you explore the settings and options. Crabs are nice and the checkmark are funny. Just wish staff listened to the users on new stuff to add or remove, but overall the experience is the one you make on it.

There's a bug on the Android app where images appear tiny instead of stretched to fit the dimensions of the screen. I have brought this to the attention of the developers multiple times and they flat-out refuse to fix it. Some posts are completely unreadable due to this bug, and the Tumblr devs think this is acceptable.

Bots everywhere spewing out malicious URLs and instead of doing something to get rid of them, Tumblr has: -made it difficult to zoom in on images -made gifs tiny -made vids difficult to control (i.e. pause/play) -introduced a "feature" that no one wants, to the point where people TURN IT OFF, except that you can only turn it off temporarily Would not recommend

This application is a lot enjoyable! It's a great means to reveal your creativity, discover your interests and also make friends with people that share your enthusiasms. There's a fantastic variety of web content as well as the UI is conveniently accessible. The range of subjects is substantial, ranging from art as well as fandom to music, fashion and movie. I 'd highly suggest examining it out!.

I like the app overall, however when switching accounts, it seems you have to switch them on multiple tabs and for some reason when I go to look up an account to comment on them, it defaults me not to the account I'm currently switched to, but to my main account. I haven't found a way to comment as my other account or even switch them when I'm on the profile page.

Tumblr is a good platform to see some of the funniest blogs, but I hate the amount of scrolling ads there are, and to make it worse it's the same ad every single time appearing every 3 to 7 posts. Please fix this along with the search bug that has been going around

I personally like the app but especially since the website stopped working on my mobile phone so I had to download the app just to use the platform. But my biggest criticism is unlike online be a computer on your phone when you go on to your likes you can set it to where each liked posts ar e in GRIDS and they're going to be hundreds on a single page making it very easy to go through all of them whereas on the app you can only have the one page where each liked post will take a whole screen!

I still love and enjoy Tumblr! However, there are too many scammers as well as fake accounts. This is becoming a problem, and Tumblr needs to fix the scammer/fake account issue. There are other issues too, that would fill up this review. I hope that Tumblr will eventually correct the issues.
The new video ads is making my phone keep freezing and has to restart itself many times, it's so annoying. Plus, I'm on data saving mode, I shouldn't have gotten any videos shown

Every other update something gets broken. Devs need to stop playing games. First it was the darkmode function. Now I can't scroll through the "My Tags" filter of my dashboard without it falsely saying my internet is down & it refuses to load more content after maybe 3 posts. It also does this on the desktop site. Scrolling through the "My Tags" feed was my fav new feature they added too. I have like 1000 tags I'm following. There are more then 4 posts on my feed there.

1. Too many ads, 2. What's with peoples' blogs disappearing? It's happened three times to me. 3. Why can't I upload more than 8 pictures now? 4. Seriously, why the hell do asks get eaten? Fix these problems and I'll give five stars. Fix your current problems before adding new features that are chock full of problems.
Despise the new feature where clicking on an image leads to a place where you scroll through other images. It's unnecessary, useless, and annoying. Serves no purpose or function

The community is one of my favorites, so many positive and friendly people to chat with and learn about and swap interests with! There is some drama but that's anywhere you go, very thankful that they listen to the community and that they support artists so much, I do hope to see more features for artists in the future if possible as most social media apps lack support and infrastructure for small artists to gain traction and a following ‚ô° Love the inside jokes as well

I really like that this app is mainly for artists. Helps me find others in the art community as well as put myself out there as a artist! But I would really like it if tumbler had a favorites or save feature that would allow you to star your favorite artist or art work. Just my personal opinion but I think it would make this app even better! :)

Don't replace the account tab on the bottom right with a merch store on mobile, I've used this site since 2011 and never thought that was something I've ever needed - will make it more annoying when swapping between the dashboard and my blog (and losing my place on my dash in the process). Who actually uses the live stream feature on here anyway? and that wasn't wanted either, fix the bugs and glitches before changing things to be like every other damn boring, repetitive social media app
Since update issues The short movies when you click on them don't work. 3/4 of the movies are unplayable. The page jumps to the beginning multiple times.

Changed from four stars (three years ago) to two stars. Whoever owns Tumblr is ruining what was once my favorite social media site. Insists on updates WAY too often. The updates are NEVER actual improvements. The ads are offensive and bizarrely repetitive (two or three posts, AD, two or three more posts, SAME AD, two or three more posts, SAME AD, etc ad nauseam. Another great site/app going down the toilet. It's sad.

Updated to get polls and now 1. Cant zoom into pictures when I tap on them (full screen) 2. Cant switch between pictures in the post (reblog chain) by swiping 3. By scrolling up (usually exited full screen mode for videos and pics) I am taken to another pic or video from a random post, of someone i dont follow and with tags ive never interacted with. Being taken out of my chronological dash like that sucks and its making the app unusable for me.

It's a good app üëç, although sometimes when you are on a post from the creator & want to view there profile. It is still from the post viewed before. Because sometimes I just want to look at the masterlist not there popular notes . I don't want to have search there name Just to find the masterlist when it could literally be just one click. & the masterlist should be on top of the profile not million clicks away. That's all,, Tumblr is a lovely app and should be getting more hype ü´∂üèæü•∞!!

The ads and random streams took my entire screen. I can handle the ads but streams are just useless, no one even using it it's just bored people doing nothing or smoking, literally Instagram stream but forced for public to see. Is this really the quality you want? Better put it on lower bar so it doesn't disturb the experience on landing page. Not gonna use the app until you fix the goddamn UX.

Tumblr is a highly significant social media app not only for connecting to people and orgs but for distribution of culture. Similar to Pinterest it is a great tool for lateral thinkers and random association of ideas. My problem is to access and organize tumblers already joined more easily. So by date followed, alphabetically, similarities etc. Getting back to Tumblrs first followed is too difficult. Overall one of my go to apps for finding new stuff.

i love this platform but i wish for a few improvements (i use the android version of the app): 1. when you want to change your profile icon or header it would better if you could access your gallery directly too instead of just your files (it's easy to look for and select a picture from it) 2. i don't always get my messages notifications which is a bummer 3. when someone mentions you in a comment and you click it from your notifications it doesn't redirect you directly to it but to the post

It's a great app! Especially when you're saving images and all the other whatnots, but it's just sometimes when I'm scrolling after I've searched something it keeps moving to the other two sections which are Tags and Blogs, this also applies to the For You and Your Tags. I'm not sure if it's me or the app, or maybe my phone but anyways! I've given my rating (‡∏á ‚Ä¢ÃÄ„Çù‚Ä¢ÃÅ)‡∏á

With every upgrade it feels like the app is getting worse. The tagging system is dysfunctional, black listing posts is difficult if the algorithym doesn't follow the command when I want to discontinue seeing certain content/post. Please do better if you want people to use this app.

The app is great, for the most part, but the issues with mass-flagging and reporting are really severe. You can probably have someone gone in a day if you're dedicated enough, and staff doesn't check every report before termination. I've used the app for years, and the recent addition of tumblr live to the dashboard has made it harder to enjoy anyways.

Can we for once get an app that actually opens the links it says it does? I'm getting sick of tapping on links, it sends me to the app, and it only goes to the home screen of the app. This is not what a supported link is for, that is called a shortcut link. Please for the love of whatever higher being you believe in, just make links take you to the content you were linked to.

I love the app and some of the communities l, but I hate that if you minimize your application on your phone it takes you back to the home screen. I accidently hit the minimize bylutton all the time just to switch music and it exits me. It frustrating.

It's the app that lets you use Tumblr on your phone. It does almost as much as the desktop version, the ads in it are static and easy to scroll past, and it looks pretty. What more could you want? Highly recommend. Even if you're not on Tumblr yet.

I have to go into my settings at least twice to snooze the tumblr live until it actually makes it go away. I thought last week it was somehow me that did something wrong, but no, I have to actually go back to try again to make it go away until it does. And I can't stand the 'todayontumblr' that shows in the search, which tumblr wont let you block it. No surprise they wont allow it, but why even give the option i the three little dots then? Finally, don't even get me started on their ads lately.

I use this app to chat a bunch, but now when you send YouTube links you can't click on them to open them? You have to copy the whole message and then go paste that link in s browser just to see it... It always worked before, and it's not just me with the issue but everyone I'm chatting to on Tumblr also... Please fix it üò¨

Yeah it was reasonably happy with the app until around across alive blogger with the title TWA LP. Was absolutely the meanest verbally abusive person I've ever run across. Literally all I did was say hi to this person and she began to verbally abuse. Not cool in any way. Tried to report it to the app itself but your submit button is not working so kind of pointless. If your app gets better I will continue with it and if it gets worse I will give you a lower rating and will delete the app.

Okay, i love tumblr, really, but the app keeps crashing constantly! I cant even read one post before it crashes on me again. Im not sure if anyone else is having this problem, but i really hope that this can be fixed <3

It crashes sometimes out of nowhere, just because. The messaging function is still a mistery, you never know if it was sent or not. Don't even get me started on p**n bots, female pressenting nipples were never a problem in a first place. There's still no opion to report or block these bot's for what they are. Also, it's still impossible to navigate on mobile app, your own page taggs don't work and you will never find anything if you need it.
I don't know whether it's my phone or what, but it keeps freezing and crashing, no matter how many times I clear cache or restart my phone. This doesn't happen with other apps.

The auto play option and color palette keep changing to the default settings. I tried reinstalling the app but it's still the same. It's especially annoying if you're on data because even if you set auto play to wifi only, it goes back to "always play" when you log back in.

Tumblr Live is hot garbage but at least you could turn it off repeatedly. The new picture UI that you can't get rid of and "swipe up to see unrelated trash" is very bad. I won't be renewing my ad-free when it expires and I'll just go back to using Tumblr via browser with ad-block instead. Revert this awful change.

This was like the last app left that didn't get in your face with ads and now not only are they every other post, they are so visually jarring by contrast. As in my phone is dark mode but the ads are bright white, so it's blinding. So I can't use this app anymore, awesome.

Tumblr staff seem to be chomping at the bit to make the site and the app as user-unfriendly as possible; every new "feature" is worse than the last. The live banner and absolute wrecking of the video and image system in the latest update is the worst of all. If I could give it an even lower rating, I would.

Hellsite. But love it anyway <3 The reason for the 4 stars is because it's so broken sometimes on the app, (i can't change my blog's appearance on mobile and would need to go on desktop) but it doesn't really affects the experience. Maybe just a bit. Not all people esp the new ones will like it here, but the ones that do they'll stay. I've only been here for a year but I love it already. Jealous of ppl who'd been here for more than a decade. Where have I been. Thanks for the polls btw!

Newest update sucks. I can no longer zoom in on a picture at all, being able to zoom in is really important, for ex: some art is best viewed zooming in to see all the details. And if I accidentally swipe up I suddenly am looking at random videos from people I don't follow. Tumblr is about having a feed that is exclusively created by the user and NOTHING ELSE. Stop shoving Tumblr live and content that we don't follow down our throats. This update is BAD and you still haven't fixed the porn bots

Uninstalled and reinstalled recently, but now it won't allow me to do anything except Like posts. I can't go to my blog, manage my account, reblog, post, comment, or see my drafts. It's treating me like a site would when it wants you to verify your email, but I haven't changed my email recently, and these problems don't occur on the desktop version.
