Ever since Tumblr Live has been implemented, each subsequent update has reduced the functionality of the app, to the point that I'm seriously considering uninstalling; the addition of the merch store in the same location the profile icon used to be is brazen and awful, and the ads they're running now are routinely lagging out my phone, to the point that my attempts at scrolling away register as taps and open an ad I did NOT want to click. If they fix these issues I'll update my review.

There are a few applications that make me more angry than this one. From 2006 performance to archaic sign in requirements to erroneous advertisements and horrible search engine optimization. This company has been doing its best to kill itself for nearly a decade. If it weren't for its users, it would have been dead years ago.

Horrible. The sheer amount of video ads causes huge stuttering when I scroll. When I got to a specific user I follow, the scrolling is fine, but the feed page is atrocious. The amount of nonsensical, useless junk boggind down this app makes the experience horrible now. I've never had this scrolling issue 'til now.

have spent many years on this app and hope to spend more in the future, but recent developments have been absolutely terrible. if I wanted a video feature id have tiktok (I dont). if i wanted algorithmic suggestions I'd go on the page for that (I try not to) or on a different app (which I avoid because of the endless algorithmic suggestions) have also been scared to update bc of the shop replacing the profile link-not opposed to the shop (get ur money where u can) but it's bad placement üëéüëéüëé

For some reason it became completely and utterly unusable after the last update. It lags so hard when I'm trying to scroll anywhere at all that the whole app freezes for thirty seconds or more at times before its even possible to scroll again. If that gets fixed, it's 5 stars again

Recent updates have rendered it unusable over the last couple of months. I follow a lot of pixel artists and so many gifs cause the app to slow down and lag horrendously becoming barely responsive and practically unusable. This was never an issue until roughly 2 or 3 months ago.

Can't zoom in on images anymore. Makes it impossible to read small text in an image, especially when small text is at the bottom of the image because post text & details will be put on top of the image. This recent update makes me want to use one of the unofficial tumblr apps that are soley focused on image viewing.

I've been using the Tumblr app for 2+ years and it's been a pretty decent app, no issues, until now. In less than a month, I've been logged out of the app and each time it's asked me to reset my password. This was never an issue before. I understand the need to change the password every so often, but not every time I have to re-login.

Latest update changed how videos look on mobile and the post covers up part of the video. Also not sure how to rewind a video which is going to be a problem if you're going to have it auto-mute on opening. Y'all did so well with polls, you can do better.

All the controls are on the right side and way too sensitive to touch - can't turn a page or scroll without rebloggoing or accidentally reporting - no " undo " features so constantly mis posting and reporting. Why would you put the controls on the same side people scroll from....just stupid.

It's pretty good.It's really simple too use and is pretty straightforward.There's notes (or likes) and reposts. It is kind of unclear how to enable asks though. The search is pretty easy to use. It crashes sometimes but Im sure it's just my tablet doing that. The ads only pop up as a basic Tumblr post format.And they don't show up over and over, which would be repetitive. The only other problem I have with this app is all the bots following me.It just keeps happening and it's annoying. 10/10 tho

I don't care the update to where tags you follow are no longer on the search page and that trending topics are the third option on search. It makes it harder to find content I want to look at and it's harder to find what is trending. It just feels less user friendly.

I hate how much of the app is now dedicated to recommended content and advertisment. I don't like that I can't permanently turn off Tumblr live, a feature no one's really wants or uses. I liked that Tumblr didn't have an algorithm or bombard me with ads and it's why I used it over other apps. Now that that's changed and ads and the algorithm are inescapable, I will not be using this app

While there are many talented users, there's a major bot issue on the platform. This in turn has been making it hard to have an enjoyable experience. Really wish the Tumbler Team would tackle this issue, seeing as it's gotten out of hand the past 2-3 months.

When they "flag" a post you have already flagged "after they reviewed you post" the user cannot dismiss the eyesore hovering on the post finishing the experience. More intuitive messaging would help along with the ability to dismiss and not have that alert permanently on your post. They do this to lock the mature status flag, it's just poorly executed. For every step they take forward the take two back

The new changes to UI are awful. Photos and gifs are minimized and super small. You can no longer zoom in on pictures upon pressing on them. There's a non-removable NEW notification for Tumblr Live, a function no one asks for nor wants. And now a Tumblr Store button replacing the profile button. Awful changes. Stop trying to make Tumblr like Tik Tok. I don't want tik tok I want Tumblr.

Once you've understood how the tumblr platform works and how to use it correctly, it really is good fun. It took me some time to realise how it works, but now I'm finding it quite simple and straightforward. Really lovely posts and uploads to read and enjoy. Interesting stuff. Amazingly good.

Zero stars. Tumblr live still sucks and is forced on you, no way to disable just weekly snooze. Bots still overrun the site + ppl fill tags w/ spam. Since the last update 99% of the time added GIFs and other images are microscopic. No longer able to zoom images on mobile which sucks because they're compressed to the point of unreadability often--instead you get scrolled to a bunch of images from random people you don't follow. I DON'T FOLLOW THEM FOR A REASON!!!!

Please revert it back to the original organisation for "tags I follow" being under the search bar. It's incredibly annoying to go against muscle memory and makes no sense to scroll through three tabs on the main dashboard without the option to easily see all the tags I follow. Thanks in advance.

I gotta say the app has gotten so much better with age. I remember back when images didnt load on wifi. Things have changed a lot since then. Sure some parts of the user experience are unique but at least it functions well overall. I don't even use the website on my laptop anymore. I'm really impressed by how far it has come. It just shows the the dedication and time that went into it.

the tumblr live feature is a gross invasion of privacy (it tracks your location) and unable to be permanently turned off (only snoozed for a week) and the replacement of the profile tab button with the shop button is one of the worst ui/ux decisions I have ever seen and makes the app nigh unusable. there is no world where I would rather look at your merch store than check my own page. ads also clip into other posts, especially videos, while you're scrolling making them unviewable.

Wow! I didn't think the app could get any more broken, but I have been proven wrong once again. It's trying to be a TikTok/Insta knockoff and it's just plain sad. You can no longer zoom in on images and the video player no longer allows you to change the timestamp. They've replaced the account tab with the merch store, and now it's extremely difficult to even VIEW your own damn account. The app crashes constantly too. I've been a loyal user since 2017, but the mobile app is god awful right now.

It's a great app in general, but I hate tumblr live. What's worse is you only have the option to "snooze" it, not turn it off entirely. Take a hint yall, and let people turn off the option for good if they want to. The only one who likes that feature is the bots.

the current roll out of updates (change to the image and video viewing UI, exchanging the account tab for the store) is disgusting. most of the userbase does not want it. polls are fine, but please listen to your userbase when they tell you they don't like something.

Used to be a big Tumblr user ~7 years ago and only recently picked it back up again. It's as good as I remember! Great for photography or art inspiration in general. I like the customizable themes as well.

Be warned, if you're unlucky, they will terminate your account for seemingly no reason and not give you any reason as to why. I had a blog for many many years and they suddenly deleted it out of the blue. Have seen stories of people never getting their accounts back after multiple failed attempts to contact support. Good luck!

Love Tumblr tho the app can be a bit bad occasionally. Updates are hit and miss but it works for the most part. An annoying bug right now is that some images aren't sized correctly so you need to be an ant to read them. But it's pretty alright

(11/14/22) The newest update has messed up the color pallette and now it doesn't keep dark mode for everywhere. Posts and the activities screen are white. (03/10/23) The inclusion of other site features is detracting from the original aim of tumblr and definitely something I nor other users are wanting from this platform.

Tumblr is a great app for anyone that likes the internet and all its material. It's full of art, fandoms, and memes, and it's always upgraded with the current patterns. Whether you're trying to find something to occupy your spare time or you simply wish to explore the latest happenings on the internet, Tumblr is the app for you.

Insane amount of ads all of a sudden. One every 2-3 posts. They take up the entire screen, start playing immediately and have sound. A lot of them are pretty suggestive or outright NSFW. thanks for making the app worse with every update I guess

The new update is awful! If you have the old version, don't update!! Tumblr live is a waste of space and nobody wants it. Snoozing it isn't enough, we want it gone. The shop icon replacing the account icon for some users is sus. It needs to be fixed. Not being able to pause videos or zoom on pictures is ridiculous. Why? Just why?? And staff has done next to nothing about the spam bots that we have to block and report daily. And fix the tag system while you're at it!
Beautiful photography, a lot of variety to choose from in subjects, enjoyable experience, different from other platforms in my opinion. Art, photography, interesting subjects, etc.

Tumblr has a serious problem with bots and it's starting to annoy me. Not only do they clutter the tags, they also follow my account and it's a pain trying to individually block them all. The UI for mobile devices suck and it's not easy to navigate the posts for the tags I follow. Sometimes when I scroll through a blog, the posts end up repeating. I highly suggest Tumblr to fix their bot issues and work on the UI before putting in new features because this is getting ridiculous.

Good points: chronological feed, tagging system, private likes, multiple blogs.. Issues: tumblr live has a user-unfriendly design requiring you block it once a week, blocking notpikaman doesn't prevent their sponsored posts from appearing on my dash, the 'open in app' button when viewing posts from the browser doesn't work and takes you to the app store even if the tumblr app is already installed, can't mute someone without entirely blocking them, has a spambot problem at the moment.

Tumblr is kinda confusing to navigate first starting out, the bots are kinda... And generally i feel tuning ones feed is difficult. Otherwise though i enjoy being able to look at what i want when i want to and community is somewhat easy to interact with which is nice.
Absolutely ridiculous. I can't scroll for more than a few seconds and the app crashes. If I go to open it, the app freezes. The updates are not needed and these bugs need to be fixed.

Remember when it was a meme to say that the Tumblr app was unusable and buggier than a behive? Haha. Yeah. It's worse now. Latest updates include Tumblr live (full of bots, no real users using it, app crashes whenever it comes back on bc you can only snooze it for 7 days) and the removal of the profile button from the bottom right of the app (replaced by the Tumblr store.) Feels insidious to "trick" peoples muscle memory to force them to open your shop instead. Just gets worse every update...

Its ok as an app but 1 adverts are so god damn annoying and 2 tumblr needs to do something about their bloody spam accounts and porn bots no matter how many times u report the fricking accounts that come up, tumblr appears to be doing nothing about it. You cannot even email the company about issues either if there is an issue with something more drastic. Sort it out.

It's honestly astonishing, how are you always this bad tumblr??? No one likes the "live" function, especially the """snooze""" to turn it off only lasts a week if that. Make it a permanent off feature. No one wants a market place button either. Every update makes this app unusable.

Veteran user, disgusted by "Tumblr TV". No idea what the plan there is. The "live" stuff is US mainly as there's so many EULA data concerns about it. And you can't ignore it, you have to snooze it for a week. I was thinking of buying ad-free to support the site. Haha. Nah. Not until this stuff blows over. If you want to make changes to video and picture don't make it inaccessible. Stop trying to mimic every other terrible app's shift to video. I'm avoiding updates for now.

Was alright but the new update is impossible to use. The new UI for photos means you can't zoom in which makes seeing some stuff difficult, and the shop (?) replacing the account tab is a pain. It wasn't broken, so who decided to "fix" it?

The app is becoming unrecognizable, especially concerning this new update that makes it harder to view your own blog. Tumblr is slowly losing all the functionality and features that made me like it in the first place, so my time on this app is limited, and waning fast. ‚úåÔ∏è

I'm reminded of Tumblr's quality as I follow an artist's link from their Instagram to their Tumblr, and clicking the "Open App" button still leads to the Google Play store instead of the actual app. It's probably been this way for the better part of a decade. Despite years of tweaks, revisions, and constructive criticism, Tumblr maintains it's title belt as the worst social media website. To be clear: I love that and I hope it never changes.

They took my page down, no timely warning, all of it gone. They communicated with me about log-ins etc. Then, like a bolt from the blue. It's gone, you can't ever see it again. I gave it 2 stars instead of the eternity in hell these so-and-so's deserve because before they ruined it and for a long time after they ruined it it was a great app. It really hurt.

The newest update has made the app nearly unusable. Users cannot access their account in the convenient manner we were able to before. Instead, the website's merch store has claimed the place where we could once view our own blogs. Its purposeless and obnoxious. Another huge issue is all the spam accounts. Every day after login I find between 1-4 have followed me. Tumblr live is also a useless and pointless new feature. The only good thing added are the polls. Do better, Tumblr.

Tumblr is the only social media site I use anymore. However, I am downgrading my review from 5 stars to 3 for two reasons. 1- as others have mentioned, the Tumblr year in review function doesn't work on mobile; instead, it refreshes your dash extremely rapidly until you close the app. This is an accessibility issue and a potential seizure or migraine trigger for some users. 2- the recent introduction of Tumblr Live. I don't want to snooze it, I want it to have an off switch or its own tab.

The newest update on Android made it so you can't scroll through your suggested posts and instead have to individually click on them, I don't like that too much. But other than that's it's still the same old experience, nice I can actually see the #10 trending spot again!

New image viewer literally nonfunctional. Devs keep adding features no one wants instead of dealing with the massive bot problems or fixing longstanding bugs (often even adding new ones like how images on text posts are tiny now. Been that way for what fes like months). Polls where nice though.

The new update replaced the account tab with the store tab which is extremely shady and annoying. The new tiktok like video feature is overwhelming, disripts the dashboard flow, and cannot be opted out from which for an userbase that hates tiktok is quite an unwise choice. Images added to posts are so minuscule they create an accessibility problem for both visually impaired people and people with a small screen. Staff needs to research their userbase better.
developer_response: Hi there! Thank you for your detailed feedback, we appreciate it! Some good news, we're currently working on moving the account tab back to where it used to be (More on https://changes.tumblr.com). If possible, please send us a ticket about the image issue with screenshots and links to examples: https://www.tumblr.com/support. Thanks!

review_description: This app feels completely broken and a not-so-nice layout compared to the website. Plus, when editing the pfp or banner of my account, it completely crashes the app and I get stuck on a black screen, I cannot find any thing within my phone to cause this issue

please, for the love of god, get rid of tumblr live. the app is filled with bots now. and why did you scale down low res images? i have to squint at my phone now. the little stuff to monetize your platform better is fine, the ads are fine, all of that's fine. but this is genuinely making the app/site unusable and it hurts- tumblr will never be a video-based platform

Idk what's been happening with the app lately, but it's a struggle to just type a post. The app keeps freezing and shutting down. I literally can't type a short paragraph without it freezing constantly.

The messaging feature seems to be broken, as someone who I'm constantly sharing posts to, is now no longer an option. I can't seem to share any more as they don't pop up as an option, nor can I search them on the message share. Although i can message them normally.

Great pics and stuff. Still a little weird navigating sometimes, which you wouldn't expect from an app this old. After some use I am familiar with the movement and the app is pretty good. Still a four star because of the movement.

I've been on this platform for years, but it still astounds me how little-to-bad the organization methods here are! The only way of organizing your posts are tags, which if you're a beginner and didn't use tags frequently enough, all your posts get buried and it's hard to organize your blog after. It would be nice to organize stuff by year, visibility, or the original poster, as now I have hundreds of posts on my blog and I can't differentiate anything.

The app gets worse and worse with every update. Not only have they added an annoying "live" section at the top of our dashboards that you're forced to manually mute every seven days, they've also replaced a vital feature with a shortcut to their store in an effort to shill their shoelaces. No thought was put into these changes except to maximize their profits at the expense of our quality of life.

Not being able to answer a call on my watch but I can end the call is very annoying. I'd like to be able to answer. Much better recently probably the only call app that hangs into the call for dear life and doesn't drop when switching from wifi to 4g. Just has a few annoyances when it doesn't want to connect the call or gives an error.

This is so heavily geared toward iPhone that it's disgusting. I had line on my old phone, an iPhone X. It worked flawlessly. No issues aside from the very occasional update that broke it. I get a Samsung, suddenly this is almost Skype level. Messages will not load, it takes FOREVER for one of mine to even send, pictures take 20-30 seconds to load, IF they decide to. And there's this annoying message sending noise that is constantly there. And it took 11 hours for me to get a message today. 11!

Backup process has only gotten worse over time. In the past, at least you could save all your data, if in a manual and tedious process. Instead of improving this by a simple loop all function, Line has moved to Google Drive that only saves the text. No images are saved. And this process is very buggy and fails often. Line is too cheap to have their servers handle backups, too lazy to code a simple loop all for the old method and now too shortsighted to make Google Drive work well.

It's very fun to use this app !! But,it doesn't work properly sometimes. Video calls have some issues & make echoes/ noises if we're too close when we call.It seems hard for my elderly mom to use the video call feature .This app comes very handy whenever we're offline ,or no wifi available .I also used this app from U.K.this past summer to call mom in L.A.! The reception was very clear & chatted successfully via video call the most of times !! I was impressed !! I highly recommend this !!

Been using LINE for almost 4 years and my only qualms are the account transfers (it deletes everything) and for some reason, I am now unable to send photos. It's also very inconsistent with the issue. It doesn't matter if I'm on wifi or data. Sometimes it sends and sometimes it doesn't. This started about a week ago when the One UI update rolled out. I have an S9+. It looks like others are having the same issue with different devices. Please fix this.

I love this app however there are times when I'm trying to send a pic or 2 it will process. Then there are times it says "Unable to send." I checked to see if it was my phone, service provider, apps that could be causing a conflict and etc.... my friend who has a higher Samsung model isn't having any problems. I have a Note 8 and my friends that have a older model isn't having any problems. The problems started last week towards the end of the month and still happening. Please fix, I use daily.

I'm pretty upset that I can no longer get pop up notifications, even though it's still an option in the settings. I've also been having issues with receiving notifications for a while now. Sometimes they come in and at other times I get nothing until I open the app or send the person a message myself. This is incredibly inconvenient for a messaging app. This used to be my #1 messaging app, but with every update it just gets worse. At the very least fix the pop up notifications. Everyone wants them back.

Solid app. They recently added the ability to swipe a message to reply. Unfortunately, they have decided that swiping left on the message was the best way which is opposite of every other messaging app that allows swiping to reply. Please don't be different just to be different. Please change it so you have to swipe in on the message instead of swipping out. The swiping out doesn't work very well, especially when the message is only a few characters. Thank you.

I'm so sick of moving my conversations manually when I get a new phone. And if you lose your phone, good luck, your conversations are gone! There should be some default instant back up that you have to opt out of. It's a cool app in other ways but when his happens it's so annoying I can't even remember the good things. To LINE: fix this or you risk losing customers. You have market power now but don't depend on that when you have such an annoying feature compared to other apps!

I use line daily for a game I play. Recently, it's been having issues uploading images. I thought maybe there was an update. And there was!! However, it did not fix this uploading images bug. I have to continually resend image. Sometimes it will eventually upload. Sometimes after 100 tries, I get frustrated and just give up. Please fix this, and I will give you 5 stars.

I used to be able to set the notifications sounds but the last few updates do not have that option anymore. I have 2 accounts on two different makes of phones. I can set sonds on all my other messaging apps and the funny thing is that the line app sounds are in the lists on both phones. This is a pain for everyone if a message is received everyone looks at their phone and in my case I have to look at both phones. Put the sound option back to make everyone's life easier please.

I use this app everyday and for long periods of time on call, especially on quarantine, and until this latest update, the sound quality was decent and I could properly hear the other person. Now, hearing the other party is a struggle, and the sound quality has taken a drastic hit. The way that the call is displayed is also unnecessary, because the white background made everything easier to see. Please change everything back from the old update. This entire update was a whole mess.

At first Line was absolutely amazing. However, the last six updates have given me more headaches than i can even begin to count. During calls there is an ungodly high pitched echo that bounces between sides and progressively gets louder. Constant dropped calls. Microphone issues where there are none. Messages not sending until hours later when there is service/wifi connection. No notifications. Poor sound quality. I have changed phones and services, as well as desktop line. Please fix this.

This last few updates have ruined the video call feature. Now, the other person can't see my video... even though on my end, it seems fine. PLEASE FIX. Also, please return the old colors of the dark theme. The new green color is very uncomfortable and even painful to look at for too long, and it defeats the purpose of dark mode... which is to be less strenuous on your eyes at night. There was nothing wrong with the previous colors, and you have a lot of unhappy users after changing them.

Line free STILL not working! I don't know what you guys are doing, but how about spending less time on juvenile stickers and backgrounds, and more on call quality and clarity? Calls always drop, freeze, etc.. Most of the time it doesn't ring, or notify of messages. Bluetooth doesn't work in the car, even though it says all paired. Music will play, but can't hear on calls. Line free hasn't worked in a month,since last update. You should be able to save or stack the calls you did not use. 3 min?

I really enjoy talking with family overseas for free because of the LINE app! Because it's free I'm not complaining, but we have experienced some bugs lately. Last month none of us were receiving notifications or hearing incoming calls. Those magically resolved a couple weeks ago, but now when I receive a video call my image is upside down. üòÑ I looked in settings but can't find anything that might help.

There used to be a feature wherein effects during a group live stream could be used on the person streaming. That option is no longer there. I was wondering if it is possible to redeploy it. I'm also encountering an audio issue where an external bluetooth speaker automatically loses connection whenever a live screen cast is initiated. I hope you could look into that. Other than that, the app offers a good amount of features, even some you wouldn't come to expect from a messaging app. It is great

The charts feature doesn't work for sending or receiving. I keep getting pop-up notifications on my phone, telling me I have new line messages, but when I go to chats in the app, it says I have no new chats. The chat feature doesn't seem to be allowing me to send messages either. When I select a friend's name and hit "create message" I just get sent back to the select friend page. I'm hoping that I can fix by deleting the app and reinstalling...

In many ways it's a good app, but it it doesn't work as smoothly on Android as on iPhone. For example, when I send a message in a chat, and then hit the back button to return to the Chats list, it freezes for 2-3 seconds every time. It has been doing this for a long time and it never gets fixed, even though it's an obvious problem. I'd also like to see better backup and restore features, similar to WhatsApp.

Line is great but there's some things that can be pretty frustrating!! Notifications randomly lag throughout the day, and then when you open the app all of them flood through at once. Voice call quality is terrible and lags sometimes. It gets exponentially worse the more ppl are in a call. Also, I wish the pictures and videos could automatically be saved locally. I loose videos and gifs sometimes because of that.

I've had this app on multiple devices for years. However, at some point switching devices I had to rebuy all of my stickers because basically nothing carries over when you switch over your device. Also, my partner and I noticed we aren't getting notifications about recieved messages like we should. The settings for the messages don't work properly. The app never uses the tone I set for it. It's very disappointing because this was my favorite texting app for a very long time.

The app is nearly perfect, and the only good alternative to discord I've been able to find, however, screensharing looks like stop motion, especially on mobile, it's so bad it might as well be removed as a feature entirely. Additionally, it would be nice to be able to go back and edit past messages, and to be able to upload and save pictures as custom emojis. Other than this, I highly recommend

TERRIBLE backup. When you get a new phone, you can transfer your chats to the new device but only the text, without the photos, stickers and other media your friends have sent you. The option LINE provides is to save things to a "Keep" feature. If I want to save things separately, I can do that myself! It is 2021, why is LINE's backup from another decade? It's incredibly frustrating!

Can't see messages. I have the One Plush 8T and the app seems to be messing up. I will get notifications that I received a message. I go to check and there is nothing there. A while later (minutes to even hours) the messages show up. I have good connection too. Uploads are hit or miss as well. Most of the time it struggles to upload a small file. This app needs a fix FAST!!

LINE is going downhill. "Cannot send message", after sending a message. This is still not fixed. -Also they seem to be fixated on packing the app with features more than realiability and stability. I've been using this app for a long time and the very oldest version was the best. I'll never forgive line for telling me -sorry all of your old messages cannot be moved to your new phone. I manually backed up everything for years and they told me that they won't work with the new versions anymore.

The most bizarre data storage model I've ever seen - messages *are* stored on their servers, I know because they're delivered if I was offline for a while, but every message is kept in my device's persistent data storage (as opposed to cache storage), so after a few months of use, LINE had consumed over 2.5GB of my device storage. And clearing the app's data on my phone apparently deleted (my copy of) all of those messages from LINE's servers as well, because afterwards all of my chats were still there, but were completely blank, with no way to recall the prior messages. For comparison, my 8 other chat apps *combined* use just under 1GB of storage. Spammy with ads for IAPs (stickers, themes, etc.). Default notification setting is set to "annoying and obtrusive" mode - big floating pop-up, even turns on screen if off. Weird interface makes it hard to find some settings - they're not all found in one place. Account is linked to a physical device, not to a username and password. Sure, you can *add* a username/password to allow you to access your chats (on ONE computer only), but if you get a new phone, or factory reset your current phone, there's no way to reconnect it to your existing account, you have to create a new one. Want to use LINE on a tablet without telephony? Good luck. All of these design decisions make no sense to me. Only reason for giving two stars instead of one is that the app does work, for the basic purpose of sending & receiving messages.

Used to love this app. I thought the video chat was phenomenal, messaging reliable, easy to use, great for easy access storage for communications etc. Now? 70% of the time messages fail, take forever to load, show as delivered but never delivered, etc. All of this while comparing side by side with the recipient of the messages. Phone and app fully updated, storage not close to being met, full data and wifi. It isn't just my account malfunctioning either, numerous friends too.

I use this app a lot of time before. The calls used to be good quality. But now, everytime I make calls it will only last 10 mins. Or less then it will hang up. The video call can hold a call, it doesnt hang up after 10 mins. Of use. Another issue is that the incoming texts does not alert me even if my alerts are on. My friend is having the same issue, so i guess its not on my part but the app itself. Please fix this, Line app used to be good.

I thought I was the only one experiencing issues until I read everyone else's recent May reviews. I can't send or receive any messages unless I'm on Wi-Fi. The app does not work on mobile data. It is very frustrating and I hope it is fixed soon. Sometimes I don't get notified new messages even though I have notifications turned on. I would have to go into the chat to check if I received messages and they would be there.

Constantly delayed notifications. Recently, I can't send photos to people without the app crashing or having to restart. If I try to send a photo and it fails, I have to restart my phone or I won't be able to send anything. This app has been spotty for years with notifications, but these new problems are enough to get me to write a review, and not a good one at that. 2/10 wish I hadn't spent money on stickers...

I have been using Line for a long time. Recently, while making Video Calls there is a lot of background noise. This is happening on both ends. It is so bad you cannot hear each other. I switched over to WhatsApp using same connections and phones there is no background noise the connection is clear. I will keep monitoring Line and when this problem is cleared up I will go back to using Line. The problem seems to be on my end using my Samsung Galaxy S8.

Another user here who is getting notifications but no new messages when I open the app. I'm also almost completely unable to send messages. They take several retries to go through, if the ever do. Sometimes I can untick the messages by creating an album, but now even that is taking retries and a lot of waiting to work. This app used to be amazing up until a couple months ago. Sadly, it's just about useless to me now. I've had to switch to Discord. Will probably completely uninstall Line soon. :(

Good chat app, a must for staying in contact with friends in my game. Unfortunately, there's a problem with creating albums in chat rooms. When I attempt to switch to albums of specific screenshots on my phone, images from my general screenshots are what I'm shown. A similar thing happens when I try to switch to photos from my fishing trip, and instead I am shown shots from my camera roll. This is very frustrating, because I created the albums on my phone to make it easier to find the pics that I want for the chat room album.

I can't send or receive messages. It's been happening since the last update. Please hurry and fix!!!!! I get notifications of new messages, but when I open it, it doesn't appear. It use to happen every now and then, but lately it's been happening every single day, maybe 2-4 times a day. It use to be able to fix with just a restart, force closing the app, and clearing cache. Now none of those solutions work anymore. Please fix!!!!!

Used App for 3-4 years and works well with lots of features. Just have one irritating problem/question - sometimes when I take screenshots on my phone and upload to line chat group, the app seems to reduce the quality or re-save it (no settings to change this) and causes it to become blurry and sometimes illegible for small text. This is very frequent, ongoing issue. Please can developer look into this and advise. Thank you.

Always used line for contacts in Japan. Suddenly about a little over a week ago I couldn't send messages (as well as receive). Now it is a constant problem. If I clear the cache, it works for a little bit. I've also tried soft stopping it, restarting phone phone, and reinstalling the app. Hope this gets fixed soon - virtually unusable as is.

Since the last update, I find it very difficult to answer line calls. Before, the call screen used to come up on the entire screen, whether I was using my phone or not and I could easily answer. Now, a pop up appears behind other apps and it's very difficult to navigate. Please change it back, or make this an optional setting!

calls drop a bit too often, app sometimes bugs out and will NOT open whatsoever, then have to reinstall (happened thrice already), and offers only work half the time and most of them are barely worth mentioning. but the messaging still works fine, stickers are pretty fun and varying, and finding friends via ID is simple and quick. some of the issues could just be my model phone, but still would be nice to get it looked into.

Could you guys please make notifications less obtrusive? I mean, like, is there a option for me to set the text notifications to just vibrate, Instead of taking up the top half of my screen? Because the way it is now, the notifications take up too much of the screen and it gets annoying when im recieving a lot of messages from different people. If there's an option for this, im not seeing it. Thanks. Aside from this issue, I enjoy this app very much. Its smooth and responsive, good job.

Terrible. Gets more bloated and unusable every year. I have a modern, high end phone and line crashes frequently. Also notifications seem bugged and don't disappear after viewing a message. Line for business is also complete garbage, and I missed vital messages from clients. All this was ok because line lite used to exist, but that's over with and all we have left is this bloated mess of an app. But no choice but to use it because everyone else does.

It's been a week at least, if not more, since photos last worked properly. Please fix this problem, I miss using LINE the way I used to. Edit: Two updates, including one just now, and still no fix for the sent/received photos in sight. I just don't understand why this happened, nor why it continues to be so broken over half a month later.

It's okay. I only use the chat feature but what i don't like about sending voice notes is that recordings always erase while I'm in the middle of recording and then i have to start all over again. Or if I'm listening to a recording and i need to so before it ends, then i have to start all over. You should have a option to press record and not have to hold it to talk and also, a day forward and rewind option.

Come on devs, fix your app. You guys throw out all these updates for new things but focus on fixing the notifications. I can never know if i got a message or not. I have to open the app to see and when i do, i get messages from an hour ago. I backed up my history, deleted and reinstalled the app and restarted my phone but it still doesn't fix the problem.

Great for communication, especially if you enjoy using stickers and emojis. Very easy to connect with people and personalize your experience while doing so. I've had issues of not getting notifications whatsoever for some reason, a common experience with my last phone and current one. Not the biggest deal, but an odd bug.

Line is well-designed. I like the UI a lot. However, login is very unfriendly if you switched to a new SIM or phone. You need the old phone to confirm new device login. But if you don't have the old phone, you can't login! This is a DEAD LOOP!! I have my email linked to the account but that's useless. Please fix this!! So many people gave up using LINE because of the troublesome login.

Can't use on two devices anymore. I loved this app for years, spent a lot of money on stickers and themes, and used to switch seamlessly between the PC and mobile versions. Now I have LINE on phone and tablet. Still only two devices, but the app refuses to work when I try to chat on tablet. I get an error about already having it on another device. Duh! Unbelievable that I can't access my own account on whichever device I'm using. Absolutely archaic app desperately needs updating.

The voice call quality seems great, video quality seems to be hit or miss. Doing a video call I would generally suggest Facebook messenger, I get better quality with less freezing of the video. My number 1 complaint about the app is at least on my android device, once on a video call, I cannot change the call from speaker phone to Bluetooth or vice versa. It drives me crazy because if I happen to get a call on my number, I have to hang up and call the person back

Managing groups sucks anyone can change any of the information including names, profiles pics, gallery images. Very poor when it comes to trying to manage a larger group. You can't administrated because everybody is an administrator. Also anything shared pictures and so forth can just be easily found and saved by whomever so you share one pic in a group of 400 everyone can save it. Doesn't even have privacy settings on your personal albums. Very poor design.

This app was great, but now is becoming super annoying... after receiving a message from someone while having that conversation open, then closing it, recieve a notification for an unread message from them right after... and it's just the one that they sent while you had the chat open. 3 updates since it started and still not fixed. I know it isn't just my phone either, the same thing is happening to the other person.

It WAS a good app but customer service is terrible. I can never get ahold of anyone. Also, I used to be able to save this app on my phone's memory card. But, not anymore. Why it's that? It's a HUGE app, takes up lots of space. I need to be able to transfer it. Furthermore, I earned some Line points and never received them. Contacted customer service and it and never fixed.

Much better. This app works great. When I had to get a new SIM card, I even was able to save my contacts in the keep section and I just read downloaded all my contacts to my phone within 3 seconds. This app is a great way to backup photos so you don't have to pay your phone plans cloud coverage. definitely a good way to keep contacts and have those such things on your phone as a backup just in case you need a new phone or a new SIM card. Plus it's also secure which is really nice.

Great app. Been on it for years. Only problem is, they have promotions to get points. You download and complete challenges on other apps to get LINE points. Completed some, got them. Then I started completing others, no points. Contacted them the way they say you should, no response. I know not everything is running the way it should these days, but at least respond to my inquiries. Completed the challenges for Raid, and a slot machine game. Still waiting on my points, for months.

Messages never send, or they look like they never send, and then all of a sudden all of them go through at once and someone gets spammed. If I have a message stuck in "sending," I'd like to be able to still see it, so I know it's actually going through. I do like that I can talk to my Japanese relatives through LINE, and I often use the video calling feature.

Not only is the app more or less a basic IM interface. But there is a common issue in being able to verify your phone number, since the app fails to send verification codes. They also fail to mention that despite this being an issue they'll block your number from further verification for irrational periods of time despite never trying a code that wasn't received. It's close to impossible to contact customer support and there is no open dialogue, just standard CYA apologies.

I like line app, it has lot of good features even better than whatsup. But it has major weaknesses, here are few possible improvements. 1) it's headache to move your account and all the content of chats to a different phone. It has to be user-friendly and straightforward. 2) give the option to not show status read, existing in lot of apps 3) for whatever reason, pictures and videos disappear after certain time. Not good These are most important improvements necessary. Thank you

Horrible experience with the split display. It sucks. The split display offers users dreadful experience with such a small text and unnecessary friend list on the left screen that you think it is a so-called USER FRINDLY but in fact it is NOT AT ALL Just BRING BACK THE BIG SCREEEN!!!

Everything is alright before, but since about a year ago, every time I open the app, it doesn't refresh by itself, and there's also no way to refresh it. It really bothers. Because of this problem, I missed lots of messages and news. Please work on that, cause it's pretty ridiculous that it takes SO LONG for those new messages to show up.

Why has this stopped downloading & notifying users of new messages? Seems messages no longer come through until actively opening the app interface. Pretty much pointless having a messaging app which doesn't let you know when you've been sent messages. Was my preferred messaging app until this started. Have had to go back to WhatsApp which I hate using but at least I know when I've got messages with that,unlike line which is becoming less use with every update.

Hi I use sunsung z fold 4. When I use multi view, line app. separate half: half . I think it should be separate 1/3 or 1/4 . It's not a very good app. If I receive a notification with a message, when I go to the chat it takes minutes for the message to appear. Also when I receive a voice message it doesn't have the feature to listen to it close to my ear so that only me can hear it not everyone else around me!

Still after this update me and my friend make calls but we cannot see it coming, messages not going on time, we recieve eachother messages after 30 minute or 1 hour gap, if we made call successfully the call keep on disconnecting, tried chaning phone aur net connection but the issues remain the same. Serious issues with line.. i think this app will die soon.. never seen such issues before with line.

I have followed every step of every help article out there. I have a Galaxy S22 Ultra and everything is updated. I never once received a verification code; not even in my spam messages. It used to be amazing but with the new update store stopped loading and just shows white blank screen :/ and now this app doesn't opens up the image after clicking the image. This app is becoming worse after each update, urgh!!!!

I HATE that I can only sign into 1 device with 1 account. I MUST be able to sign into 1 account on MULTIPLE devices. I went to update the app on my Play Store & it just kept updating, installing & needed to update again. I did this 4 times & still needed updating.
Reinstalling on a new phone, but the verification text never sends, the call never comes, etc. I can't log back in to my account. It seems I'm not the only one having this issue.

just having problems with the data. I wish for a system where we can use 2 devices on a singgle account, or atleast have a system where we can transfer data from pc to phone. The split screen version of the app for fold 4 is annoying. Bought a big screen phone for a better experience not to struggle to read messages. It would be better if you have an option to change to regular screen or split screen if anyone likes it.

They apparently changed the app so that on tablets you are stuck with an awful layout with the friends list down one side, and the active chat window down the other. This is my 2nd day trying to create an account. I never received a verification code sms, neither the call informing the verification code. Now every time that I try to sign up, a message says that I have to wait for 7 days. I need urgently to my family from other country and it has been embassing to ask them to create a group in use another app, so we can chat and solve a family issue.

I got a new phone and when I tried to login it asked for my password. I couldn't remember it so I tried to reset it using my email. It didn't accept my email and now I'm locked out of the app. They have absolutely zero customer service via chat, phone or email. So now it appears I'm permanently locked out of the app with no options. If you download Line do NOT forget your password!

I've been using Line for 6+ years - it has great overall functionality, but the ONE thing we really need now is an in-message/per post translation option, where one can simply click on a post and translate it (to whichever language the user has set as their default). Installing several different translators as Line currently offer, is bloating chats - it is very distracting to have a discussion with a few people who speak different languages, say English, Spanish and German).

It's ok. I had to reinstall the app to get the notification sounds, and it would be much more convenient and space friendly if we could move the app to external storage such as a mini SD Card in our phones/tablets.

I dont know what's always so wrong when it comes to samsung, it cannot ringing out on the main speaker. After installing the Line app (version 13) on a brand new Samsung Galaxy A13 I experienced camera and microphone connection problems. I can't call or make a video call. After transferring my data from my Galaxy s9 to my Galaxy s22 Line won't let me log in with my cell number or email or Facebook after numerous attempts even though I logged in via Facebook my 1st time signing on about 3 weeks ago which was easy and successful. I use the App Line on Samsung Zfold 3 and the online is not full. I don't like this. Not before. It was just January. I don't like having a screen split in 2 like this, wish the app developer would edit it as one screen like before.

Wasted so much time trying to register this app. It never ever sent verification codes to my phone. Tried multiple times, tried different settings, not a user friendly app, especially if you can't even make it through verification phase. Terrible.
Always good, always working, with minor exceptions. Video call is great, speed is good, can send pics, videos, create albums. Cool emojis, too. Excellent app!

Cannot even verify to use the app. Texts don't send, "call me instead" doesn't work. Help article is unhelpful and doesn't provide any actual solutions. Customer service inquiries opens the app, which I can't use, because I'm not verified. Useless.

My favorite messaging app! I love all the stickers & themes. I just wish my themes would show the extra little picture when launching the app, instead of the green Line logo. It stopped working ever since I got a new phone.
It is useless now, other person can't hear properly when on Audio call tried switching everything in advance call setting, still the same. Frequent call drop, network drop Etc.

I only used LINE because many Japanese friends only had this communication app. I hated LINE. Now I hate it even more. I forgot to update my phone number. Bad. Customer care is bad as well. Avoid unless really necessary like living in Japan. Moreover, don't pay anything for it. Not one penny. Not worth it.

It used to be a good app. But for the past month it really inconvenient me so much! Messages comes in and I can't see it. The notifications are there but when I opened the app, no messages came in. And it seems like I'm not the only user having this issue.

Instantly uninstalled it. Guess people still use Tinder. I'm not about that. There's a location option, but it never ever narrows it down to your city, so you only get people from other cities. Your filters eliminate possible candidates so be careful with how specific you are. I'd say this is an upgrade from Zoosk. I did like that it gives you a 1 day payment option, but you still have to pay to be able to chat or see who likes you. Easy to navigate, but it's just that location problem.
developer_response: There are several reasons why you may see people from other cities: Members who have voted for you while visiting your location will still be shown. Once you‚Äôve voted on all the members in your area, our system will automatically find other members from places slightly further away from your location. Hope this helps üíú

review_description: While yes it is a free app to download, to see who has liked you or do any more than look at people will cost money. Also, looking through the "near by" option I saw a lady I thought was very pretty, I looked to see what she said about herself and liked what I read. At the end of her profile was her location and she lives over 1500 miles away! I'm looking for a relationship and a 1500+ mile drive is unacceptable. I'm not happy that I have to change my filters back to my settings everyday.
developer_response: Hi Jeff! We are sorry to hear you say this. We have designed the app so that our members can find what they are looking for with the free version too. Please contact us using @BadooHelp on social media or via badoo.com/feedback and we try our best to help üòÉ

review_description: This app is great but lacking a few features. As a software engineer, having the option to only show people less than 50 miles from you should have been implemented a long time ago. I'm sick of mostly being shown people that are 80+ miles away, which from where I live, is a completely different state! I live in the capital of my state, there are lots of people here, show them to me. edit2: the app is not capable of setting radius, only sets location in one setting of the app. other than that, age
developer_response: Your opinion really matters to us! So thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so it can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!

review_description: The ads are so bad and frequent, it motivated me to: make a review about it, and delete the app. I had zero success with it anyway. I understand that ads are necessary. The issue is that they are very abrupt, frequent, and due to how and when they appear on the screen, they are really annoying compared to other apps. Considering that I didn't get any results anyway, the app was not worth putting up with the ads. One time I swiped, got an ad, swiped just once more, and got ANOTHER AD. Ridiculous
developer_response: We're sorry to hear that you are unhappy but we appreciate your honest feedback. We've taken this onboard and will consider making this change in future updates.

review_description: It is what it says it is. It is a swiping/dating app, and it's pretty simple to use. It's just annoying to use also. For people nearby and live stream, there is no real concept of "nearby. " It needs to sort by distance. The bump feature needs it's own category, so you can better keep track of people you bumped into. Also I get the notification about a bump about an hour later. Guys can practically not talk to anyone without upgrading. Not sure why who favorited you requires upgrade.
developer_response: Hi Ray! Thank you for taking the time to provide invaluable feedback. We have now forwarded this onto our in-app developers for further review and consideration.

review_description: Terrible customer service. I understand that the app had an update and that's fine,, but the issue I've been having has been happening pre update and post update. I've had to verify my photo 7 times. It gets accepted and then kicks it out. I'm on testosterone. My face has changed greatly over the past year and I have also expressed this to support. I hope no one else is having issues with customer service as am I. All of this is a shame since I actually was meeting more people on this app than any of the others, but it's just as useless as the others if I am not "verified" to use it.
developer_response: We're so sorry that you're experiencing this issue. We would love to help you resolve this. Please contact us on badoo.com/feedback, and we will look into this for you. Remember to contact us using your registered email address to speed things up.

review_description: This app is fine for dating, lots of people, but it is VERY buggy. If I switch to another app, like google, I have to restart badoo. I cannot switch back. It'll say I'm in "offline mode" if I don't. It almost NEVER gives me notifications when I receive a message or get a match (but sometimes it does). When I hit send, it'll send the same message twice. It's just riddled with bugs. The only reason I'm not giving it one star is because I've actually met some pretty cool chicks here. Fix your app.
developer_response: We are really sorry for the inconvenience caused. We are reporting this issue to our development team so it can be fixed ASAP. Make sure you have the last version of the app and contact us on badoo.com/feedback if the problem persists.

review_description: Filters reset every time I open this app, and ontop of that, the filters they do have are not that great. For example, if I adjust the filter to 50 miles, it will show that there's no one within 50 miles, but when I make the distance much farther, it's suddenly finding people within 30 miles, great...but that doesn't help when the majority are thousands of miles away. This app, just like all the apps of its type is a waste of time and money. Move along.
developer_response: Your opinion really matters to us, so thank you for taking the time to leave this constructive review. We will forward your comments to the relevant team for further review, so they can be taken into consideration in future updates. Thank you for helping us build a better product!

review_description: The app was good, but now it seems the creators are becoming greedy. There is a subscription fee to unlock some features, but then even though you're paying a monthly fee, other aspects are still pay for use. For example Just recently there has been added a cost to see if your message was read by whomever you sent it to. I had never seen this before. SMH! ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
developer_response: Hey Anthony, Badoo is still totally free to use! For those who want to stand out from the crowd, we do offer some paid upgrades. Watch out for our special promotions that pop up sometimes too - you may be able to grab some Credits or Premium for free. Don't forget you can always chat with anyone you match with for free üíú

review_description: It's a decent enough app. Functions how one would expect. However, one thing that's really annoying about the app (and I mean annoying to the point I may change apps) is it changes your filters. More specifically age and distance. I don't want to date too much younger than me it's weird and I set the distance from me for a reason. There is no valid reason for the app to change your filters for you. If the devs want that setting in there the least they could do is add a turn off function for it.
developer_response: Hey Diggr, our filters widen themselves once you have been through all of the options with your added filters. This is so you never run out! You can add your interest filters to find people with the same interests, we would never change these üíú

review_description: It was chill when I had some free time, just swipe and keep swiping. I get the ads in the swipes, but I don't get nearly enough matches or conversations to get violently interrupted every few swipes by an ad. I would understand if I was getting more matches and more conversations. But now I don't want to open the app because the return for me is minimal, but you throw an ad in my face more than I get matches, which makes me wonder if you only care about money. You might wanna turn the ads down.
developer_response: We're sorry to hear that you are unhappy but we appreciate your honest feedback about our advertising. We've taken this onboard and will consider making this change in future updates.

review_description: Great interface, but for some reason, it kept saying my pictures of myself weren't valid, and i literally couldn't do anything because of it. All of my images were fine, but no matter what i put, it said "you cant have this as a profile picture". Not only that, the actual interface for editing the pictures was absolutely infuriating, i couldn't even order them the way i want!

My favorite user interface of the dating apps. Allows you to search my interests, languages, plus the usual filter criteria. Doesn't over control your messages. If you send or receive nudes or crude language, it allows you to accept before continuing, but doesn't block those options completely. Sadly, most of the people are married and cheating on a spouse (might be perfect for some people). It's easier to find a relationship on tinder even.
developer_response: Thank you for your lovely review. We are also sad to hear you say that most people you have encountered have been taken. Have you tried writing a little bit more about what you are looking for and what you are not looking for in your profile? This should help attract the right kind of attention. If you would like help reach us on @BadooHelp

review_description: Disappointed- used to be a pretty good app, but now you pay for premium, not a small sum, then you have to pay more just to send someone a message. You can't even search and 'like' someone. It's a random process designed to keep you looking. What's worse is premium members get unlimited swipes in this random process, but others do not. Good luck with 2 people matching. If I had understood this I wouldn't have paid. Also, there are countless bots on the app. I gave 2 stars for the interface.
developer_response: We're sorry to see that you've not had a good experience on Badoo! We'd love to find out how we can improve our app. Let us know @BadooHelp on social media or on badoo.com/feedback. We are always on the hunt for new ideas üí°

review_description: App was great until they took my money. I paid for a one-time premium, and never had auto-fill activated. I check my bank balance and I see Badoo had taken money out multiple times. This is far from okay, and I would like my money back. EDIT: As of 01/23/2020, I am still being charged excessive amounts of payment despite having already terminated my account. None of the amounts reflect the original $1.99 subscription I initially signed up for prior to. The most recent charge is $8.97.
developer_response:
Hi there, we're sorry you feel this way and would love to investigate this as quickly as possible. To assist you with any billing issues on your account, we kindly request that you contact us on badoo.com/feedback.

This will allow us to bring up your details and get back to you as quickly as possible.

review_description: Used to be pretty good, but has gotten really buggy lately. The app doesn't work sometimes. And it randomly opens and closes in the backround forcing the app you are using to minimize. It's super annoying. I'm updating this becauee even though it's not as buggy, it's still unusable because now there are ads every 4-5 swipes. Instead of spending time with the app, the ads make me shut it down out of frustration after a few swipes.
developer_response:
Thank you for your review.
We have acknowledged your query and we will pass your feedback to the relevant team.

review_description: A good app for free but annoying all the time dealing with suggestion phrases, games to play, and VC enticements. If someone does not know what to say, get off the app. Many scammers so be aware. Regards to editing, the most difficult system I have ever used. If you want to correct spelling, e.g., when you place the cursor line the whole paragraph drops out if sight. When it returns you have to begin again. Very frustrating.

review_description: I'm very disappointed. I uninstalled the app 4 years ago and reinstalled it recently and they changed me for premium without asking me and they make it extremely difficult to cancel. I left a review already and they had it DELETED! That's the kind of company your dealing with here. They dont make it simple to cancel either. It's very difficult to find out how to cancel. It's very difficult and they automatically keep charging you without your knowledge. I perceive this as extremely dishonest.
developer_response: I am sorry to hear about your experience. Instructions on how to cancel your Badoo Premium differ depending on what method you used to purchase them. review_description: The photo verification does not work. They will not let me use any of my race photos even though I paid for the rights and own the photos. Due to this I could never even complete set up. I finally had to e-mail them to get the account shut down. I have yet to encounter a worse dating app, it is a total waste of time. Zero stars should be an option. All I can say is wasted time of my life I will never get back. Any other app, hell literally anything else, is better than this.
developer_response: Thanks to Photo verification, Badoo is safer than ever! If a user is verified by photo, you can be sure they are indeed who they say they are. We are sorry to hear you had trouble adding photos - if you change your mind and decide to give us another chance, please do contact us for help.

review_description: At first i was intrested, but the overabundance of ads started to get annoying. However ads are acceptable as long as the messaging and features are free... this app is not free... it uses "credits" as a pay wall. And you will find yourself trapped behind it quick. Any dating app that doesnt have 100% free messaging isn't worth your time and doesn't deserve your money.

review_description: Don't waste your time. Locations are inaccurate, many profiles of users in other countries, trash profiles, all junk, no way to see the user's in Africa that clicked on the like button. I was here 6 months putting in a solid effort. At the end I kept getting TS profiles which is not what I am looking for. 2 conversations in 6 months none of which were in my country. The free version is like watching scrambled cable TV.

review_description: Takes too long in order to get more free likes after you used all of them. When I did get a match 9 times out of 10 I kept matching with foreigners who lie about their location. For example putting on their profile that they are from my city, only to find out after texting them that they lied about their set location. It's too expensive to even consider premium and the app in general has a poor looking interface. Never going to try this app again.
developer_response: Ericc, we're sorry to see that you've not had a good experience on Badoo! We'd love to find out how we can improve our app. Let us know @BadooHelp on social media or on badoo.com/feedback. We are always on the hunt for new ideas üí°

review_description: Bottom line is, LOVE THIS APP! It's very useful and entertaining!! The only irritating thing is, you will tend to get replies from people outside the US. Not sure how or why, but it's definitely an algorithm issue! It depends though, it could be a good thing for some individuals bumping into someone from a different country!! But there is a downside to that, and it's maintaining a strong communication since of the language barriers, and that's when the Google Translate app comes in handy! CHEERS

I made a review a while back that I've had up saying this app was ok and it had features locked behind a paywall. And while it is an ok experience, it can be experienced free. You're missing out if you dont pay. I get 0 looks at my profile on times when I don't, and even at times I do pay for it.. The filtering is basic at best. You get age and "male, female, both". Lastly, I only get about 10 people to swipe on at a time before it tells me to broaden my search.. and all the push notifs.. Stop.

review_description: I wish I would have read reviews and 'fine print' before subscribing. That was a waste of money. No way to filter by ethnicity. I also don't like the fact that you can't change your location. UPDATE 2: You can't even message someone without paying extra unless they like you back? UPDATE: I do think the app is easy to use and set up pretty well, but there are very limited matches. Maybe when their subscriber base is larger it will get better, but 4 days without a new match is disheartening.
developer_response: It's a shame you haven't met anyone cool on Badoo yet. We recommend adding more photos, #interests, and an interesting description. Expand the criteria by which you are looking, especially in terms of age/distance. If you have any questions, message us @BadooHelp on Facebook. Don't give up. Your other half may be closer than you thinküíú

review_description: NOT a good app at all!! When you do a search and you request profiles within your area it gives you a few and the rest out of the states so you end up chatting with them to find out they are not in your area!! The location of each profile shows way in the bottom of the profile so they trick you by putting it down in the bottom so you don't see it that's why I deleted my account. Delete!! it's not worth it it has a lot of pop-ups ads.
developer_response: Dan, thanks for your reviewüíú We're sorry to hear you haven't found anyone near you yet. Try expanding your age and other preferences and don't forget to make sure your filters (found in the Settings menu) aren't too restrictive. We hope that helps!

review_description: I had purchased a one day subscription which I then had to cancel and was charged 2 dollars a day even after canceling the subscription and removing my credit card details. The way to cancel a subscription was also hard to find as they put the option in a light gray text with a very small font at the bottom of the screen, seperate from the options of buying a new subscription. Seems to be a money grab if anything and would not recommend trying. The actual dating aspect didnt seem too bad however
developer_response: Hello, if you have any questions, or need any help canceling your subscription, please feel free to reach out to us through Badoo.com/feedback or @Badoohelp and we can definitely walk you through itüòä

review_description: The one feature you want for a dating app is to meet & chat with new people. That seldom happened here. When I first matched, I started getting people across the earth. Interesting & fun, but not what I wanted. Adjusting search for locally in my area, I'd hardly ever get matches. When I did get "...so and so wants to chat". They never replied back to me. Occasionally, the app would say "failed to send". The app is really noisy when it comes to views/likes/in-your-area alerts, etc, but that all seems to be just to show the user the paywall. There's no problem with that, but trying to get a user to pay for things when basic things don't work is good way to poison goodwill.
developer_response: We're really sorry that you struggled to meet a match locally on Badoo. We have a few tips and tricks that may help you to use Badoo and improve your chances of making a great connection, if you'd like to reach out to us at badoo.com/feedback or via @BadooHelp on Twitter or Facebook!

review_description: If you get offered a free premium trial be sure to remember to turn off the auto refill since I was being charge 60$. Anyways the app is mediocre if you're using this as a dating app there is not that many people to talk to and whenever I go into someone's profile and click on the persons lookalike, almost all of them are inactive users making that option feel almost pointless.
developer_response:
There are inactive profiles because we like to give our users the freedom to pause their account whenever they choose, when they reload their account they can regain their matches and activity and resume where they left off.
One of our popular premium features Invisibility enables users to change whether they appear online or not.

review_description: When I swipe right (because I'm indicating I want to match a person) it asks me to upload a picture. It did this several times in the profile set up phase basically right after I uploaded the maximum number of photos. Later, as I'm messing with profile settings I was able to find my photos had uploaded and were being displayed in what I assume was the intended way for the app to show a person's profile, but then it went back to acting like my profile had no pictures at all. Fix your app, thx.
developer_response: Hmm, this doesn't sound right Will - we are sorry that you are having this issue! Please drop our team a message at badoo.com/feedback and we'll happily look into it for you.

review_description: Overall its not a bad app, but I live in Michigan and i get a lot of people on here from Wisconsin. Unfortunately, there is a very large lake between the two states making it unlikely that i will meet anyone there. If there was a way to restrict which states are visible, ill add a star. Second, premium is not worth the price in my opinion. The only beneficial feature is being able to see who liked you. Add more features to premium or even a monthly credit allowance and ill add another star.
developer_response: Most users who appear in the Encounters section live close to you. However, once you've voted on the closest users, you will see people in the closest cities and then nationwide. To see more users in your region, please try changing your search criteria slightly.

review_description: They intentionally make the process for canceling Premium impossible on your end so you have to jump through hoops contacting customer support for them to stop billing you. Supposedly you're able to just turn off premium in the app settings, but either there's a (conveniently) missing button in mine, or the box you're supposed to tap does nothing when I tap on it. Probably good grounds for a class-action suit, actually Edit: and furthermore their solution is "@ us on social media" smh
developer_response: Hi again, we are sorry you feel this way Zach. We have passed on your feedback, and invite you to get in touch if you need help with your billing issue if it hasn't been resolved already, thank you.

review_description: Shoddy service right now. I have been using this app off and on since 2014 and really enjoyed it. Recently...it doesn't update conversations timely. It sends me message notifications sometimes as many as 6 times in a row when there is nothing new to read for multiple people. It will show the green dot..online now...then 5 mins later if I reopen it will say...online 39 minutes ago or something similar. This is causing real issues between me and the person of interest.
developer_response: Hi there! Thanks for your useful feedback and we're really sorry to hear this. We love to hear about our users' experience and I've passed your comments on to the relevant department for consideration in future updates and development.

review_description: Warning. This app really takes the cake when it came to "gameifying" the whole dating experience. Taking all the manipulative tricks in the book to get you hooked and then asking for your wallet for just about everything. I paid for Premium, but it wasn't enough: want to also send a message? Then you need to pay extra. It's purposely confusing, like getting a Netflix subscription, but to play video with sound you need to buy their fun bucks. Stay away.
developer_response: Hi, Badoo is free to install and use. When you play Encounters, you chat with every person you match 100% for free. Badoo also offers extra paid features but it is not obligatory to use the app. If you have any further questions, we're on social media @BadooHelp and at badoo.com/feedback! üíú

review_description: With every update, this app gets more focused on squeezing money out than helping consumers. I used it over 10 years ago, and it was fine. After my relationship ended, I returned. In the 10 years, it had changed beyond recognition and don't have space here to explain how every change was a clear cash grab. My biggest issue is with the matching system being broken. I have had over 10 likes for months without the system ever giving me the chance to match with them, instead insisting I pay to view.

My account was blocked for no reason at all! Says it is reported as fake and to contact them if its not true, I did contact them yet they still insist that my account has fake info while it does not! They did not even ask for verification or anything! The normal thing is to inform the user about the issue and ask for verification not just decide on their own!! Unprofessional and disrespectful

Selecting text while typing NIGHTMARE! There are no time stamps for the conversations. Just the day. Not good. Allow selection of more than one message to copy before taking the convo to WhatsApp etc. Like that i can select the msg I'm replying to. Helps with flow. I don't want to be verified for personal reasons. I'll share photos with those who share with me. Also i can't choose my gender preference. Too much testosterone! Latest feedback is appreciated. Thanks
developer_response:
Thank you for your review.
We have acknowledged your query and we will pass your feedback to the relevant team.

review_description: One of the worst 'popular' dating apps available. Even if you pay top dollar for the best subscription level, you still have to pay for the things that are actually useful! No one puts anything about themselves, no one ever messsges back, the filters don't work properly. Its also very deceiving, it told me someone i actually know had viewed me but they told me they hadn't even been on the app for months. It told me that someone had found me after i boosted my profile when in fact i found them!

review_description: It was possible to watch ad videos for 200 credits and get up to 2 boosts and they give you an extra one. Now they raised the prices so you can only get one. review_description: It seems that some users are fake, they never reply back or do nothing, sometimes it happens that the user vanishes during chat, and the chat is just gone, that's a bug I assume. for me, the photo verification is impossible after many tries, I just can't copy the pose same as my photo that was taken in another situation!!
