Dialing number is slow, unresponsive, crazy difficult. Why? Dialing with WhatsApp or Line is quick and easy. Skyp6is a nightmare. How can this not be fixed?

Since the animated emoticons cloud, and bing... I now cannot see my recent and current chats pic icon. I have literally only got a quater of the profile picture, before I press into the chat. Please fix, as we should be able to see the profile pic in full before we click on it to chat, just like we did before all these updates! Grrr frustrating! Fix this please!!!!

Why is time in 12h format? How do you set it to be in a proper 24h format? I mean the timestamps in messages. Often don't receive notifications about new messages. Previously sent message jumps up a bit when you type a new message.

Skype become worst, we want Skype fast and reliable to compete with other instant messaging apps. Now skype is becoming something that have news on Android? Why do I need to read news on a messaging app? Skype team, pls! We are losing our patient.

Very disappointed. After years of having my account, it gets suspended for unknown reasons. What makes it worse is that there is no customer service number to call, forcing me to go without a primary means of communication. I would dump this app without question if I didn't need it for work...
Excellent app..Just an issue when my outlook email was hacked, it unfortunately also affected Skype! Sadly now no longer available for my older cell! Stupid restriction.

Skype video call is not working. I could only see my own, and same with whom i am having conversation with. Uninstalled and try to install the app, and video call still not working. How can i fix this one?

Constantly receiving Chinese spam messages even by following Microsoft's instructions to remove my profile from the search. Why allow messages from people off my contact list with no way to disable it? They just keep creating new accounts and spamming me even if I block and report for abuse. Just use discord this app is a joke.

I am so sorry to say this but my experience with Skype over this last 3 weeks has been awful! I am trying to connect with a friend. My account keeps getting blocked. So so far my experience has been just awful. I would love to speak with an agent in person! And by speak I mean voice to voice. Thank you!

I don't like new update should back to old version for the camera wen video call cannot splt screen. review_description: They really want you to buy a subscription. In a few months I've seen them strip away/ severely reduce the use of the most basic functions in the app for free users. Searching tags might as well be gone now that it only shows 3 profiles. And you used to be able to look at people who looked at you. Feels very money hungry to me. Aren't the ads supposed to help y'all have a free version anyway, and not what ever (can't even call this bare bones anymore) of a mess this is?

review_description: When I don't pay for a subscription the app only shows me 9 profiles that I'm able to look at without paying. They say the ads make the app free. But they just make the app dysfunctional and freeze up. Including ads that you cannot exit even after you watch them the full length of time. It's at has been developed into the ground...

$40 a month to view who's seen you etc, you have to be joking! - the unpaid version barely functions properly let alone paying more for extras! Messages seem to go blank if you view a profile and then click back to messages. Never used to do this. Guys can't always see my pics, no idea why! The full size ads are infuriating & totally indiscrete! What's more often trying to close them out actually takes you to the site/Play store. Filters do not always work right away.

The app is ok. The constant ads are annoying. What's really frustrating is the fact that the whole accuracy of the location of people is wrong! In explore mode, I search a certain town, and it shows people supposedly "in" or "near" that town I searched, but when I tap on their profile to review it, it says they're miles and miles away from it, anywhere from a couple dozen, to over a hundred miles away from the location I searched.

Rethinking my subscription. When I send a message it just sits in a "Sending" status, sometimes for so long (hours!) that the recipient is no longer online. I'm told that the opposite is true when they attempt to message me. I've deleted and reinstalled the app with no resolve. Without being able to send/receive timely messages, I don't think the app is worth the cost of subscription.

Been using this app for years. Sad to see the state that it's in. I dont mind adds but theres way to may. When I tap the (X) to close them, it brings me to the store to get me to download it. Then I go back to the app and it repeats this. My biggest problem is when It refuses to send messages, so I have to close the app & get back on and hope it'll work. This normally does work but every once ina while it wont. So you have to restart you device to make it work. The developer won't fix a thing.

It's been a year, and here I am again to give the same review.. yes, Grindr, you can reply to this message, and yes, I can provide troubleshooting emails from your team. My issue has not been resolved, and I will in quotes post it now: "Sometimes my messages get stuck in a sending loop that lasts too long and ultimately fails to send . I have to close and reopen the app, copy and paste my message to send... its kinda bs. Your ads load perfectly. It would make sense if your product did as well."
developer_response: Hi there Avery, We're sorry you're having trouble with sending/receiving messages. We understand how crucial this feature is to you enjoying the app. Please reach out to us at help@grindr.com so that we can look into this for you.

review_description: Grindr has we all know, is used for dates, hook-ups and more. But the thing that really kills the app for me is the interface being so glitchy, to the point of ads opening up web pages in your devices browser without full loading, chats not fully sending (unless you close the app and resend them), and even profile photos not fully loading. These are a few of the many issues I've incountered while using this app. I wish I could get a more positive review, but honestly I can't.

For a well-established app that everyone knows about, this is such a buggy mess. The worst issue is that messages constantly disappear when you open up one of your chats. Also, messages constantly just don't send and after waiting about 20 seconds you have to retry sending for it to hopefully go through. This app used to not be this bad and I even pay for Xtra. Please fix this broken app because it would be so much better without these issues.

I'm also running into issues sending messages , 6 out of every 10 messages I send come back with a sending error forcing me to have to close the app completely restart it several times before I can send the message. Was always decent in most ways. The updates just make it worse and worse. More features exclusively for the outrageously priced premium and Xtra content. Ads constantly. Navigate a chat? Get an ad. Change menues? More ads. Flashing annoying top bar ads in every single menu. It's extremely invasive at this point and causes constant problems. I don't have a low power phone either I'm at a flagship level. They actively make free Grindr worse. But it's the only thing guys use.

Stuck on the terms and conditions screen. Won't load any text, so I can't continue past to view profiles. Had worked literally last night, tried to view profiles this morning, and stuck on TaC page that refuses to load. I've tried clearing my cache and data, and that didn't fix the issue. C'mon grindr, I've been using you for years now, why all of the sudden has your app become such a mess.
developer_response: Hi there, We recommend you uninstall and reinstall, even if you have already done so. Additionally, please make sure you aren't using a secure folder as this can cause the behavior you're experiencing. If the issue persists, please reach out to us at help@grindr.com.

review_description: The app refreshes after you view a profile, so you have to start scrolling again. Sometimes messages don't send, so you have to close the app and wait for the message to give you an error. Some ads cause the app screen to flicker like a strobe light, so I have to close the app down.

review_description: Most of My pics for messaging does not load or have saved. I don't understand why since this has never happened before. Also the app refreshes & sends Me to the top of the feed EVERYTIME I exit from viewing someone's profile. This is highly annoying as it discourages searching. What if I was to get really far down the feed, see a profile, exit the profile & then be FORCED BACK TO THE TOP OF THE FEED!? Not cool. I like the freedom of scrolling & refreshing the feed whenever I want to.

They've started running pop up ads that open my browser. On top of the constant in-app ads you have to skip twice, dwindling features lost to the overpriced tiered subscription model, and frequent instances of having to close and reopen the app in order to have messages send, this is the last straw. I think I'm off Grindr for good.
developer_response: Thanks for your feedback. When we set our ads, subscription prices and features, we strongly consider the impact it will have on our users. We care deeply about our users' experience with the app, and feedback like yours is vital to our development team.

review_description: Xtra works fine and I appreciate the features that come with it, but ever since the last update the app does this beyond annoying thing where after EVERY profile I check out, the feed refreshes and starts me at the top again, with those closest to me. review_description: I get it. Grindr is supported by ads. The way Grindr forces clicks, tho. First, you have to watch the ad for 5+ seconds and you can't close it or back out of it. Once the timer is done, if you close the ad, the "x" misleads and actually opens the ad. Lately, I've been redirected to ads just by looking at a profile- not clicking an ad or even being near one. It just opens the ad at their site. And the ad follows you because of cookies. I'm so tired of it.

It just gets worse and worse! The app continues to freeze and won't refresh. With each update, you lose the number of profiles that you can view (down to 9 free, from 100) without having to pay for upgrades. Chats history with pictures and information deleted randomly.

Pretty soon this will just be one big ad. No people. No chat. You'll just open the app to watch commercials. Everything is a pop-up ad. Heck, an ad even pops up just staring at the screen. And good luck backing out of it. And you have to pay for every little thing. So many subscriptions in one app that you'll lose your paycheck faster than gambling at a casino.
developer_response: Thanks for your feedback. When we set our subscription prices, ads, and features, we strongly consider the impact it will have on our users. We care deeply about our users' experience with the app, and feedback like yours is vital to our development team.

review_description: Must be desperate for more money. After most recent update, you can't even open the profile of the last person who looked at your profile without being directed to pay for an upgrade. What's next,take away the ability to see who viewed my profile completely? May as well. Update: Viewers button suddenly stopped working. Logged out, tried logging in, get blank ToS screen, no way to move forward. Time to uninstall and remove profile.

The App continues to crash almost instantly. This has been happening for nearly a month now. I have been in contact with support, and there has been 2 updates, but still the App continues to crash within seconds of opening. So I am lowering my rating to 1 star until the issue is fixed. I am glad I canceled my subscription two months ago or I'd be extremely upset right now paying for a service that doesn't even work properly. Won't ever get a subscription again at the rate of waiting for a fix.

The app locks up constantly. It's become so much worse since the latest update. Having to shut down and restart the app five or six times and a half an hour just to get messages to send or get the screen to refresh. It's becoming more trouble than it's worth to be honest. Messages refused to send too often. Constant updates which don't help anything. Extremely restricted range of profiles unless you purchase. A lot of junk advertisement. It really is becoming more trouble than it's worth.

This is utterly ridiculous, fix your damn app. So many updates each month and yet it can't even run somewhat smoothly. Your service is also terrible, you just ask for more information all the time.

The app is ... that's all there's just too many fundamental features locked behind subscription. This experience is one of the worst I've ever had. It isn't the apps fault, the guys around me seem very conceited. The issues I have with the app... the pay wall... essentially having issues sending messages and getting errors refreshing nearby. Distance is bugged. Certain places over 200km away tell me 146 on the app. No good in that regard.

review_description: The app is quite great, but I've noticed that some things: people closer to me were disappearing, and reappeared only after uninstalling and reinstalling the app; albums are loading forever (my best photos are in there), and they sometimes don't even get sent, and that'sterrible because it makes it look like I don'twant to send pics; messages and taps wouldn't work sometimes if I didn't close and open the app; I can't trust the km in the app anymore. It's good but it could be a lot better.

Very aggressive ads policy. On top of the fact that you have to watch 10-30 seconds video that you've watched 20 times already, after that time when you want to close it tapping X the app always interprets that as clicking that add. It's a ridiculous time wasting! It's faster to restart the app the moment any ad pops up.

Absolutely unaffordable in my country. It's the price of a mini fridge. Was a good app before, but not worth paying if you can only see 6 or less people from your area. Please fix this, rather increase the restrictions on the filters as you had in the past and have more people instead...because at this point, it isn't a social dating platform.

All in all, I like the app and what it's designed for. What I have a hard time with is the effect it has on the phone while using the app. It seems to slow everything down or freeze up, making you turn off and restart to get everything operational. That even happens after updating the application.

Even a year later, still having problems with messages sending. You have to close the app and resend the message... If an ad doesn't get you first. And those you can't close. I just end up closing the app and not opening it back up for hours after the frustration.

A very disappointing experience. I opted for the Xtra membership which is somewhat better than the free version (no ads) but is still very basic for the price - only see the last 3 viewed, can't engage with last viewed guys and the grid is quite limited. Also the amount of message from spam accounts, profiles with no pics and no information is ridiculous, lucky to get one genuine message a month. Sadly this is the state of online hook up apps but Grindr is becoming bottom of the barrell for me.

This app is now completely useless. It is stuck attempting to load profiles and has been for the last two weeks. I still have messages that I have sent, but no one is responding to them. The ads, when the app did work, were annoying at best. Then, if all that weren't bad enough, this garbage app is loaded with spam profiles and scam artists. I am not jumping over to WhatsApp for every person who tells me that he isn't on Grindr that often. Essentially useless app.

More and more annoying pop up ads that often seem to open Play Store, very annoying. They also use a fair amount of data. Other apps have a lot fewer ads. So many junk messages too, never on Scruff. This needs to stop. Search area also seems to be a lot smaller. I will not be using this app as much.

Subscribed .. when i apply filters i keep scrolling down just when i am in the middle the app forces me to go on top qnd reload the whole list. Same happens if i visit a profile while scrolling.. It's so annoying and makes the idea of subscribing meaningless .. its not enough that you charge a fortune?! You also will provide absurd service? And while i am at it, you really need to add "Text-based" filters since not everyone fill their profile

Your desire to add restrictions with every update has become an obsession. Recently I upgraded to Extra and then boom! I cannot view the profiles of those who have viewed me. This feature was available when I was a non-paying client, but now it has gone and it is asking me to upgrade to Unlimited. That, I will not do!

Update: They keep changing the grindr app what seems like every few days. It has now become unusable. Total garbage. It freezing all the time and have to close app then open to resend messages...oo and now lost connection unless I'm on WiFi... but my phone goes on Internet as normal and have full 5g signal on phone and all other apps...but grindr just doesn't want to work on Mobile data...it's got worse than before
Glitchy mess... profiles won't load anymore have tried deleting and reinstalling the app several times. It gets stuck in the loading screen. Been messed up for last few days

5 star providing you have an annual "Unlimited" subscription ($150 per year is a competitive price). Without that, for me the site is unusable. Too many ads interrupt and lack of basic features available in other major apps & hookup sites. XoXo

The newest update keeps crashing the app!!! This is getting ridiculous! It seems as if there's a new issue everyday! I will be canceling my subscription! If I can't use the app and the features I pay for, what's the point?

review_description: This app is a cesspool of ads, lots of ads, full screen ads, full volume blasting ads, spam bots, technical glitches, connectivity issues, phone freezes and silly restrictions. And the Unlimited version is $66 per month. Someone wanting to use the unlimited version will have to pay $800 per year - that's like buying a new phone every year and throwing it over the cliff. This company is out of it's mind.
developer_response: Thanks for your feedback. When we set our subscription prices and features, we strongly consider the impact it will have on our users. We care deeply about our users' experience with the app, and feedback like yours is vital to our development team. For any technical issues, please email our support team at help@grindr.com.

review_description: It has degenerated. While it used to be great, it is now impossible to operate the free app for more than maybe one minute before intrusive ads force a shut down and forced restart.
developer_response: We constantly review the impact that ads have on the user experience and strive to strike the right balance. Your feedback has not gone unnoticed and has been elevated to the appropriate teams for review. If you see a malicious ad, please report it at help@grindr.com.

review_description: I don't know who keeps telling you to keep the prices at $20 a month for Xstra and $30 for unlimited but they aren't very smart. If you guys did Xstra for like $5.99 a month and unlimited for $15.99 you all would draw in a lot more revenue. Who ever is telling you to keep the price high isn't a good person to listen too If someone responds saying they have changed prices thay is a lie. A month service has always been $20 for Xstra. Adding a weekly rate is just hurting the app more.

Legendary app, but not tailored for EU user. All settings are imperial instead of metric by default. Refresh is not optimized and sometimes it takes multiple refreshes before new data loads. Horrible chat implementation, I rather start chat here and real fast move to WhatsApp or Telegram, but rarely continue it on Grinder, just because functionality is a potato ü•î

Its.All. Spam. You wanna get harassed for being trans, or just get pp pics unsolicited constantly, and have 90 percent of your taps and messages be from people trying to get you to go to random website, then this is the app for youüôÑ Edit a few years later,nothing has changed.

With every update, this app gets worse and worse. I spent a lot of money subscribing to Unlimited, but a few months ago, I stopped. Before, you could click on your most recent viewer and see mytheir profile. Not anymore. Now, unlimited is $44.99/mo. Inflation, right?! If when using the free version, you run across sometime you really need to block, better hope they are within 5 miles of you, otherwise you're S. O. L.

Sometimes the app's adds take me to play store or some unknown website by FORCE without me clicking my screen which is very unsafe, also as long as it updated, when I click a picture someone sent me I can zoom in or anything because it says that the picture doesn't exist even though it's right there?

There has been huge uptick in fake profiles. Particularly one's of men in mid 30s of Asian decent. These accounts are targeting people who are travelers or new accounts. The software for verifying accounts is abhorrent. The amount of fake accounts is a severe issue which should warrant some looking into.
developer_response: Those spam accounts are the worst. We work really hard to get rid of them, but if you do come across one, please report it to us so we can take a look and kick it to the curb! Read our blog surrounding this topic: https://blog.grindr.com/blog/spam-banning-support-and-moderation-update

review_description: Grindr is getting less and less enjoyable, being more and more restricted on what you can do without having to use Grindr Xtra. Now if someone taps you, half the time I'm not notified so I miss it until I get another tap the next day, and I can only see the most recent tap because the rest are blurred out, miles away and you can't even view them without paying for Grindr!

Can't us the Google login on a regular basis, which means app doesn't really work that way. Update: giving me a big long internet address without a hyperlink is just mean. I tried searching, but those "help" suggestions were for stuff I already tried. I think I'll just let my Grindr contacts know I'll be deleting my profile and rebuild it from an email sign-in (vs. sign-in with Google). It's a pain in the butt. Update: problem keeps recurring. Let me convert acct from Google login to Email/PW.
developer_response: Hi there, We're sorry you're having trouble with some of the features of the app. Whenever you experience technical issues of any kind, you can reach out to us at help@grindr.com so that our support team can investigate and get things working again.

review_description: One idea: you guys should really invest in some kind of user ratings by other users. Like maybe made available after you send someone your location, idk. I'm finding that most people don't look like the pictures they send so, that's a real turn off. Tbh, it makes me want to give up on the app. Like even just one option that says if they actually look like the pictures sent.

The ads have gotten worse and the developers have placed the download button near the back button so you download an unwanted app more than likely so they can get payment for your download should be completely illegal and fined for it! Download any other gay dating app, but this one! Update, let's keep making it even more inconvenient, now when you scroll a little too far down and hit the Xtra section you get stuck there unless you toggle through faves, chats, and back to nearby.
developer_response: Hi Lee, Thanks for your feedback on that, and sorry to hear that you're running into an issue with that placement. Our team is always looking for ways to improve the experience for our community and feedback is a super important part of that.

review_description: No starts for this app, without selecting one star I'm not able to submit the review that is why I'm giving one star. Very worst app ever I seen. Every time showing network error. But full network coverage in my phone. Other apps working fine.
developer_response: Hi there, We're sorry you're having trouble with some of the features of the app. Whenever you experience technical issues of any kind, you can reach out to us at help@grindr.com so that our support team can investigate and get things working again.

review_description: Can't log out, and than log back in later without having to wait 30m. Than all messages are gone. App randomly freezes and doesn't refresh and send messages properly.

This could be a great app and it's nice it has a free features to. Inteteract and everything. Unlike so many others that you have to pay to play,but there should be a ‚≠ê ratijg for persons or review the date with their device IP address or something that follows them no matter how many profiles they make. There is more fakes and flakes and no-shows in this app I can't count the hours and hours of waiting on someone who set up a date and don't show . And hundreds of $ on makeup waisted.

It's fun! Great idea. 4 stars cuz the explanations page is too vague. For ex, what is the benefit of racking up "We Time." I think it's a good motivator to keep in touch with people more, but every two days?? That's like Mom level. If I were to chat with a long distance friend even once a week, that would be a huge improvement! Also, there should be more notification options like only getting notified when certain friends are in the house, different notification sounds, volumes, etc.

Houseparty use to be an amazing app! But recently there's been a ton of audio and connectivity issues. The audio problems are a real pain in the butt because my friend's words will get cut off mid-sentence or I'll constantly be repeating myself. Connectivity issues are also a problem because I'll connect to a party and it'll be frozen. Plus, there has been a few times I've been at the home screen and still able to hear my friends talking or vice versa, even though I'm no longer in a party at all
developer_response: Yikes! Our bad. Remember, you can always shake your phone while you‚Äôre in the app to report bugs so we can help you party üëç

review_description: It's quite good, though as expected, Apple and Android do not get the same treatment. Something to get used to, as FB now owns this formerly independant application. An Apple user, for example, may increase the size of any one of the live images. Though only digitally enlarged, it's a great feature; sadly unavailable to millions of Android users. The interface is clean, though bandwidth issues are more common than not. They need to work on this area desperately, in my opinion. On the whole, 7/10

This app is amazing. I've been using it for at least a year now, and I've had no issues. the only problem would be the lag when you don't have great wifi. However, it's great for people who don't have iphones and can't facetime. you can turn you camera and mic off and it comes with super fun games like uno, karaoke, heads up, a magic 8 ball, and so much more!! Overall, I love this app and plan on keeping it forever.

The app is fun overall and it is a really great idea to embed games with a live video chat! However, there is definitely room for some improvements. It is a bit confusing inviting friends to a call if you are not familiar with the app. Maybe there should be some text under the emoji button that says something like "invite" or "friends". Also, on my Galaxy Tab A 10.1" tablet, the Quick Draw game was locked in portrait mode which was an annoying user experience as I prefer landscape mode.
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: I like this app for what it is, you are able to facetime with your friends and/or family. I also like how it takes face timing to a new level with being able to play fun games. I like how flexible it is, you can download it and start using it. However, I have had some problems with it once before, like it would stop working and it would be lagging behind of everyone else. Though, that happened once.
developer_response: Thanks for your feedback about Houseparty. We really love hearing from our users on what we can still improve on. If there is anything else we can do to make the experience better, please don't hesitate to let us know through support site: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

review_description: I really like it, but it uses a lot of data. My wifi is I'd say a moderate strength and it can't support what the AP needs to be connected so I have to use data. It can still be glitchy and my phone overheats. Some of the features are confusing, it's not entirely intuitive. I like the games but they move a little too fast (not enough time to read the trivia) overall I like the concept but the execution is a bit off.

This really is a very fun games, but there are still quite a few issues, my biggest one being images or text glitching so that they always stay on the screen. When playing a game like chips and guac, the cards may glitch and stay on the screen. This causes you to not be able to red the cards, or decide which one to choose, which makes it almost unplayable, since it happens almost every time. Please find a way to fix this.

The concept is great, you come into the house, and you or your friends can join each other rooms and lock them so that no one you dont want can get in, but the problem is the implementation. It is very buggy and slow and low quality compared to other video chat services. All of the menus and settings hardly work. And worst of all, it absolutely devours battery and every single time I go on it for over 30 minutes, my phone overheats to the point where it can't charge and it eventually dies.

At first the app was awesome, but after a few months it was glitching. Every time I tried to talk to one of my friends it would say they couldn't join. Also mine and their screens would glitch. The camera would freeze to much and they audio sometimes made their voices sound like robots or something. This app is still very good and I totally reccomend it to others!!!üëè
developer_response: Oh no! Please shoot us an email at hello@houseparty.com so we can help you party!

review_description: I like it to connect with friends. I find when I receive calls, I have to exit and come back because the volume of others in very low. There was a tv screen up by the games for ONE day I don't know if it was hacked or something, but it was extremely odd it was just running puppies and the next day it disappeared. Over all it's a great app I have been using it for two years now with no major issues.
developer_response: We're so sorry you're having this issue. Next time it happens, can you please shake your phone to report? That way, our engineers can take a closer look at the problem!

review_description: Does not respect the phones audio settings. My phone is on silent, and this is the only app that is still being loud with the notifications. Also, the app has not been updated in quote a few months (as of March 2020). Overall decent app. But it doesn't seem to be supported well. Good idea, could've been better implemented. Been following this app since the beginning. I hope it works out.

Hey Devs! Great app so far... what's a party without music?? Solution: enable dual but separate volume controls for background "media" volume, and foreground "voice" volume! That way I can easily adjust the volume for my favorite streaming service while catching up and hanging out with my friends! It'd be like the double-decker couch of the app world! :-) thanks for listening, and keep up the great work!

This is overall a good app. We had four people in our group call and no one experienced any issues. We haven't tried out any of the games yet so I'm looking forward to that feature. My biggest complaint with house party is that it won't play sound via bluetooth connection so I wasn't able to use my headphones/earbuds and couldn't hear the sound well.

review_description: I love using this app to hang and talk with my friends. The UNO game is great! I do have some suggestions. Base line, need to improve the connection stability. I understand that strong wifi is needed but improvents need to be made. The UNO game is great! But when you or a friend gets kicked off it allows you to come back only to spectate, which slightly throws off the flow of the game. And after a player is being challeged and has gone, it sometimes freezes on that player who was challenged.

I loved this app. It could host several people at once across apple and Android which was nice, and there were even games for when conversations were dying down. Downsides? For some reason, it doesn't always work on my phone. I have to use my laptop cause the app won't load and then completely exits out of the app. Other problem is it drains battery so BAD. I can only use it for about 30-40 minutes before I have to go find my charger. Besides that, it's an amazing app!

Fine for quick video chats, but I can't turn off the volume! I can mute my mic, great. But even when I turn the volume all the way down on my phone, set to silent mode, I still get the voices of everyone in the call. This is fine if you are alone, but if me and my wife both want to get in on the house party on different phones, it causes horrible horrible feedback loops.
developer_response:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback. We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

review_description: My boyfriend's phone doesn't work sometimes, so we both got this so that we could text each other (I haven't done a video chat yet so I can't say anything about that) but when he texts me, I won't get notifications for the messages sometimes, and it's very annoying. But it's pretty convenient otherwise, I just wish that it would always send me notifications when I got a message.

review_description: So overall this is a great app. You can basically FaceTime all your friends. You can invite other people to your party and play heads up and more! You can create group chats which is awesome. The only thing I don't really like is when I'm trying to change my profile pic I go to gallery,pick a picture, and when I come back it says I'm not connected to the internet. But overall amazing app.

Great app just wish it wouldn't keep disconnecting my Bluetooth. If I go from WiFi to mobile network it disconnects. And if I go into another social media app it disconnects as well. Also it will say connection problem. When I'm on WiFi and or mobile data with full bars. Don't need new features on it until you get the bugs fixed. And this is happening to multiple phones on multiple networks out of my friends

review_description: Nice idea, but instead of putting so much money into the load of advertising, how about putting more money into the servers and fixing bugs? Had my family use this and most kept getting kicked out, or sometimes there would be a huge desync, and some people couldn't even connect correctly. Not really great at all. Also, the Trivia game cut off half the question on some phones. One of the phones that this happened to has a big screen, so it's a bit odd.

The concept is wonderful! But all the games are super repetitive..like the same question 3 times in one round. And the quality is horrible. We tried to play so many times and the feedback was awful, so much echoing and we couldn't hear each other, we switched over to another group platform and it was easy peasy. I'm really hoping with some updates this will work better

review_description: This is not a very intuitive app. Everyone I know has struggled with it. I'm not the only one of my friends and family who have found it frustrating and confusing. One of the most annoying things is contacts not showing up as having downloaded the app. We end up only being able to send each other invites that ask us to download the app, not actually start a conversation, even though we both already have the damn app. The whole experience has been very disappointing.

I have the OnePlus 7 Pro phone which features a pop-up selfie-camera. I can tell you, this app constantly messes with the camera, and it's super frustrating. It doesn't need to use my camera when I'm not engaged in any actives, and just changing settings and adding friends. üò° And for others, it's a privacy concern when an app is constantly turning on the camera for use. For me it's obvious, but for many people, they wouldn't even know... and the app could be watching.

Thanks!

review_description: App is really nice. Pretty simple to use. Though I would like for a more easier way of changing the username, screen name, as well as a easier settings access. Included, it would be better in the signup for a more dense or eye catching color to be used to describe what each of the required parts (I.E. username, name, password, email, DOB). Other than that great app!

The video is smooth and the app is fairly easy to manage. Really annoyed it plays notification sounds when my phone is on vibrate AND I have all notifications through the app shut off. That means I have to sign out completely if I don't want to hear it. Would really like a fix for the sounds.
developer_response:
Hello Jessica,

We would love to enhance your Houseparty experience! For any questions or suggestions, you can reach us here: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/?contact=1

review_description: sometimes the app doesn't work and you need a really good internet connection for it to work, other than that it's a really good app to call your friends on. It's a little upsetting that Android users don't get the same updates as people that use iOS though. My friends can screen share and use "filters". My Google doesn't say I need an update but I don't have the same features as apple users.
developer_response: Thanks for the ‚≠êÔ∏è! We‚Äôre workin‚Äô on it - promise. Thanks for sticking with us!

review_description: The app often freezes up and doesn't seem to work properly for android users. 1.) It shows "starting the party" forever on a black screen, without actually joining the party. 2.) It shows that you are in a party, but your image is the only image on screen. 3.) When it finally lets you join a party with other users, it will show their tile as joining although you can clearly hear them talking in the room. From what I'm learning, this is mostly an Android mobile user issue.
developer_response: Yikes! Remember, you can always shake your phone while you‚Äôre in the app to report bugs.  This way our engineers can look into it. We wanna help you party!

review_description: Glitchy. Disconnects the group often. Interrupts w game offers. Difficult to take a decent screenshot bcuz of all the ads and offers on the screen at ALL times! If u play a game once, ur in a vicious cycle of popups! Annoying! Overall, when it worked, it worked ok. A few in the group had low mics and some had loud mics when the volume was turned all the way up.

I think it's a real good app, but I think it could have some other features. For example, you can send images or vids under 1 min. My best friend and I like to talk about our day and like so send images to describe it. It makes it much harder, especially during covid-19. Please try and consider some of these things I've written and please and it. Thank chu :)
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: Great idea, if it weren't for the awkward framing of videos. The best way to use this is to leave your iPad open in the living room when you feel like having some spontaneous social time, and let people join whenever. However, this app sometimes insists on dividing each user into VERY narrow vertical columns, making it impossible for more than 1 person to fit into a single video tile.

It's an interesting concept where you open a video chat room, and all your friends can jump in and out... But the interface is confusing, there's always a ton of lag, and it does not permit the use of bluetooth speakers/earbuds/microphones with the app. These things should really be resolved.

Video tends to freeze when 4 or more people join in, but the audio still works so we can continue to chat though we can't see one another. You can try re-entering the chat, but ends up freezing again anyway. Can't prompt to play games on the Chrome extension (no dice). Works best with one-on-one convos/games, which isn't why we use multiple video chat for - might as well just video call using your standard phone app.

Hello,

Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website:
