review_description: The app is actually pretty decent with group video calls and the games are fun. But the app doesn't respect the sound settings on the phone - like when my phone is set to vibrate or silent, Houseparty still sends loud audible push notifications. The only way to silence them is to disable them entirely through the Android OS settings. Until the app can respect the phone notification settings I will have to give a 1 star rating.

Cool concept, but app layout is bizarre and not user friendly. The draw something equivalent game doesn't register many touches and is pretty awful but is fun regardless when you're not having any social interaction. Obnoxious notifications that lead to surprise video chats with friends or acquaintances. I appreciate the app for what it is during the pandemic but I don't feel compelled to use it more than I have (couple times in last few weeks).

I love this app! House party is super easy to use and the fact that you have to accept the request first is great. I used to get random numbers texting me a lot. It also allows you to chat with all of your friends with just a click! The feature I like the most is the "lock room" Feature, so you can make sure nobody else gets in.
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! Party on!

review_description: It's great, I've had it for maybe 1 1/2 years now, maybe 2.. but they only thing I don't like is the fact you can't send pictures or videos to the people you are friends with. I understand this may be a safety precaution due to predators but if you are friends with them and all that and know eachother you should be able to send videos or pictures. This would especially help since some people dont have their friends'phone numbers. Please make a change to this. Other than that, love the app!
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! We heart feedback and will pass this on to our team. Stay tuned for more!

review_description: This app was working perfectly when I got it like a month and a half ago. I was able to do every thing talk to friends play the games, and pass notes. Now on the Play store it says that my device is not compatible with it any more and for some reason I am able to still use it but whenever I get into the app it says I need to connect to the internet even though I already am so if this is a bug could you fix it and try to make it compatible again because I really like this app!
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback. We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: Since the recent update, the sound and camera has been off and not together. When I call my friends, the camera messes up and it goes in slowmotion. It hasn't done this before, this is the first time. I think the update mess with it. So please can you fix this soon, it has been really annoying. Thank you.
developer_response: Uh-oh. Remember, you can always shake your phone to report bugs so we can help you out!

review_description: Liked the app at first but I'm getting inundated with notifications about new games and prompts to open the app even when my friends aren't on. I want the meaningful notifications about friends in the house but I only have the option of turning off the friend notices through the app or all notifications through my device settings. Emailed support and they said they couldn't help. I just don't want notices twice a day about new trivia decks.

Sometimes if you turn down the volume, it turns down some of the people in the chat but not all. This is incredibly irritating. All volume coming from the app should be on the same volume slider, no exceptions. This effectively makes the app impossible to mute.

The app is great! It is so useful for when you're at home and you miss a friend, but it's hard to use if you're in the car or away from home. It would be nice if the app could also be online so I can chat with friends/family that I miss! If it were online, I would be able to look up houseparty, click on a link, and not have to download the app on my computer! You could find Houseparty online when your using computer, but then download the app when you're using a phone. The app is also glitchy and says I have network issues even though my WiFi and network is completely fine. Otherwise the app is good. If you could do what I said above, then, if I could, I would rate you so many more stars. If you can't it's okay, I don't expect you do anything about it either way. So for know I'll rate you four stars!
developer_response: Awesome! Thanks for sharing us your experience using our app! We're really glad that you're enjoying it. if you're having issues using our app please feel free to reach us out at hello@houseparty.com

review_description: I use houseparty all the time with my friends! The app is very convenient when wanting to talk. However, this could just be the wifi for each person, but whenever I'm on a call the connection will just completely give out. Though, it tends to fix itself pretty quickly.

Cool concept, doesn't work very well. First, I couldn't find a way to log out or make sure my camera and audio was off. That's a little unsettling. Then one night I was on with some friends and things were getting really glitchy so I uninstalled and reinstalled. After that it wouldn't work at all. I'm on a galaxy S9+.

Confusing interface, and somehow you wind up on a call with someone without touching anything. Also, the sound the notifications make whenever someone is calling or saying hi or whatever it is, is the most annoying, high pitched whistling sound ever. It should never be considered as a sound to use for any kind of notification. It's made me jump out of my seat on several occasions.

I love houseparty! It has been instrumental in keeping in touch with my family and friends on the fly during the pandemic and afterwards. It helps to keep us close and part of each other's lives even when we're far away. I really am quite disappointed that it week end in October. It has been the most solid and easy to use app for keeping in touch. Even my grandparents use it :)

The app does what it promises, but not very well. It kicks me out of parties, locking the room doesn't always work, and audio and video randomly cut out. Also, Apple users have many features that Samsungs just don't have, its ridiculous because stuff like the screen shares and custom backgrounds still appear yet we cant use them. I would rate the app higher but the fact that the glitches are unbearable and the fact that Samsungs and Androids just aren't treated the same causes the low score.

The experience is great, but the quality of the calls aren't always the best. Like sometimes I can't understand my friends completly, or the camera quality isn't the best. I also wish you could send pictures or videos to each other. I also wish that for other card packs in that one game you didn't have to pay. Other than these minor things, love the app!
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! We heart feedback and will pass this on to our team. Stay tuned for more!

review_description: I love that I have this to chat with my friends, partner, and family. It's great to be able to do this, especially with Covid. But I keep missing calls because I'm not notified until it's missed. And there are no options for notification settings within the app. This would be a super beneficial feature to add.

Love it. Casual atmosphere, doesn't feel like I'm in a meeting - needed this to have a dedicated digital space for video chats with friends - having zoom for both work and community wasn't working. App works great - the user interface isn't super intuitive or easy at first but you get the gist of it quick.

It's great for connecting with friends and family for a good time! My only issue is that while playing games my video would be blocked by time clocks from previous games, and I would have to choose the app and rejoin to remove the image on my video. Also, the Pick Me game lags and it takes a long time to show the results of the vote.
developer_response: Next time you experience a bug, can you please shake your phone to report? That way, our engineers can take a closer look at the problem!

review_description: This is a really good app in my opinion as you can let upto 8 people video call at once and play games at the same time. Its also a great way to make new friends as that new person is not a stranger, but a friend of a friend! It aslo very entertaining and a great way to spend time. The security system is also quite good but the only down side I can see is the notifications. I get alot of them and It can be quite annoying sometimes. Otherwise, it's a great app I recommend!!!

Everyone likes this well enough but I found it boring within 10 minutes of playing. I played with 2 others and despite there being favoured games like heads up and draw, it was laggy and it did not make sense to choose one person to go at a time. The game should either ask who goes in what order or just automatically continue to the next player. Doesnt make it very fun. The drawing game was especially laggy. We just weren't getting into it. I also could not figure out how to end a game.
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: Poor sound and video quality, limited choice of games. User interface is less intuitive than expected. There are better group call apps. Also tried the Chrome version on my computer, it is even worse than this Android app. Login doesn't integrate properly with password managers. If it was better optimised with improved sound and video quality, then I would use it. Also doesn't work with Firefox. Feels like an app made by a startup that still needs to improve their product. Good concept.

Certain parts of this are great, the concept and ease at which it allows you to just hop on and hang out with friends, the games as well. But it's very under developed. Quizzes get quite repetitive, the settings menu isn't anywhere near fleshed out enough for a calling app and the UI isn't great. I urge the developer to do all they can to capitalise on its new found popularity because this app could be a staple going forward if it's worked on. Also I've had absolutely no privacy concerns

I love the app, just that it needed to be upgraded so that we can view friends profile pictures and change profile name. So many things needs to be updated. I wish I could change my profile name but I couldn't. And it's so annoying if one can't view friends profile picture fully. And it consume data alot. Unlike other apps, we couldn't share photos with friends.

Lots of dropped video feeds and people just dropping out of the room. Not a lot of trivia questions, you can't play the same mode twice without repeats. Everyone just got off and we used Google Hangouts to talk like normal. Uninstalled because it kept pushing notifications every 2 hours of who was online, super annoying. Almost there, but not quite. I will try again in the future, I think they just need time to address these issues. Good app idea though.

Tried signing up and it said I already had an account. Tried logging in, no passwords worked, changed it and was thrown into a video chat with a load of random people. I think someone had the same email address and so I had their account. I changed the username and stuff and deleted all the people on the friends list but I don't see why this person can't just do the same and get the account back. Doesn't seem secure at all! Also you're thrown into a chat on video straight away!

Honestly, this app is quite impressive, there is one thing worth complaining: my Microphone. My dear friend and I like working together on stuff and this pandemic made it so we could only contact eachother on messaging platforms. I checked on my settings and allowed my microphone but they still can't hear me. I've even tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it. Other then that, it's a great app and I highly recommend it.

It's a great app and I would give it 5 stars but whenever I try to send a face mail to my friends the app closes down and something pops up saying "housepartying has stopped". I have been constantly trying to send them but cannot. Other than this it is a great app and a good way to stay in contact with your friends and family on the Christmas holidays etc. It would be a definate five star if this issue was fixed as this is a really great app and I love using it to text/call my friends.
developer_response: Oh no! Remember, you can always shake your phone to report bugs. We wanna help you party!

review_description: App is okay. Bought a few packs for the different games but the variety was fairly small/repetitive. The biggest issue I have with this app, is that for some reason you decide to use the media volume instead of the ringer volume for notifications. When my phone is on silent, it blasts the whistle sound instead of vibrating/silence, and when I'm listening with headphones it's even worse. Please fix this soon. The ringer volume is used universally for notification volume for a reason.
developer_response:
Hello Jacob,¬†

We appreciate your suggestions and would love to enhance your Houseparty experience. If you need help, you can contact Houseparty support through this link: (https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/?contact=1).¬†

Thank you.

review_description: I'm really finding this app helpful during this covid-19 outbreak, it helps me keep in touch with my friends and us super easy to use. It has a very good optional private mode, so you can go on this app with no worries. There are no ad-breaks and barely any in-app purchases. I'm really enjoying the new updated version, where celebrities are giving live demos.My only problem is that I can't send photos, but you still have facemail. Definitely get this app, and keep it too. Really liked it.
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: The video quality for video calls is great and surprises me every time how fast people get connected compared to Google Hangouts for example. But my issue with the app is the interface. It is lagging, so when I press something I end up pressing something else because the contacts are still loading, etc. Overall for the limited functionality the app has, the UI could be much simpler.
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for sending your feedback! e appreciate the time you took off for doing this kindness. If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards. Ace from Houseparty

review_description: Great app, but still some problems, love the concept, great when you have a lot of people on here, and I actually like that people can just walk into your room and start chatting, just like a real house party. If you don't like that, lock the room or change your settings to always lock your room. Unfortunately can get a bit overburdened, probably because everyone is quarantined. Also, the UX isn't so intuitive, could be improved. And the games could do with an adjusable timer, it's too short.

the app is okay but it feels unfinished I like the concept of the app and it seems to work well enough for what it sets out to do. However, the whole thing feels like a beta testing thing. Settings are a bit flat, the UX is quite confusing and difficult to get into and it is a bit strange that you're automatically "online" and available soon as you open the app. It would be nice to at least have a second step, like a simple "enter the house" button before being shown as online.

Very frustrating if you don't have an iPhone. You have to email them to delete your profile but when you email them the email bounces back as if the email address doesn't even exist. Not happy at all! All I want to do is delete my profile and I can't because I don't have an iPhone. Rubbish app. Connection terrible. Sound terrible and notifications never shut up!!

Where to start! Im on a pay as you go SIM and have my phone set to only allow apps that i select to use mobile data and to not use mobile data at the same time as WIFI (which is optional to boost speed). The app managed to override my settings and use mobile data. The app also made my phone very hot to the touch to the point where it is uncomfortable to hold. These problems alongside the problems other people have mentioned are serious flaws in the apps coding. Use an alternative app.

I like this app but there are a lot of bugs. I cannot change my name because it doesnt save it. When I shake my device it doesn't work. Please fix this. Overall I still think this is a wonderfull app that is similar to facetime but a more fun and better version. There are much stuff in this that I like but please fix the bugs so this whole app is perfect. üòÅ
developer_response: Remember, you can always shake your phone while you‚Äôre in the app to report bugs so we can help you party üëç

review_description: Sadly our first Houseparty experience was an embarrassing failure - riven with bugs and limited user controls, this app is not ready for the market. It was for my wife‚Äôs 60th birthday ‚Äì so kinda important to us. So my sons and I had trialled it three times. All worked well. But the actual function did not go well. After some false starts, I got everyone together and initiated a trivia quiz ‚Äì only for the questions to disappear from the screen. What followed was a very frustrating half an hour where after a gap, answers would pop up on the screen with 4 x red crosses, then disappear then another answer in 30 seconds or so and so on. This experience was shared by all our guests. There was no way to intervene and so we waited for the quiz to finish but it never did. At the end of the game, unbidden, it rolled into another and so on. We tried logging out and back in ‚Äì no better. In the end, very frustrated we resorted to Zoom.

This app is okay. I can talk to my friends and play games sure, but it's so laggy. Half the time I can't hear a word my friends are saying. When you make a group on there everyone is in charge of it. They can change the name and it's just annoying. You can't send stuff on there like you can on WhatsApp or Discord, but you can send facemails which is fine. And when you have it on your laptop, you can share your screen but it doesn't even work. Please fix.

the app worked fine for 10 minutes but then straight after all 3 of us get logged out of the app. I log back in and try to start a call again and I get a notification saying "Uh oh that didn't seem to work, try again" I tried over and over again but I got the same message I eventually call my friends through WhatsApp to see if they are having same problem and both of them are! We have now started using a different app (I will not name) and it works perfectly! I wouldn't advise installing!
developer_response: Oh no! We‚Äôre so sorry you didn‚Äôt love your experience. We‚Äôre always working on making Houseparty even better. Let us know what we can do!

review_description: Very irritating notification sounds, notifies me whenever someone enters the app and I have a lot of friends currently on the app house party so as you can imagine extremely annoying when I'm trying to focus on school work and other things to the point I had to turn off the entire notifications üôÑüì¥! Also on top of all of that I have heard on Google news that the app has been using personal infoüò¢ However I feel as though the game has a lot of potential if these problems where to be dealt with.

Cool app to play simple games with friends or family. The problem is that when you connect to the app, it sends an notification to all your friends with this game. If you're on the app then they can just enter without you accepting anything. The worse thing is not that it takes decisions for you but the fact that there's not even permanent settings to stop people from entering your personal space.
developer_response:
Hello,

We greatly appreciate your feedback!

We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application,feel free to reach out to us through our support site on our website:
https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

Thank you!

review_description: Asks for quite a lot of permissions. Was a bit put off with the set up thinking some of my contacts have the app but just actually unintentionally spamming them with texts to join the app!! Not cool. Then not being given the option to hide your birthday from being public knowledge; if you insert the date, you can't later hide it. There was some delay issues with the connections but so far OK to use.

Even when my phone is on do not disturb and I've turned off all the available notifications in the app, I'm still getting sound notifications for things like friends joining the app. Cheeky is the most polite thing I could say about it. Given that the app developers have been replying to all feedback on here except for this issue then you can assume this is something they've done on purpose and don't intend to fix. Honestly, just use zoom.

Really quite bad. The extra packages for games are as bad as the default ones, and cost money, far from worth it. Anyone on your friends friendlist can join a room your are in with them uninvited unless you remember to lock the room, in which case people you do want in can't get in. The concept seems decent, but the execution is poor. I regret getting it, and I regret spending money in it thinking the add one might be better than the base ones available.

Great app and all, good games on it when calling others. But your phone has to be on charge as it drains the battery fairly quickly. Also, there isn't a wide range of games. Plus, there is always connection issues, even when I'm right next to the router, so for that, it's 3 stars
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ RegardsAce from Houseparty

review_description: Its really good. With games, group chats, private mode. ALSO if you LOVEEEEEE fornite you can connect your friends on to house party (same with facebook). The thing is that SOMETIMES it can be hard to hear, and it's a little glitch out at times. Also When you are typing a message it can randomly go back to the home screen and the message gets deleted. Any way its a really good app.

Nice concept but full of bugs. It's very laggy sometimes screen just goes black, it can take up to 5 calls to even be able ti answer. Not to mention the security breach. A few days after I installed it, there were logins in my Netflix account. The same goes for my friends. This was the only app I installed in last two months so be very careful with this app. Especially because you are not even able to delete the account if you are in Android.

Great when it works but cuts out too often. This could be due to being a fairly new app and the servers not capable of the sudden traffic running through it. In my opinion one of the best chat apps when it works. Give it time and I think the developers will sort the teething issues which in return will re-rate 5 stars.

I LOVE THIS APP! It has so many cool features and allows me to constantly keep chatting to my besties. I think one of the best things is it tells you mutuals and people in the area to allow finding friends u know much easier! I also love the feature 'lock the room' where you can make sure no one else you don't want can enter the chat and keep things private... everything is so simple and amazing!!
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! Party on!

review_description: Anyone can create an account through Android or Chrome, but the only way to delete an account is with an iPhone. This needs fixing. Doesn't seem to be able to deal with the number of people using it at the moment, which is understandable. UI is really not obvious, and if your settings aren't right, people can connect to your camera without you accepting them.

Houseparty is a great app for lockdown and just seeing friends in general. You can play games and talk with your friends! If you want you can mute yourself and turn your camera off. My only complaint is you can't rename friends. This would be a great feature if people had lots of nickname from diffrent people (I have alot of nicknames so I think its a great idea) Thanks for reading : )
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: Great concept, lots of potential, but soo buggy. To the point where I'm not sure I'd bother using it again. It constantly told me I had a bad connection even though I toggled wifi/4G and usually have no issues with internet. At one point we got stuck in one of the games and couldn't close the game until everyone left and rejoined the chat. Plus various other issues.
developer_response: Hi there, Thanks for the feedback on Houseparty App. It's not you, it's them...if your friend has a bad connection, it can affect the entire party. Ask them to check their WiFi connection (they can also use Houseparty on data!) so that you can see their face instead of a "low connection" sign. Thank you.

review_description: Good idea, poorly executed. Video quality wasn't great, kept dropping the video very often. Mates kept crashing out. Worst of all, I'm on do not disturb, no other app gives me a notification, this one does! And you could have your phone on silent, but if your volume for media is turned up, it uses that. Not happy one bit

I've seen a lot of bad reviews about the notifications and access to contacts but these are easily controlled. The first from your phone's settings and then apps and the latter from the settings directly in the app when it's open. I've very much enjoyed using it my family during these times of lockdown.

It works when calling however privacy should be taken into consideration. You do not even get an option to accept a call or decline it. So everyone can just pop up when you least expect it. The calling works great in general. Also the user face is incredibly un user friendly and difficult.

The app works fine but the notifications make sound at full volume even when my phone is on silent. The notification sound is a startling metallic noise that has made me jump 5-6 times over the last 2 days I've had the app installed. It's driving me nuts and I've had to just disable notifications all together. Has kind of ruined my opinion of the app tbh üòÇ

I love Uno so thank you House Party for adding it to your games. BUT why can't you pass on a +2 pick up card with another one, forwarding pick up 4 to the next player (like you can with regular uno). Also, quite often the "call uno" button doesn't work so another player gets to call you out. Also, the Americanised version of words sucks, makes a lot of the quizzes too hard or obscure, as well as the drawing game.

The app setup and flow is easy and runs well, but the game variety runs out quickly. It's especially frustrating that we have already purchased extra decks in heads-up but those don't appear in houseparty; it's silly to have to pay for the same thing twice. Good enough for a free app, I suppose.

As soon as you open the phone without even opening the app, your contacts get notifications that you're "in hous". Complete unnecessary. Also your camera is turned on automatically when you open the app. Again absolutely unnecessary and quite frankly highly annoying. Not seeing any option to permanently delete the account.

A very good app, Good for parties when you can't go due to COVID-19. I talk with my friends, although there is a problem that happened with me and my friends in the Web version, I can't join and he can't join. Keeps on saying connecting and no sound or video when connected, If you fix this, I'll give you 5 stars!

Can't use the app anymore because every time I go in it shows I'm not connected. I have tried on many wifi networks and normal mobile data but still does not work. I have tried to shack for assistance but I can't do that either because it shows I'm not connected. I've tried closing account to restart but no luck so I have logged out and can't get back in. Terrible unfortunately.

Hellishly annoying notifications of people using the app. I get notified when my business contacts, or long lost colleagues who only exist as email in my phone use the app. My profile is an email but the app picks up phone contacts and does not let me uncheck access to phone contacts in settings. The app also does not remember your settings. I wish people are aware of its privacy violations. Like showing friends of friends without any permission.

Houseparty has been great ever since I got it, but there are new problems. I love the app bc its the only way I can contact my friends at the moment. Houseparty has started crashing. I can't call my friends. The app keeps stopping, and It always freezes. If you can fix this, please do. I really wanna talk with my friends again!
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: Two things bug me: - The app sends out notifications whenever someone is connected. I had to turn notifications off because it kept on ringing. I also don't want everyone to know that I'm online. - The home page or whatever you want to call it gives me anxiety. The first thing you see when opening the app is a transparent contact list with live feed from your front facing camera in the background. I feel like I have to be careful to not call someone accidentally. And I feel everyone can see me.

Overall houseparty is a good app. However, the variety of songs it has is very limited. Most songs people would like are not on here and there is a lack of different artists. As someone who likes to do karaoke with their friends on this app, I find it appalling that I have to limit my leisure and singing time due to there not being a very large variety of music. I hope to see an improvement in this app within the near future.

Houseparty is very cool to use to talk to your friends and stuff but I been using this app for months and now all of the sudden, my friends can not hear me. I have to text them while were in the room or call and I hate doing that. I'd tried fixing the problem by seeing if the mic is off but its not. I dont know if anybody else has this problem but it would be really great if i cant talk to my friends again. Thank you very much!üòä
developer_response: Hey, thanks for the stars! We‚Äôre workin‚Äô on it - promise. Thanks for sticking with us!

review_description: Badly designed, does not work well. UI is confusing, many on screen menus that seem to do 70% of the same things. Very easy to hit buttons that dont do what youd expect them to do. People dropping out of rooms and re adding. Games are pretty dull. All around bad.

At first when I read the reviews, on google and social media I was hesitant in downloading the app. But when I eventually downloaded it, The quality of video is down to the phone/quality as far as I know as I have had quite good calls with my friends! A few glitches but I think that is down to my own wifi connection at home. As for the android theory, you can press and hold the app to un-download it.

House Party is the best! I have a alcatel phone and my friends have iPhones but with house party we all can FaceTime, it doesn't matter what type of phone you have, you can still FaceTime. There are also fun games to play, and the best part is there are no ads!üòÅ No ads at all! I would like if when someone calls you, you can pick your on rington. The rington it comes with is like a country tune with birds squeaking an all. But overall I give it 5 stars.
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! Party on!¬†¬†

review_description: Doesn't work well on the go. I have edited my review to say that the backgrounds are awesome and the app has been working a lot better. You have to go in and back out when you cannot hear= no biggie. The biggest problem I'm having is that you need to have a way to lock the screen.If you touch the phone to move it or adjust it the screen goes off. I think the app will earn a 4 pretty soon. I feel like people have too many times expectation of a free app. Never seen buggy????
developer_response: Hello there, Thank you for contacting Houseparty Suport! Thanks for letting us know that you don't like this feature! We'll definitely pass along the feedback to our team. If you need further assistance, please visit www.houseparty.com/support, submit a ticket, and one of our agents will gladly assist. Thank you. Regards, Ace

review_description: Alright app except for the fact that it spams you with notifications. Performs like a normal app. The notifications are ridiculous because they are very constant and stupid. all it says is when someone is in a call, which can be very annoying especially if they are joining and leaving and joining and leaving. Dont get this app if you do not like notifications.
developer_response: You're completely in control of your notifications. To turn off someone's "in the house" notifications, just tap their name, then select the gear icon, and tap off for the house icon. We'll never tell. üëç

review_description: this app was really good when I had it about...2 years ago. I decided to get it back again, just to catch up with my friends and stuff, but the sign up process has a bug in it. when I put a VALID email in, it says that it's incorrect. and I know I'm not the only one experiencing this because other reviews state the same problemüò≠ please fix this so I can maybe use the app lmao.

I don't rate apps a lot, but I really enjoy this one. It makes me feel much closer to my friends. I'd like to see more games in the future but I get the feeling it's fairly new. It drains battery but I mean what do you expect, it's a group video chat app. I haven't encountered any bugs, and it seems to work pretty well, functionality wise. The UI I feel could use a little tweaking but that's a very minor gripe. I'd also like to see a share screen mode for sharing memes Fun app, 5*

The concept is there but 8 as a maximum isn't much of a party. That's more of a kickback. If you wanted to facetime with 7+ people you'd have to use zoom which sucks because I like the fact that you play group games on houseparty! If there was a way to open up the number of people allowed in the party that would make it so much better. Also there were some slight issues with freezing once we reached 8 in the party and the controls are kinda in the way leading people to exit the part accidently
developer_response:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website:
https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

Thanks!

review_description: I love houseparty!! It gives me wonderful expierience to talk to my friends. The only reason why my review has 4 stars is because I have a Samsung and there are some updates that i want to try but it seems that it only works on Iphones and also sometimes it has a lot of glitches for example, when I'm in a room with my friends when it glitches, it says that your friends are in another locked room. Otherwise, this app is amazing!!!! Thank you.

The video quality is good, but the UI has some problems. Sometimes happen that I start a game but other people doesn't see anything about the answares. Add Italian language please. There are problems with the Chrome version for PC. The games don't work. I haven't any option to start a game and if a person start one, the site crashes.
developer_response: Thank you for the stars and for your feedback - we'll let our team know about this. Party on!

review_description: A friend suggested I tried it. Opens up and asks permission for everything, doesn't respond to any taps, hammers the WiFi (brings it down too). Got a call with said friend and started "playing" a "game", no idea what it was, WiFi went down halfway, couldn't reconnect to said friend following that. I gave it 20 minutes before I uninstalled. I'd like my mobile number and email address + all collected information to be deleted please.

Stay in touch with your quaranteam ‚ù§Ô∏è Great app! Videocalls and games in the middle. Fin for catching up and social distance drinking even. Could use improvements like extra add-on features. And kind of confusinf that when you swipe left you exit the room. Needs a tutorial(maybe there is but i didnt see?) haha still, really great ‚ù§Ô∏è

A really good app! With the pandemic we are going through it is really easy to use to call friends and family! I would say it is better than zoom and Skype! You can have big groups of people up to 8 people in one call and you can have an unlimited amount of your friends in a group chat!! It is a really good way to connect with your friends! You can also play many different, fun games with your friends and family!!

I'm giving it 1 star because I want the developer to take this seriously. This app will notify you every single hour about a different person who also has this app. This app needs to realise how incredibly annoying that is. I turned off notifications and I still get notifications about friends joining the app. I have just had 2 notifications since I started writing this review. I woke up in the middle of the night because of the notifications. Set up an in-app notification system. Like an inbox

its always been a great app for me and i love all the cool features, but for the past month, i havent been able to log back into either of my two accounts. i deleted the app for a couple days, mistakenly, but whenever i tried to log back in on my Chrome OS, it would log me in but, suddenly, the entire page would freeze! its been a continuous issue and i hope i can get some feedback on why this is happening to me because i have friends that i truly need to connect with this summer..

It is a really good and and really fun but the thing is that it starts lagging alot and sometimes has a echo so you have to hang up and call again. Another thing is that sometimes people will cut off and they would freeze and it is just this app because when I faced time with the same people on a different app there audio and camera is completely fine.

I don't know if I like the app or not but the app should have a tutorial on how it works before you sign up. The Wave button is not actually just a wave button as it functions in every other app. It actually tells the other person you are wanting to chat and if that person accepts the invite, it doesn't ring, it literally just instantly connects you. So if you aren't ready, like in a bed, then the other person is about to get a surprise. Itd be nice to know that before and why not let it ring?
developer_response:
Thanks for sharing your thoughts on how we can improve the app.¬†If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website:
https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

review_description: It's a great way to connect with your friends and family! This app lets you "face time" with up to 8 people! You can text, call, and send voice mails but with your face in it! When you open this app it sends out a notification to all your friends so they know your ready to get the party on!!!
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! Party on!

review_description: This app would have been so great ONLY IF you allow us to use our WIFI instead of our mobile data. The connections kept on lagging and it hinders us from having the 'party' smoothly.. and after playing for 2-3 days straight we kinda know all the answers coz the questions are repetitive.. hope you could enhance the connectivity and add more contents !!! Thanks

I really like this app you can stay on call and exit it to do something else and still be on call you can play games with your friends and mine doesn't glitch. But one thing I would change when you text someone I would like to send pictures because my Snapchat is slow but other than that it's a really good app!
developer_response: Thank you for the stars and for your feedback - we'll let our team know about this. Party on!

review_description: I like what the app does and how easy it is to use and setup, but the video quality is pretty bad and the notification/ringtone is so damn annoying, if the quality of the video is improved and mabey an option to change the ringtone would be amazing. Thanks for taking the time to read my review and I wish your app more success in the future.
developer_response: Thank you for the stars and for your feedback - we'll let our team know about this. Party on!

review_description: I love the app, everything works great and it has never crashed once! Except theres one problem and the reason I am only giving it 3 stars. When I put my phone into vibrate, I do it because I don't want a loud BONG when I get a notification. Houseparty literally ignores that and still goes 'BONG' *vibrate* whenever it has a notification.
developer_response:
Thanks for sending your feedback.¬†If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website:
https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

review_description: I think this app is very good and i really enjoy talking with my friends with it. I use it alot! I know that there are games you can play while calling your friends, but I wish there was a bigger variety of games. There are only 3 or 4. And also, this app took away it "delete account" option which is really sketchy. They need to bring it back because it's really sketchy when an app doesn't let you delete your account.

I would like a feature where certainly people can have a key thats permanent so when the app forced them out or they leave for a moment that they could rejoin without having to wait for invite. (Reason): Sometimes while on a call with someone who falls asleep but you still want to be on the call with them it may kick you out for no reason, which is annoying, but with this you can just rejoin. I know that you could keep it unlocked through this time but then random unwanted guests can join, Thanks
developer_response: With every new app version we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We are sure that your feedback will only help us improve further.

review_description: Houseparty is an amazing app. It has a lot of in built games that you can play with your friends which is really fun and I prefer this over normal phone calls. However, there is a huge problem. If you have a timer with someone, it only works when you use the mobile app. If you use houseparty on PC the timer wont be visible and the time you talk will not be counted. The timer doesn't even get renewed if you talk on PC. Because of this I lost my timer of 4008 minutes with my friend. Please fix.

This app is very nice for talking to friends, however if you have very unstable connection this might not be for you. You can choose the notifications you get and give to others and yourself. As well as games to play as a group and options to message and leave video messages. you can wave at someone sending them a notification that you would like to speak to them or you can call the person. You can keep a streak with a person depending on how much you talk to them. Great app!
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: A very easy-to-start video calling experience. UI is a bit difficult at first. The games included are pretty basic, but fun. The notifications for this app are absolutely obtrusive. Definitely can be a really good app with a bit if work.

This app abuses the USER INFORMATION, and collects and uses PERSONAL data without permission. For example, some contacts of mine were able to see that I was on the app without me enabling or permitting such feature. I had no control over who sees me on the app. There is no way to remove and retract your data from this app. Please be aware this is in violation of data privacy laws.

Nice concept needs work. I have a Samsung A50 with one of the latest os and this app kicks me off wifi when I use it. It drains battery and data cause it refuses to stay connected to wifi. When I close the app I am instantly connected back to my wifi. üôÑ please fix this. Also needs more content, options started to recycle within a few mins of play.
developer_response:
Hello Zara,¬†

We would love to enhance your Houseparty experience, and appreciate your suggestions. For help, you can contact Houseparty support through this link: (https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/?contact=1).¬†

Thank you.¬†

review_description: It is constantly disconnecting during calls of more than 3 people despite being in a full wifi zone. I cant see an option to only recieve notifications from people who want to chat, so my phone is going off all the time. Userbility could be better as I find it hard to navigate.

I do not trust this app, when I used it, it was buggy, and an app where you can freely change your email address (and not verify it), name and date of birth freely with no questions and no clear way to delete your account (via email appears to be the only way and if you do send one you get a reply saying too many emails) , Changed all my details in settings, removed permissions and uninstalled, seems a bit fishy to me. Personally will not reinstall.

Video speed is good. I just wish the camera settings on the app could be changed. At the moment it looks like the camera is magnifying on to your face. Another feature to add would be to have a host who can use an available screen for PowerPoint presentation or movie streaming.
developer_response:
Hello,

We greatly appreciate your feedback!

review_description: Great app and concept, however the games have timers that are too short. They don't give you enough time to read everything correctly. Also connection is very low at times and it can be glitchy. With how many people are using it due to the world situation at the moment it would be ideal if you could update the app accordingly.

Good app especially at this time of lockdown. However connection issues seem to start as soon as more than one person joins the room. I can live stream games on twitch without any issues as I have 40meg download speed and 30 upload so shouldn't be getting any connection issues so can only put it down to the app. All my friends have the same problem.

My boyfriend and I use to love this app since it gave us the chance to have it on in the background and be able to play video games together. Ever since the last couple of updates everytime we try and leave the app when it's only the two of us we will cut out and won't be able to hear anything. I want the old houseparty back. Is there possibly a way to uninstall previous updates? Cause I really hate this. I also hate the black bars it takes up a decent part of the screen. Before it was better.
developer_response: Sorry to hear about the trouble.¬†We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

review_description: This all is so much fun and I'm on it all the time. My only problem is after I accept new friends, they normally have mutual friends that pop up and they can become your friend. Well after I get a new friends the mutual friends pop up for a quick second and then dissapear so I can't add them. Houseparty if your reading this tell me why this is happening. Please.

It gliches like crazy can hear ppl that much i tried it on 3 phone it is the same on each it is not worth it. It works some of the times but not all some times when you go on a another app it will kick you off. Houseparty will kick you out when you are talking to some one. If you make an app make sure it works 100% of the time.

This app is absolutely amazing! I use it all of the time and it is a great way to have a fun time with friends even if you arnt with them. You can share precious messages and even talk to a few people of your liking and talk to one only or eight people. Messages are amazing, you can send videos to friends and they can send videos to you aswell.

Kept on disconnecting on my phone (Samsung Galaxy 9+). Tried turning of WiFi to just used data. Nothing helped, never actually was able to talk or play games with friends. I hear lots of people love it. I am able to use all other video conferencing type apps like Zoom and Google Hangouts with no issue.
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback. We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: This app is super useful. You can call up to 8 people, which means you can include more friends in your conversation, unlike facetime or WhatsApp video call. There are awesome games included too that you can play with your friends. They just introduced kareoke and virtual backgrounds into the app. My only issue is that sometimes when you are playing the game, chips and guac, it freezes and glitches.
developer_response: Next time you experience a bug, can you please shake your phone to report? That way, our engineers can take a closer look at the problem!

review_description: I love everything about this app and what it has to offer. However, I don't get most of the notifications when my friends are in the house. I've forced stop and uninstalled and reinstalled and still the same issue. Also, if I have to go out of the app (but stay in the conversation) for a long period of time, when I return to the app the video doesn't recover. I need to leave the meeting and come back to fix.

As far as the app goes for communication and the amount of people in one room its cool. You can have some pretty good conversations and laughs. But when I use my camera in the app to change from front to back camera it's squiggly green and black lines. I have a Huawei P30 Pro. My old phone (P20 Pro) everything works great. This is a new phone, and in general I can go from front to back camera with no difficulties at all. Please fix the bug. This is the only app I have difficulty like this

review_description: Allows strangers to enter your room and it made me and my friends really uncomfortable. If there was an option for friends only that would be great. I get that you can lock rooms but you have to invite everyone. Overall a good video chatting app with fun games to keep us occupied during quarantine.

It was really good until recently. Played games with family on the west coast and laughed A LOT! But now it is all echoey and completely unusable. We each closed and reopened the app, then uninstalled and reinstalled. Nothing helped. Guess we'll just Zoom from now on... Also, we like the drawing game but the number of clues are rather limited. We usually just quit when the same clues start coming around again.

They give an option to sneak into someone's house? Seriously inappropriate. When you try to call someone on your contact list through the app and they don't answer, the contact can accept minutes/hours later without notifying you and therefore hear and see you without your knowledge. This is down right wrong!
developer_response:
Hello,

review_description: Limited selection of games, and the categories often repeat. Also, the players keep dropping and the connection can be kind of choppy. For free, it's better than nothing, but I probably won't be using this once the pandemic passes.

I'm so sorry to see this app go :( this was the app that me and friends always went to talk to each other. It also kept all of us going during quarantine and then to talk to our friends that went away to college. We have made so many memories through this app and this was the place I really connected with my friends when I went to a new school. I hope this comes back in some way. Thank you for everything <3

Pretty good app but does glitch sometimes if someone else joins the party and/or changing screen orientation which is only solved by closing and reopening the app, which is irritating. Also drains battery very fast compared to other video calling apps. This isn't just me either, everyone I have called using the app has noted the same problem. Overall still a good app for multiple video calls with mates. Party games a bit rubbish given there's only one set of questions on each game though.
developer_response:

review_description: I personally think it is a brilliant app and i use it allllll the time. It does its job well and peforms how it is supposed to.It is easy to use and well thought through with the controls and how to use all the features, overall it is fairly straightforward. But..... the reason it is not 5stars would only be because *I* think that there should be an *anonymous* mode or *appear offline* mode so people cant see who your in a house with if you turn this feature on.And also so u can keep it private.
developer_response: Thanks for the feedback! We‚Äôre always working to make Houseparty even better üëç

review_description: Audio does not play out of the TV when casting/screen mirroring or using an HDMI adapter. The video mirrors but the audio continues to play out of the phone speakers. The iPhone app allows audio to play through the TV, so I assume this is a feature which has not been added to the android app yet.

review_description: The app was great when it first started earlier this year but lately the video and audio quality has gone down. Especially when you have more than three people on at once. My Wi-Fi hasn't changed but the app has. It should have some sort of feedback at the end of every session to rate the experience. Just like Google and messenger. I'd also like to see a way to display pictures to your screen to share with the other members of the group.

Great app to use during these times. My only gripe is a personal economic one, completely bias and nothing to do with the actual app. I would prefer to have a shop in app to purchase bundles or a list of things versus the tedious back and forth selection process.

review_description: I have found myself only using this app only once due to this confusing interface it has and want to delete my account but cannot. There are too many options and bars that do not make sense I do not understand what any of it means - a tutorial will be handy etc but I have not used the app more than once as it is really confusing to myself. Please make an update where users can delete their accounts.

Used the app once. Couldn't see the houseparty guests' faces most of the time, just a blank screen. Cool concept if it worked better. Also, cannot delete account from Android even though they claim it's been fixed in the app. Emailed customer support and waiting to hear back.

Unexpected, I thought it would be just another dead social app, but it is surprisingly useful, especially during this Covid19 situation. Worth having in order to keep in contact with loved ones and frineds, all within set safety measures. In my opinion, if it had some more options/settings to play around with whilst in a group chat, I think could he fun.

I love this app but i have issues. I stop receiving notifications. Profiles wouldnt properly load, Timers are not working, People would gain access to locked room without an invite from anyone in the room, And it would sometimes glitch to a black screen. There are more issues than this too. EDIT: Thanks for updating.
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: It's a really nice app to connect with some real life friends, and even online friends. I feel like some stuff could be improved like, or added. Like maybe add like a way to send images to your friends, and also like filters while your in a call. And maybe make it so you can call people without WI-FI. Besides that I would say it's really good. Because I'm young i don't use really anything else besides this snapchat and discord, so really good!
developer_response: Thanks so much for your suggestion! üëã We're so glad you're enjoying the app.

review_description: It won't even download I have an LG stylo 2 and i have been waiting for THREE DAYS!! I tried downloading it on my iphone and it still didn't work it was able to download it i kept getting kicked from servers for no reason. Every time I try to speak with my friends i either cannot hear them or the thing ends when nobody leaves i have even tried down loading in on my pc and yet it still doesn't work. It really sucks because it wasn't updated too long ago and it should be more accessible especially during this extremely difficult time.

Works great on mobile! Everything working as it should be and the call quality is generally better than alternatives. The only complaint I have is that using games crashes the whole chat when at least 1 person is on the PC version. I know the browser version is in Beta, I just thought I'd point it out in the app review.

review_description: App works pretty well overall. The most annoying thing with the app is that it will always make noise even when your phone is on vibrate. Other than the security issues during March 2020 the app works well but not being able to get notifications without sound is a large problem

I loved using this app but it no longer works on my Microsoft Surface laptop. It says I need to update to a more recent version. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app and the issue is persistent. It's also annoying that I cannot start a game, with friends, while using my laptop, as opposed to my cell phone. This app drains my phone battery quite quickly so I prefer to use a computer.

Useful app. There are minor lags but I have one major problem. After I connect my bluetooth headphones, I can hear everything on my phone, except when I go on a houseparty call, it projects the sound on the phone speakers, and not my headphones. I'm not sure if that's a problem with the app or not, but that's it.
developer_response: We're so sorry you're having this issue. Next time it happens, can you please shake your phone to report? That way, our engineers can take a closer look at the problem!

review_description: I've used this app just once while talking with my daughter. Clear video and sound quality! Also a great way to visually share information/ideas. A great tool for visiting and following up with loved ones anywhere! There are games included in the app where loved ones could spend time visiting, having fun, and still being safe. Finally, I further understand that "group" calls are possible!? This will be my next venture!

Good but I worry there doesn't seem to be parental controls (my child can't play online but I am using this for him to keep in touch with the family). Also the fact that the app is constantly working in the background, i can't seem to find a logout button or something to make me offline/unavailable. Would also be nice to have more games your can play by yourself

I really like this app because if my friends dont have a phone number or they are over seas/traveling it is easy to connect with them and you can play games. I do have I tiny problem but it's not down grading it's just that it takes a few minutes for it to load and sometimes it kicked my out of a party and everyone else but other than that my experience has been great
developer_response: Glad to hear you're enjoying Houseparty! Party on!

review_description: Worst connection and worst video ever. The app is unable to secure a stable connection for the whole party for a long time. Just a little slow internet and the videos turned off immediately (no lag first) and they just cut you off of the conversation. Otherwise a very creative app but it needs major improvement.

After having no way to delete my account (being on Android), which I find incredibly questionable, I followed protocol to email the Houseparty team to process my request. It's been more than 2 weeks and still have not received any responses to CONFIRM my account has been deleted. Absolutely unprofessional and poor service, and the app itself has very basic features. Apparently, NOW they enabled Android users to delete their account. I'm not going to reinstall the app just for this purpose!

Tbh I love it. It's great for long distance and I like being able to play games on it. I have iffy internet at home (wifi doesnt even reach) so sometimes the connection is bad but that's not the apps fault. I love that this app allows you to be connected with multiple people and encourages interactions by games and other features!

I would give this 5 stars but my issue is the camera quality, it's very blurry and I would like it if I had a better camera quality from this app. That's my only issue and if that could be fixed I would appreciate it. The app is super great, I haven't had it freeze up once or lag a bit even with a large group of people it wont lag or freeze up ect. Because with most of my facetime apps I have they will reconnect all the time and freeze or blur up. Great app would reccomend!!

this app does not work at all. at first it worked fine on my android phone and my iPad. it still works on my I pad but now it it doesn't let me join any calls and when ever I try to join a room, their camera goes black and it tells them I couldn't join. I have made multiple accounts and even tried deleting the app and redownloading it but that doesn't work. I hope that the Android version of this app Is updated and can work better. thank you.
developer_response: Oh no! Please shoot us an email at hello@houseparty.com so we can help you party!

review_description: Love this app. Hate to see it be gone in October. Best app I've used. If this app is continues, i think what would be great(in my opinion) for future updates would add a *BUNCH* of other songs to the karaoke and add a "share screen" button of Android users. Again, i think this would be great for a future update, tho this app is being discontinued.

This app is really great. The picture is super smooth and the games are great. You can ignore people and lock your rooms which is handy. The main downsides are it sucks your battery life ridiculously not to mention it is a ton of data if your not in a wifi area or out and about. Also it raises the phone temperature.

Hello,

review_description: A fun app but their customer service is probably the worst I've ever dealt with. If you have an Android, you are unable to delete your account. There's only the option to do it if you have an iPhone. You can only reach customer service through email and they rarely respond. Someone finally responded and said they would add my email to a "delete list" but I would have to wait 30 days.....??

I've used this several times now with friends, and I really like it. It's been a smooth experience. For those complaining about it draining your batteries, I'd say that's kind of a given with any kind of video-based app. I just plug my phone in when I use it. I like how convenient it is, and it's been really nice quality every time.

It's a very nice app. Runs smoothly. But pls can u add a mute a person feature were u if u tap on the person and press mute only u wont be able to hear them because some people get really annoying sometimes and I dont feel like blocking them. Also u should add party leaders so that person can kick someone out and they want join for the next 5 mins. Also the messages. We should be able to delete messages. If u add all this it will be the best talking app.

House party has recently been playing painfully loud noises for some reason. All of the members can hear it and it sounds whistly and distorted. We've all tried closing the app, rejoining the party and everything but it won't stop. Usually my rating would be higher, but this painful sound issue has dropped it for me for the time being.
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback. We are working to ensure the Houseparty experience is fun for everyone. If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Regards, Ace from Houseparty

review_description: I'm sure there are a few privacy issues with this, and yes some of the notifications are intrusive, but they can be overcome, this is a great app to keep stay in touch with friends and relatives during these times of social isolation, I love playing the communal games! -1* for the intrusive way it tries to get your contacts

The video quality is terrible. The whole app gets laggy after a while of usage and you have to restart the app. The only thing good is the idea that you just go on there and you can join anyone and anyone can join you. Your not locked to a group chat and that's what I like.

Cannot install and use without granting access to your contacts. While innocently-enough framing this as "Now, let's find your friends..." there is only a button to continue. I'm tired of every app developer thinking they have the right to the information in my contacts. They do not have the right to personal information people have trusted me with. In fact, I don't even have the right to LET that info be shared without permission from the people in my database. Uninstalling.
developer_response: Oh no! Shoot us an email at hello@houseparty.com so we can help you party!

review_description: The app does not give info on how to use it, informs you when anyone in your contacts list (even former contacts that you do not want to be in contact with) is on, and can be assumed to inform them when you are on, opens your video camera by default, and is overall just frustrating and creepy to me. Uninstalling this now.

Yea, the screen goes black and cameras freeze, i assume this is because of low RAM phones, but all works out with a simple: "leave and rejoin". 5 stars would be given if i could find a way to unblock a friend. i just sent an email, but ive never gotten a reply from any developer, so im hoping this helps. i have figure it out lol. just search the name, and look for unblock. i do recommend a "blocked list" for future updates.
developer_response: Thanks for the feedback! We‚Äôre always working to make Houseparty even better and you guys help us do that üëç

review_description: After 5 mins or so of video call it makes my phone freeze, screen goes on and off and buttons unresponsive so that I have to reboot. I think it may have a memory leak because it slowly uses all the RAM in my phone until the phone stops working. I'm using an older phone running Android 5 or 6 I think and the phone is an HTC One 8 or 9

If you would like to give feedback directly or you are having issues with the application, please reach out via our support site located at https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: Screen for my camera blacks out or freezes after a while, does not resolve unless I restart the app. After more than 2 ppl are on I start "having connection issues" even though it was working fine earlier in the call with less ppl. Browser extensions for PC does not let you play certain games.
developer_response: Hello, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks!

review_description: App sucks. Crashes randomly when doing basic tasks. The backend system randomly blocks people that I have added, without any facility to unblock them. Epic responded to a previous review with "email us and we'll help you" Sent them an email. Nothing. Zero response. Honestly, they didn't need someone to do corporate espionage to turn me off this app. Their buggy system and poor customer support did it all by themselves.

the app itself is really great and I love it. Just with the new update it's somehow preventing me from actually using the party and ever since the first time I got it the messaging has been glitchy. I have a Note 8 if you guys could can you fix the bug going on, but otherwise great app
developer_response: Thanks for the feedback! This is super helpful. If this happens again, don't forget to shake your phone to report bugs!

review_description: Notifications that cannot be turned off. Absolutely unacceptable for an app that's top 5. I've muted all notifications, phone is on vibrate, and yet it continues to tell me which one of my friends are "in the room". No thanks. The drawing game is decent. The cards against humanity clone sucks so much, there isn't even an option to end the stupid game.

Be aware that if you use Android the app won't let you delete your account. Apparently emailing their tech support is the only way. Seems dodgy to me and I've not heard good things from several people about data collection etc. Also, the sound and video quality has been poor. Would not recommend.

Won't let me delete my account. Only apparent way is sending them an email asking for them to do so. Nevertheless, they will only do it if you give them personal info like full name, phone number, etc... which is info that they don't need for what I request. This app's configuration violates many many rights. Beginning from the fact that not only you depend on them to actually to delete your account but also you are obligated to expose your info.

I didn't know I was expected to allow this app so much of my privacy, after a "good-LONG pause" I accepted to where this was going. Then they wanted permission to my friends info. that's where I draw the line. That's when I realized they already had my phone contacts, had it been my fb contacts that would have been different, the end result, I happily uninstalled this app. Not tryin to persuade anyone not to try this app, just merely stating my opinion and my experience with it.

Rest in peace Housepartyüòî Sorry to see you go It'a pretty buggy and sometimes just won't show your friends in the In The House list even though they're In The House etc. The games are alright. Also you can't see all of what other people's cameras capture most of the time because they are automatically being cropped to fit the part of the screen they need to be in. So fix all of that stuff and make the splitscreen more customisable and it'll instantly be my new favourite video chatting app.
developer_response: Hi there, Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website: https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/ Thanks.

review_description: I had downloaded this app 4 days back. Was great. Awesome features. But from past two days... As more people have downloaded it...there has been a lot of connectivity issues. Network is bad and lots of lag if more than 2 people are in a room. Please do rectify as soon as possible. Cheers.

Overall, this app is amazing. Apart from 1 bug. Whenever I go out of Houseparty, after an amount of time, the app stops working. My friends can't hear me, and it doesn't even show that I'm still in the house, talking to friends whenever I go out of the app. I don't know if this is something you can fix, or it's my phone. But if you can look further into this, that'll be amazing.

Utter trash. Mic wouldn't work and after half an hour of tearing through my phone settings changing absolutely everything, it stopped my friend from getting on and I couldn't even find out if my changes had worked. Not enough settings in the app which surprisingly made it even more complicated. Just a terrible app, don't waste your time

Good app for video calls. Use it to chat with friends all the time. One oversight is that whenever I open Snapchat while I'm in a call my headphones disconnect and the call starts playing through the speakers on my phone, causing a lot of unpleasant feedback on the other end of the call. Please fix this.
developer_response:
Hello,

Thank you for your feedback! If you have any further questions or concerns regarding Houseparty, please do not hesitate to reach out directly via our support site on our website:
https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/houseparty/

Regards,

review_description: Can't deactivate your account through the app, you must send an email which might bounce back because they're "receiving mail at a rate that prevents additional messages from being delivered". Clearly they are relying on people to be too lazy to keep sending emails, therefore retaining accounts. This is scummy design.

Downloaded this to play with my partner. App drains your battery very quickly since there's an in-game ongoing video call while playing (you can opt out though). Overall a fun game, but the questions get recycled after awhile and there isn't an update to refresh topics/questions. Eventually uninstalled it. May revisit again in the future. Great way to keep in contact with friends and relatives in other countries while playing some game on your phone.

Extremely laggy on both my Pixel 3a and my desktop computer that can run high-end games fine (often not even loading on the computer). I assume because there are no servers in Australia. Even aside from the lag, it is still extremely buggy on both platforms. Alas, I still use it. I recommend you get a different chat platform, but temporarily this will do.

Don't like the UI of the app and isn't very intuitive to use. Chats lose connection more than on any other video chat app I have used. Works alright overall and I like that you can play games with other people, something I wish other apps would do as well.
developer_response: Hi there, Thanks for the feedback on Houseparty App. If you need further assistance, please visit www.houseparty.com/support, submit a ticket, and one of our agents will gladly assist. Thank you.

review_description: Hi! So, houseparty WOULD be a 5 stars but I've given it a 3 because for the past two weeks, whenever I get on the app the app goes unresponsive. This happened because I logged out and logged back in. I've tried reinstalling it, all that stuff... Also I'm on Chrombook if it makes a difference! Please fix this, most of my friends think im being rude for ignoring them!!! :(
developer_response: Oh no! We're so sorry you're having technical problems. Please contact us at hello@houseparty.com and we'll take a closer look!

review_description: Good experience with this app. Had to be made aware to lock the room to make it private though as it wasn't clear that it was public when I downloaded the app. A development suggestion would be to share music playlists maybe via Spotify so those "in the house" can listen to the same songs whilst partying or playing trivia games remotely.

Houseparty makes sounds despite my phone being on silent mode. I have tried everything in the notifications settings to get this to stop. However, the app continues to make sounds while my phone is on silent mode. This is completely unacceptable, so I am uninstalling this app. I actively tell people I know not to download or use this app. How could the developers get something so essential, so wrong? It makes me doubt the security of the app as a whole.

Has potential to be a good app but very unstable with way too many crashes when playing the games with more than 3 people, the more people the more crashes. The developers need to stabalize the app for better performance. Not really too different from any messaging app and there are better apps for that purpose.
developer_response: Next time you experience a bug, can you please shake your phone to report? That way, our engineers can take a closer look at the problem!

review_description: I enjoy this app, it's a nice alternative to Facebook Messenger and it is supposedly encrypted. If you have friends on iOS and you're tired of photos and videos you've texted to them getting crushed so hard from compression, it makes it look like it was shot on a 2004 flip phone, give Signal a shot. It's been a great messaging app so far. I just hope we can trust them with the data.

I love signal but since I am the only person I know who cares about privacy, the drop of SMS functionality seems to be a downfall. I was able to convince a couple ppl to try signal out because they were able to use this single app to manage regular messages as well as private ones without having to push the use of the app. For me, since no one uses signal, I'll have to switch back to regular SMS messaging since there is no alternative.

I've used Signal for a few years now, but the last few months have been awful. Not sure what is going on, but messages sometimes takes over a minute to send, regardless if using the mobile or desktop app. The inconsistentcy is infuriating. I hoped that things would improve after SMS support was removed but somehow they made it worse.

Would be 5 stars all the way, but they don't allow text messaging as part of their service any longer. I understand the encryption, and adding someone without Signal doesn't keep it totally private, but if the user accepts that, then I do not see why it's a problem. They should allow this feature. It seems it's a way to pressure users into signing up, and I am not a fan of that. ‚ù§Ô∏è LOVE the app, though. Wish I could get everyone one in it A++ minus 2 stars for standard text message chat
